src: Acredita-se que esta seja a quinta vez na história que as pessoas observam o que pode ser material marciano quimicamente confirmado na Terra. Dentre cerca de 24 mil meteoritos conhecidos que caíram na Terra, apenas 34 foram confirmados como sendo de origem marciana. Quinze dessas rochas são atribuídas à chuva de meteoritos que ocorreu em julho do ano passado. Algumas das rochas, que são muito raras na Terra, estão sendo vendidas por US$ 11.000 a US$ 22.500 a onça, o que é cerca de 10 vezes mais que o custo do ouro.
mt: It is believed that this is the fifth time in history that people observe what may be chemically confirmed Martian material on Earth. Of the approximately 24,000 known meteorites that fell to Earth, only 34 have been confirmed as being of Martian origin. Fifteen of these rocks are attributed to the meteor shower that occurred last July. Some of the rocks, which are very rare on Earth, are being sold for US$11,000 to US$22,500 an ounce, which is about ten times the cost of gold.
ref: This is believed to be the fifth time in history that people have observed what turned out to be chemically confirmed martian material falling to Earth. Out of the approximately 24,000 known meteorites to have fallen to Earth, only about 34 have been verified to be martian in origin. Fifteen of these rocks are attributed to the meteorite shower last July. Some of the rocks, which are very rare on Earth, are being sold from US$11,000 to $22,500 per ounce, which is about ten times more than the cost of gold.

src: Schumacher, que se aposentou em 2006 após vencer o campeonato de Fórmula 1 sete vezes, deve substituir o lesionado Felipe Massa. O brasileiro sofreu um ferimento grave na cabeça depois de uma colisão no Grande Prêmio da Hungria de 2009. Massa deverá ficar de fora até, pelo menos, o resto da temporada de 2009.
mt: Schumacher, who retired in 2006 after winning the Formula One championship seven times, is expected to replace the injured Felipe Massa. The Brazilian suffered a serious head injury after a collision at the 2009 Hungarian Grand Prix. Massa is expected to be out until at least the rest of the 2009 season.
ref: Schumacher who retired in 2006 after winning the Formula 1 championship seven times, was due to replace the injured Felipe Massa. The Brazilian suffered a serious head injury after a crash during the 2009 Hungarian Grand Prix. Massa is due to be out for at least the rest of the 2009 season.

src: Até agora, a AOL conseguiu modificar e desenvolver o mercado de mensagens instantâneas no seu próprio ritmo, devido ao seu amplo uso nos Estados Unidos. Com este acordo em vigência, esta liberdade pode acabar. O número de usuários do Yahoo! e dos serviços da Microsoft combinados, irão concorrer com o número de clientes da AOL.
mt: So far, AOL has been able to modify and develop the instant messaging market at its own pace, due to its widespread use in the United States. With this agreement in effect, this freedom may end. The number of users of Yahoo! and Microsoft's services combined will compete with AOL's number of customers.
ref: Until now, AOL has been able to move and develop the IM market at its own pace, due to its widespread use within the United States. With this arrangement in place, this freedom might end. The number of users of the Yahoo! and Microsoft services combined will rival the number of AOL's customers.

src: Na manhã de ontem, um carro-bomba explodiu na sede da polícia em Gaziantep, Turquia, matou dois policiais e feriu mais de vinte outras pessoas. O gabinete do governador afirmou que 19 dos feridos eram agentes policiais. A polícia informou suspeitar que o responsável pelo ataque seja um suposto militante do Daesh (ISIL).
mt: Yesterday morning, a car bomb exploded at the police headquarters in Gaziantep, Turkey, killing two police officers and injuring more than twenty other people. The governor's office said that 19 of the injured were police officers. Police suspect that the perpetrator of the attack is a suspected militant of the Daesh (ISIL).
ref: A car bomb detonated at police headquarters in Gaziantep, Turkey yesterday morning killed two police officers and injured more than twenty other people. The governor's office said nineteen of the injured were police officers. Police said they suspect an alleged Daesh (ISIL) militant of responsibility for the attack.

src: Mitt Romney, que foi governador de Massachusetts, foi o vencedor das eleições primárias do Partido Republicano terça-feira, na Flórida, com mais de 46 por cento dos votos. Newt Gingrich, o ex-Presidente da Câmara dos Deputados dos EUA, ficou em segunda posição com 32 por cento. Como um estado em que o vencedor leva tudo, a Flórida concedeu todos os seus cinquenta delegados para Romney, colocando-o como o primeiro colocado para a indicação do Partido Republicano.
mt: Mitt Romney, who was governor of Massachusetts, was the winner of the Republican Party primary elections Tuesday in Florida, with more than 46 percent of the votes. Newt Gingrich, the former Speaker of the U.S. House of Representatives, came in second place with 32 percent. As a state where the winner takes all, Florida awarded all of its fifty delegates to Romney, putting him as the front-runner for the Republican Party nomination.
ref: Former Massachusetts governor Mitt Romney won the Florida Republican Party presidential primary election on Tuesday with over 46 percent of the vote. Former U.S. Speaker of the House Newt Gingrich came in second with 32 percent. As a winner-takes-all state, Florida awarded all fifty of its delegates to Romney, pushing him ahead as the front-runner for the Republican Party nomination.

src: "O ex-presidente da Câmara Newt Gingrich, o governador do Texas Rick Perry e a congressista Michele Bachmann terminaram em quarto, quinto e sexto lugares, respectivamente. Após a chegada dos resultados, Gingrich enalteceu Santorum, mas disse duras palavras contra Romney, em cujo nome foram exibidos anúncios de campanha negativos em Iowa contra Gingrich. Perry disse que iria ""voltar ao Texas para olhar os resultados da convenção partidária desta noite e determinar se há para mim um caminho a seguir nesta corrida"", porém mais tarde afirmou que permaneceria na corrida e participaria das preliminares do dia 21 de janeiro na Carolina do Sul. Bachmann, que venceu o Ames Straw Poll no mês de agosto, decidiu pôr fim a sua campanha."
mt: "Former House Speaker Newt Gingrich, Texas Governor Rick Perry and Congresswoman Michele Bachmann finished in fourth, fifth and sixth places, respectively. After the results were announced, Gingrich praised Santorum, but said harsh words against Romney, whose name was shown in negative campaign ads against Gingrich in Iowa. Perry said he would "go back to Texas to look at the results of tonight's party convention and determine if there is a path for me to continue in this race," but later said he would remain in the race and participate in the January 21st primary in South Carolina. Bachmann, who won the Ames Straw Poll in August, decided to end her campaign."
ref: "Former House Speaker Newt Gingrich, Texas governor Rick Perry, and Congresswoman Michele Bachmann finished in fourth, fifth, and sixth place, respectively. After the results came in, Gingrich lauded Santorum, but had tough words for Romney, on whose behalf negative campaign advertisements were aired in Iowa against Gingrich. Perry stated that he would ""return to Texas to assess the results of tonight's caucus, determine whether there is a path forward for myself in this race"", but later said that he would remain in the race and compete in the January 21 South Carolina primary. Bachmann, who won the Ames Straw Poll in August, decided to end her campaign."

src: "O site da estação descreve o show como ""um teatro de radialístico da velha guarda, com um toque nerd ultrajante e novo!"" Em seus primeiros dias, o programa era apresentado exclusivamente no longevo TogiNet Radio, site focado em rádio falado. No final de 2015, a TogiNet estabeleceu a AstroNet Radio como uma estação subsidiária. O programa anteriormente apresentava dubladores amadores que moravam ao leste do Texas."
mt: "The station's website describes the show as ""a theater of old-school radio, with a nerdy ultrajacent touch!"" In its early days, the program was presented exclusively on the venerable TogiNet Radio, a site focused on spoken word radio. By the end of 2015, TogiNet established AstroNet Radio as a subsidiary station. The program previously featured amateur voice actors who lived east of Texas."
ref: "The station's web site describes the show as ""old school radio theater with a new and outrageous geeky spin!"" In its early days, the show was featured solely at the long-running internet radio site TogiNet Radio, a site focused on talk radio. In late 2015, TogiNet established AstroNet Radio as a subsidiary station. The show originally featured amateur voice actors, local to East Texas."

src: Os atiradores de Mumbai chegaram de barco em 26 de novembro de 2008, trazendo granadas, armas automáticas e atingiram vários alvos, incluindo a lotada estação ferroviária Chhatrapati Shivaji Terminus e o famoso Hotel Taj Mahal. O reconhecimento e a coleta de informações de David Headley ajudaram a possibilitar o trabalho dos 10 homens armados do grupo militante paquistanês Laskhar-e-Taiba. O ataque abalou bastante as relações entre a Índia e o Paquistão.
mt: 26 November 2008, the Mumbai attackers arrived by boat, bringing grenades, automatic weapons and hit several targets, including the crowded Chhatrapati Shivaji Terminus railway station and the famous Hotel Taj Mahal. David Headley's reconnaissance and information gathering helped make possible the work of the 10 armed men of the Pakistani militant group Lashkar-e-Taiba. The attack shook the relations between India and Pakistan.
ref: The Mumbai attackers arrived via boat on Novemeber 26, 2008, bringing with them grenades, automatic weapons and hit multiple targets including the crowded Chhatrapati Shivaji Terminus railway station and the famous Taj Mahal Hotel. David Headley's scouting and information gathering had helped to enable the operation by the 10 gunmen from the Pakistani militant group Laskhar-e-Taiba. The attack put a huge strain on relations between India and Pakistan.

src: "O recorde de embates de forma direta de Nadal contra o atleta do Canadá é de 7–2. Ele recentemente perdeu no jogo contra Raonic no Aberto de Brisbane. Nadal conquistou 88% de pontos líquidos nos 76 pontos vencedores da partida na primeira servida. Depois da partida, o King of Clay falou: ""Estou muito animado por voltar para as últimas rodadas dos eventos mais importantes. Estou aqui para tentar ganhar isso""."
mt: "Nadal's direct-encounter record against the Canadian player is 7–2. He recently lost to Raonic in the Brisbane Open. Nadal won 88% of the points in the 76 points he won on serve. After the match, the King of Clay said: ""I'm very excited to return to the latter stages of the most important events. I'm here to try to win this."""
ref: "Nadal's head to head record against the Canadian is 7–2. He recently lost against Raonic in the Brisbane Open. Nadal bagged 88% net points in the match winning 76 points in the first serve. After the match, King of Clay said, ""I am just excited about being back in the final rounds of the most important events. I am here to try to win this."""

src: Na semana passada, a Naked News anunciou que iria aumentar drasticamente seu compromisso de reportar notícias em línguas internacionais, com três novas transmissões. Já comunicando em inglês e japonês, a organização global está lançando programas em espanhol, italiano e coreano para televisão, internet e aparelhos móveis.
mt: Last week, Naked News announced it would dramatically increase its commitment to reporting news in international languages, with three new broadcasts. Already reporting in English and Japanese, the global organization is launching programs in Spanish, Italian and Korean for television, internet and mobile devices.
ref: Last week, Naked News announced that it would dramatically increase its international language mandate to news reporting, with three new broadcasts. Already reporting in English and Japanese, the global organization is launching Spanish, Italian, and Korean-language programs, for television, the web, and mobile devices.

src: "Além do evento de quarta-feira, Carpanedo competiu em duas corridas individuais nos Campeonatos. Sua primeira foi o Slalom, onde recebeu um ""Did Not Finish"" (Não Terminou) na sua primeira prova. 36 de 116 competidores obtiveram o mesmo resultado na corrida. Sua outra corrida, o Slalom Gigante, obteve a décima posição no grupo de mulheres sentadas com um resultado combinado de 4:41.30, 2:11.60 mais lento que a primeira colocada a Australiana Claudia Loesch e 1:09.02 minutos mais lenta que a nona colocada Gyöngyi Dani da Hungria. Quatro esquiadoras do grupo feminino não conseguiram terminar suas corridas, e 45 das 117 esquiadoras no Slalom Gigante não conseguiram se classificar na corrida."
mt: "In addition to Wednesday's event, Carpanedo competed in two individual races at the Championships. Her first was the Slalom, where she received a "Did Not Finish" (DNF) in her first race. 36 of 116 competitors received the same result in the race. Her other race, the Slalom Giant, placed tenth in the women's seated group with a combined result of 4:41.30, 2:11.60 slower than the first-placed Australian Claudia Loesch and 1:09.02 minutes slower than the ninth-placed Hungarian Gyöngyi Dani. Four skiers in the women's group did not finish their races, and 45 of the 117 skiers in the Slalom Giant did not qualify for the race."
ref: Beyond Wednesday's event, Carpanedo competed in two individual races at the Championships. Her first was the Slalom, where she earned a Did Not Finish in her first run. 36 of the 116 competitors had the same result in that race. Her other race, the Giant Slalom, saw her finish in tenth in the women's sitting group with a combined run time of 4:41.30, 2:11.60 minutes slower than first place finisher Austrian Claudia Loesch and 1:09.02 minutes slower than the ninth place finisher Gyöngyi Dani of Hungary. Four skiers in the women's sitting group failed to finish their runs, and 45 of the 117 total skiers in the Giant Slalom failed to rank in the race.

src: Na quarta-feira, a National Basketball Association (NBA) dos Estados Unidos suspendeu sua temporada de basquete profissional devido a preocupações com relação ao COVID-19. A decisão da NBA veio após um jogador do Utah Jazz testar positivo para o COVID-19.
mt: On Wednesday, the National Basketball Association (NBA) of the United States suspended its professional basketball season due to concerns about the COVID-19. The NBA's decision came after a Utah Jazz player tested positive for the COVID-19.
ref: On Wednesday, the United States' National Basketball Association (NBA) suspended its professional basketball season due to concerns regarding COVID-19. The NBA's decision followed a Utah Jazz player testing positive for the COVID-19 virus.

src: O Jogador do Dia de hoje é Alex Ovechkin do Washington Capitals. Ele fez 2 gols e 2 assistências na vitória do time de Washington de 5 a 3 em cima do Atlanta Thrashers. A primeira ajuda de Ovechkin, na noite, foi no gol da vitória do estreante Nicklas Backstrom; seu segundo gol da noite foi seu 60º da temporada, tornando-o o primeiro jogador a marcar 60 ou mais gols em uma temporada desde 1995/96, quando Jaromir Jagr e Mario Lemieux alcançaram esta marca.
mt: Today's Player of the Day is Alex Ovechkin of the Washington Capitals. He scored two goals and two assists in the Capitals' 5-3 win over the Atlanta Thrashers. Ovechkin's first assist of the night was on the game-winning goal by rookie Nicklas Backstrom; his second goal of the night was his 60th of the season, making him the first player to score 60 or more goals in a season since 1995/96, when Jaromir Jagr and Mario Lemieux accomplished this feat.
ref: Today's Player of the Day is Alex Ovechkin of the Washington Capitals. He had 2 goals and 2 assists in Washington's 5-3 win over the Atlanta Thrashers. Ovechkin's first assist of the night was on the game-winning goal by rookie Nicklas Backstrom; his second goal of the night was his 60th of the season, becoming the first player to score 60 or more goals in a season since 1995-96, when Jaromir Jagr and Mario Lemieux each reached that milestone.

src: "O banco Northern Rock teve sua nacionalização em 2008 após a descoberta de que a empresa havia recebido suporte emergencial do governo britânico. A Northern Rock precisou de apoio devido a sua exposição na crise do subprime em 2007. O Virgin Group de Sir Richard Branson teve uma oferta rejeitada pelo banco antes da nacionalização da instituição. No ano de 2010, apesar de ser propriedade do estado, o atual banco comercial Northern Rock plc teve seu desligamento do ‘banco ruim’, Northern Rock (Gestão de Ativos). A Virgin comprou apenas o ""good bank"" da Northern Rock, não a empresa de gestão de ativos."
mt: "The Northern Rock bank was nationalized in 2008 after the discovery that the company had received emergency support from the British government. Northern Rock needed support due to its exposure in the subprime crisis in 2007. The Virgin Group of Sir Richard Branson had an offer rejected by the bank before the nationalization of the institution. In 2010, despite being state-owned, the current commercial bank Northern Rock plc had its disconnection from the 'bad bank', Northern Rock (Asset Management). Virgin only bought the ""good bank"" of Northern Rock, not the asset management company."
ref: The Northern Rock bank had been nationalised in 2008 following the revelation that the company had received emergency support from the UK Government. Northern Rock had required support due to its exposure during the subprime mortgage crisis in 2007. Sir Richard Branson's Virgin Group had a bid for the bank rejected prior to the bank’s nationalisation. In 2010, while nationalised, the current high street bank Northern Rock plc was split from the ‘bad bank’, Northern Rock (Asset Management). Virgin have only purchased the ‘good bank’ of Northern Rock, not the asset management company.

src: A decisão do senhor Rudd de assinar o protocolo do clima de Kyoto isola os Estados Unidos, que será agora a única nação desenvolvida a não ratificar o acordo. O governo anterior, considerado conservador, da Austrália se negou a ratificar Kyoto, afirmando que seria ruim para a economia por sua forte dependência das exportações de carvão, ao mesmo tempo que alguns países como Índia e China não tinham limitações por metas de emissões.
mt: Mr Rudd's decision to sign the Kyoto climate protocol isolates the United States, which will now be the only developed nation not to ratify the agreement. The previous, conservative, Australian government refused to ratify Kyoto, arguing that it would be bad for the economy given its heavy dependence on coal exports, while countries such as India and China were not subject to emissions targets.
ref: Mr. Rudd's decision to sign the Kyoto climate accord isolates the United States, which will now be the only developed nation not to ratify the agreement. Australia's former conservative government refused to ratify Kyoto, saying it would damage the economy with its heavy reliance on coal exports, while countries like India and China were not bound by emissions targets.

src: Os atiradores no teste suplementar de controle de pragas ficaram sob estreita supervisão dos engenheiros florestais enquanto o teste era monitorado e sua eficácia era avaliada. Em uma parceria da NPWS e da Sporting Shooters Association of Australia (NSW) Inc, voluntários qualificados foram recrutados, de acordo com o programa de caça da Sporting Shooters Association. De acordo com Mick O'Flynn, Diretor Interino de Conservação e Patrimônio de Parque do NPWS, os quatro atiradores selecionados para a primeira operação de caça receberam instruções abrangentes de segurança e treinamento.
mt: The shooters in the supplementary pest control test were under close supervision of the forest engineers while the test was monitored and its effectiveness was assessed. In a partnership between NPWS and the Sporting Shooters Association of Australia (NSW) Inc, qualified volunteers were recruited, according to the Sporting Shooters Association's hunting program. According to Mick O'Flynn, NPWS Acting Director of Conservation and Heritage, the four shooters selected for the first hunting operation received comprehensive safety and training instructions.
ref: Shooters in the supplementary pest control trial were to be closely supervised by rangers, as the trial was monitored and its effectiveness evaluated. In a partnership of NPWS and the Sporting Shooters Association of Australia (NSW) Inc, qualified volunteers were recruited, under the Sporting Shooters Association's hunting program. According to Mick O'Flynn, the Acting Director Park Conservation and Heritage with the NPWS, the four shooters selected for the first shooting operation received comprehensive safety and training instruction.

src: "Com base neste fóssil, isso significa que a divisão foi bem anterior ao que as evidências moleculares previram. ""Isso significa que tudo tem de ser colocado de volta"", disse o pesquisador no Serviço de Pesquisa Rift Valley na Etiópia e um coautor do estudo, Berhane Asfaw."
mt: "Based on this fossil, this means that the split was much earlier than what the molecular evidence predicted. ""This means everything has to be put back"", said the researcher at the Rift Valley Research Service in Ethiopia and a co-author of the study, Berhane Asfaw."
ref: """Based on this fossil, that means the split is much earlier than has been anticipated by the molecular evidence. That means everything has to be put back,"" said researcher at the Rift Valley Research Service in Ethiopia and a co-author of the study, Berhane Asfaw."

src: Na apresentação de quinta-feira da Tokyo Game Show, o presidente da Nintendo, Satoru Iwata, mostrou o design do controle do novo console Nintendo Revolution. Semelhante a um controle remoto de televisão, o controlador usa dois sensores colocados perto da televisão do usuário para triangular sua posição no espaço tridimensional. Com isso, os jogadores poderão controlar ações e movimentos no videogame movendo o dispositivo no ar.
mt: On Thursday's Tokyo Game Show presentation, Nintendo president Satoru Iwata showed the design of the new Nintendo Revolution controller. Similar to a television remote control, the controller uses two sensors placed near the user's television to triangulate its position in three-dimensional space. With this, players will be able to control actions and movements in the video game by moving the device in the air.
ref: At Thursday's keynote presentation of the Tokyo Game Show, Nintendo president Satoru Iwata unveiled the controller design for the company's new Nintendo Revolution console. Resembling a television remote, the controller uses two sensors placed near the user's television to triangulate its position in three-dimensional space. This will allow players to control actions and movements in video games by moving the device through the air.

src: Mais cedo, a agência de notícias chinesa Xinhua informou que um avião foi sequestrado. Relatórios posteriores afirmaram que o avião sofreu uma ameaça de bomba e foi desviado de volta para o Afeganistão, pousando em Candaar. Os relatórios iniciais dizem que o avião foi enviado de volta ao Afeganistão, depois de ter um pouso de emergência negado em Ürümqi.
mt: Earlier, the Chinese news agency Xinhua reported that a plane was hijacked. Later reports said the plane was diverted back to Afghanistan after a bomb threat, and landed in Kandahar. Initial reports say the plane was sent back to Afghanistan after an emergency landing was denied in Ürümqi.
ref: Earlier the Chinese news agency Xinhua reported a plane to be hijacked. Later reports then stated the plane received a bomb threat and was diverted back to Afghanistan, landing in Kandahar. The early reports say the plane was diverted back to Afghanistan after being denied an emergency landing in Ürümqi.

src: "Na segunda-feira, Sara Danius, secretária permanente do Comitê Nobel de Literatura da Academia Sueca, anunciou publicamente durante um programa de rádio na Rádio Sveriges na Suécia que o comitê, incapaz de entrar em contato com Bob Dylan diretamente sobre a conquista do Prêmio Nobel de Literatura de 2016, havia abandonado seus esforços para contactá-lo. Danius disse: ""Neste momento não estamos fazendo nada. Tenho ligado e enviado e-mails para o seu colaborador mais próximo e tenho recebido repostas muito amigáveis. Por enquanto, isso certamente é o suficiente."""
mt: "On Monday, Sara Danius, permanent secretary of the Nobel Committee for Literature of the Swedish Academy, announced publicly during a radio program on Swedish Radio in Sweden that the committee, unable to contact Bob Dylan directly about the 2016 Nobel Prize in Literature, had given up its efforts to contact him. Danius said: ""Right now we're not doing anything. I've been calling and sending emails to his closest collaborator and have received very friendly responses. For now, that's certainly enough."""
ref: "On Monday, Sara Danius, permanent secretary of the Nobel Committee for Literature at the Swedish Academy, publicly announced during a radio program on Sveriges Radio in Sweden the committee, unable to reach Bob Dylan directly about winning the 2016 Nobel Prize in Literature, had abandoned its efforts to reach him. Danius said, ""Right now we are doing nothing. I have called and sent emails to his closest collaborator and received very friendly replies. For now, that is certainly enough."""

src: "O presidente norte-americano, George W. Bush, recebeu bem o anúncio. Gordon Johndroe, o porta-voz de Bush, classificou a promessa da Coreia do Norte como ""um importante passo em direção ao objetivo de alcançar a desnuclearização verificável da península coreana."""
mt: "U.S. President George W. Bush welcomed the announcement. Gordon Johndroe, Bush's spokesman, called the North Korean promise "an important step toward the goal of verifiable denuclearization of the Korean peninsula.""
ref: "U.S. President George W. Bush welcomed the announcement. Bush spokesman Gordon Johndroe called North Korea's pledge ""a major step towards the goal of achieving the verifiable denuclearization of the Korean peninsula."""

src: "No ano de 1956, Słania se mudou para a Suécia, onde começou a trabalhar para os Correios Suecos após três anos, e se tornou o seu principal gravador. Ele produziu mais de 1.000 selos para a Suécia e outros 28 países. Seu trabalho é de uma qualidade e detalhe tão reconhecidos que ele é um dos raros famosos entre os filatelistas. Alguns se especializam em colecionar somente seu trabalho. Seu 1.000º selo foi o magnífico ""Os Grandes Feitos dos Reis Suecos"", de David Klöcker Ehrenstrahl, em 2000, que está listado no Livro Guinness dos Recordes. Ele também estava envolvido na gravação de cédulas para muitos países, e exemplos recentes de seu trabalho incluíram os retratos do primeiro-ministro nas novas notas de 5 e 100 dólares canadenses."
mt: "In 1956, Słania moved to Sweden, where he began working for the Swedish Post Office after three years, and became its main engraver. He produced more than 1,000 stamps for Sweden and 28 other countries. His work is of such a quality and detail that he is one of the few famous among philatelists. Some specialize in collecting only his work. His 1,000th stamp was the magnificent "The Great Deeds of the Swedish Kings", by David Klöcker Ehrenstrahl, in 2000, which is listed in the Guinness Book of Records. He was also involved in the engraving of banknotes for many countries, and recent examples of his work included the portraits of the prime minister on the new 5 and 100 Canadian dollar bills."
ref: "In 1956 Słania moved to Sweden, where three years later he began work for the Swedish Post Office and became their chief engraver. He produced over 1,000 stamps for Sweden and 28 other countries. His work is of such recognized quality and detail that he is one of the very few ""household names"" among philatelists. Some specialize in collecting his work alone. His 1,000th stamp was the magnificent ""Great Deeds by Swedish Kings"" by David Klöcker Ehrenstrahl in 2000, which is listed in the Guinness Book of World Records. He was also engaged in engraving banknotes for many countries, recent examples of his work including the Prime Ministerial portraits on the front of the new Canadian $5 and $100 bills."

src: 800 milhas do Sistema de Oleodutos Transalasca foram fechados após o derramamento de milhares de barris de petróleo bruto no sul de Fairbanks, Alasca. Após um teste de rotina no sistema de comando de fogo, ocorreu uma falha de energia, o que causou a abertura das válvulas de alívio e o transbordamento de petróleo bruto perto da estação de bombeamento 9 de Fort Greely. A abertura da válvula permitiu uma liberação de pressão para o sistema, e o petróleo fluiu para um tanque que pode conter 55.000 barris (2,3 milhões de galões). Na manhã de quarta-feira, as saídas de ar do tanque ainda estavam vazando provavelmente por causa da expansão térmica dentro do tanque. Outra área de contenção secundária abaixo dos tanques com capacidade de 104.500 barris ainda não estava completamente cheia.
mt: 800 miles of Trans-Alaska Pipeline System were closed after thousands of barrels of crude oil spilled in south of Fairbanks, Alaska. After a routine test of the fire control system, a power failure occurred, which caused the opening of the relief valves and the overflowing of crude oil near Pump Station 9 of Fort Greely. The opening of the valve allowed a pressure release to the system, and the oil flowed into a tank that could hold 55,000 barrels (2.3 million gallons). On Wednesday morning, the tank's vent outlets were still leaking probably due to thermal expansion inside the tank. Another secondary containment area below the tanks with a capacity of 104,500 barrels was not completely filled yet.
ref: 800 miles of the Trans-Alaska Pipeline System were closed down following a spill of thousands of barrels of crude oil south of Fairbanks, Alaska. A power failure following a routine fire-command system test caused relief valves to open and crude oil overflowed near the Fort Greely pump station 9. The valves opening allowed a pressure release for the system and oil flowed on a pad to a tank that can hold 55,000 barrels (2.3 million gallons). As of Wednesday afternoon, the tank vents were still leaking probably from thermal expansion inside the tank. Another secondary containment area below the tanks capable of holding 104,500 barrels was not yet filled to capacity.

src: O Corpo de Engenheiros dos EUA estimou que 15 cm de chuva podem romper os diques anteriormente danificados. A Ala Nove, que viu enchentes com 6 metros de altura durante o Furacão Katrina, está atualmente na altura da cintura, já que o dique mais próximo estava transbordado. A água está derramando sobre o dique em uma seção de 100 pés de largura.
mt: 15 cm of rain may break the previously damaged levees, the US Corps of Engineers estimated. The Ninth Ward, which saw 6-meter-high floods during Hurricane Katrina, is currently at waist height, as the nearest levee was overtopped. Water is spilling over the levee in a 100-foot-wide section.
ref: The U.S. Corps of Engineers estimated that 6 inches of rainfall could breach the previously damaged levees. The Ninth Ward, which saw flooding as high as 20 feet during Hurricane Katrina, is currently in waist-high water as the nearby levee was overtopped. Water is spilling over the levee in a section 100 feet wide.

src: Hamilton confirmou que o Howard University Hospital declarou o enfermo como tendo uma condição considerada estável. O paciente esteve na Nigéria, onde alguns casos do vírus Ebola ocorreram. O hospital tem seguido o protocolo de controle de infecções, inclusive separando o paciente de outros, para evitar possíveis infecções em outras pessoas.
mt: Hamilton confirmed that the Howard University Hospital declared the patient to be in a condition considered stable. The patient had been in Nigeria, where some cases of the Ebola virus occurred. The hospital has followed infection control protocols, including isolating the patient from others, to prevent possible infections in other people.
ref: Hamilton confirmed Howard University Hospital admitted the patient in stable condition. The patient had been to Nigeria, where some cases of the Ebola virus have occurred. The hospital has followed protocol for infection control, including separating the patient from others to prevent possible infection of others.

src: É possível que os cometas tenham sido uma fonte de distribuição de água à terra junto com a matéria orgânica que pode desenvolver proteínas e tornar a vida possível. Os cientistas esperam entender como os planetas se formam, especialmente como a Terra se formou, já que os cometas colidiram com a Terra há muito tempo.
mt: Comets may have been a source of water delivery to Earth along with organic matter that may develop proteins and make life possible. Scientists hope to understand how planets form, especially how Earth formed, since comets collided with Earth long ago.
ref: Comets may possibly have been a source of water delivery to the earth along with organic matter that can form proteins and support life. Scientists hope to understand how planets form, especially how the Earth formed, since comets collided with the Earth long ago.

src: Embora as autoridades não tenham certeza da credibilidade da ameaça, a Autoridade de Transporte de Maryland realizou o fechamento sob o pedido do FBI. Caminhões basculantes foram utilizados para bloquear as entradas dos túneis, e foram acionados 80 policiais para direcionar os motoristas para os desvios. Ninguém informou nada a respeito de tráfego congestionado no anel viário, que é uma rota alternativa da cidade.
mt: Although authorities are unsure of the credibility of the threat, the Maryland Transportation Authority closed the tunnels at the request of the FBI. Dump trucks were used to block the tunnel entrances, and 80 police officers were called in to direct drivers to detours. No one reported any traffic congestion on the beltway, which is an alternate city route.
ref: While authorities are unsure of the credibility of the threat, the Maryland Transportaion Authority made the closure with the urging of the FBI. Dump trucks were used to block tube entrances and assistance of 80 police were on hand to direct motorists to detours. There were no heavy traffic delays reported on the beltway, the city's alternate route.

src: "O fotógrafo foi transportado para o Ronald Reagan UCLA Medical Center, onde posteriormente faleceu. Segundo informações, ele estava na casa dos 20 anos. Em uma declaração, Bieber disse que, ""embora eu não estivesse presente nem diretamente envolvido neste trágico incidente, meus pensamentos e orações estão com a família da vítima"". Segundo o site de notícias de entretenimento TMZ, o fotógrafo parou seu veículo do outro lado do Boulevard Sepulveda e tentou tirar fotos da parada policial antes de cruzar a estrada e continuar, levando o policial da Patrulha Rodoviária da Califórnia que conduzia a parada do trânsito a ordenar que ele voltasse, duas vezes. Segundo a polícia, é pouco provável que o motorista do veículo que atingiu o fotógrafo seja acusado criminalmente."
mt: "The photographer was transported to the Ronald Reagan UCLA Medical Center, where he later died. According to reports, he was in his early 20s. In a statement, Bieber said, "Although I was not present nor directly involved with this tragic incident, my thoughts and prayers are with the family of the victim." According to the entertainment news site TMZ, the photographer stopped his vehicle on the other side of Sepulveda Boulevard and tried to take pictures of the traffic stop before crossing the street and continuing, leading the California Highway Patrol officer conducting the traffic stop to order him to return, twice. According to police, it is unlikely that the driver of the vehicle that struck the photographer will be criminally charged."
ref: "The photographer was transported to Ronald Reagan UCLA Medical Center, where he subsequently died. He was reportedly aged in his 20s. In a statement, Bieber said ""[w]hile I was not present nor directly involved with this tragic accident, my thoughts and prayers are with the family of the victim."" Entertainment news website TMZ understands the photographer stopped his vehicle on the other side of Sepulveda Boulevard and attempted to take pictures of the police stop before crossing the road and continuing, prompting the California Highway Patrol police officer conducting the traffic stop to order him back across, twice. According to police, the driver of the vehicle that hit the photographer is unlikely to face criminal charges."

src: "Arias teve seu teste positivado para um caso brando do vírus, afirmou o ministro Rodrigo Arias. O estado de saúde do presidente é estável, mas ele irá ficar em casa de forma isolada por diversos dias. “Apesar da febre e da dor de garganta, me sinto bem e em boas condições para fazer o meu trabalho remotamente. ""Espero voltar para todas as minhas funções na segunda-feira"", disse Arias em nota."
mt: "Arias had his test come back positive for a mild case of the virus, said Minister Rodrigo Arias. The president's health is stable, but he will stay home in isolation for several days. "Despite the fever and sore throat, I feel well and in good condition to do my work remotely. "I hope to return to all my functions on Monday," said Arias in a statement."
ref: "Arias tested positive for a mild case of the virus, Presidential Minister Rodrigo Arias said. The president's condition is stable, though he will be isolated at home for several days. ""Apart from the fever and a sore throat, I feel well and in good shape to carry out my work by telecommuting. I expect to return to all my duties on Monday,"" Arias said in a statement."

src: O ciclone tropical Gonu, cujo nome vem de um saco de folhas de palmeira no idioma das Maldivas, atingiu em seu auge ventos contínuos de 240 quilômetros por hora (149 milhas por hora). Hoje, bem no início do dia, os ventos estavam em torno de 83 quilômetros por hora. Espera-se que a força dos ventos continue ficando mais fraca.
mt: Tropical Cyclone Gonu, whose name comes from a sack of palm leaves in the language of the Maldives, peaked with sustained winds of 240 kilometers per hour (149 miles per hour). Today, very early in the day, winds were around 83 kilometers per hour. It is expected that the strength of the winds will continue to weaken.
ref: At its peak, Tropical Cyclone Gonu, named for a bag of palm leaves in the language of the Maldives, reached sustained winds of 240 kilometers an hour (149 miles per hour) . By early today, winds were around 83 km/h, and it was expect to keep weakening.

src: A maré vermelha é causada por uma concentração maior do que a normal de karenia brevis, um organismo marinho unicelular de ocorrência natural. Fatores naturais podem se cruzar para produzir as condições ideais, permitindo que essas algas aumentem dramaticamente em número. As algas produzem uma neurotoxina que pode desativar os nervos em humanos e peixes. Os peixes diversas vezes morrem por causa das altas concentrações da toxina nas águas. Os humanos podem ser afetados pela respiração aquática, carregada para o ar pelo vento e pelas ondas.
mt: Red tide is caused by an abnormally high concentration of karenia brevis, a naturally occurring single-celled marine organism. Natural factors can cross to produce ideal conditions, allowing these algae to dramatically increase in number. The algae produce a neurotoxin that can deactivate nerves in humans and fish. Fish often die from the high concentrations of the toxin in the water. Humans can be affected by aquatic respiration, carried to the air by the wind and waves.
ref: Red tide is caused by a higher than normal concentration of Karenia brevis, a naturally-occurring single-celled marine organism. Natural factors can intersect to produce ideal conditions, allowing this algae to increase in number dramatically. The algae produces a neurotoxin that can disable nerves in both humans and fish. Fish often die because of the high concentrations of the toxin in the waters. Humans can be affected by breathing affected water taken into the air by wind and waves.

src: "Felicia, que já foi uma tempestade de categoria 4 na escala de furacões de Saffir-Simpson, enfraqueceu para uma depressão tropical antes de se dissipar na terça-feira. Seus remanescentes produziram chuvas na maioria das ilhas, embora até o momento nenhum dano ou inundação tenha sido relatado. A precipitação, atingindo 6,34 polegadas em um medidor em Oahu, foi descrita como ""benéfica"". Algumas dos aguaceiros foram acompanhados por trovoadas e frequentes relâmpagos."
mt: "Felicia, which had been a Category 4 hurricane on the Saffir-Simpson scale, weakened to a tropical depression before dissipating on Tuesday. Its remnants produced rain on most of the islands, although no damage or flooding has been reported so far. The precipitation, reaching 6.34 inches at a gauge on Oahu, was described as "beneficial." Some of the showers were accompanied by thunder and frequent lightning."
ref: "Felicia, once a Category 4 storm on the Saffir-Simpson Hurricane Scale, weakened to a tropical depression before dissipating Tuesday. Its remnants produced showers across most of the islands, though as of yet, no damage or flooding has been reported. The precipitation, reaching 6.34 inches at a gauge on Oahu, was described as ""beneficial"". Some of the rainfall was accompanied by thunderstorms and frequent lightning."

src: Piquet Jr. passou por um acidente no Grande Prêmio de Cingapura do ano de 2008 logo após um pit stop de Fernando Alonso, trazendo o carro de segurança. A medida que os carros à frente de Alonso pararam para reabastecer aproveitando o safety car, ele avançou no pelotão para ganhar. Piquet Jr. foi demitido após o Grande Prêmio da Hungria de 2009.
mt: 2008 Singapore Grand Prix: Piquet Jr. crashed after a pit stop by Fernando Alonso, bringing out the safety car. As the cars ahead of Alonso stopped to refuel, he advanced the pack to win. Piquet Jr. was fired after the 2009 Hungarian Grand Prix.
ref: Piquet Jr. crashed in the 2008 Singapore Grand Prix just after an early pit stop for Fernando Alonso, bringing out the safety car. As the cars ahead of Alonso went in for fuel under the safety car, he moved up the pack to take victory. Piquet Jr. was sacked after the 2009 Hungarian Grand Prix.

src: Na quinta-feira, a revista Science publicou um estudo onde relata a descoberta de uma nova espécie de ave nas Ilhas Galápagos, no Equador. Pesquisadores da Universidade de Princeton, nos EUA, e da Universidade de Uppsala, na Suécia, relataram que a nova espécie evoluiu em apenas duas gerações, embora se acreditasse que esse processo demorasse muito mais, devido à reprodução entre um tentilhão endêmico Darwin, Geospiza fortes, e o cacto imigrante tentilhão, Geospiza conirostris.
mt: On Thursday, the journal Science published a study reporting the discovery of a new species of bird in the Galápagos Islands, Ecuador. Researchers from Princeton University in the United States and Uppsala University in Sweden reported that the new species evolved in just two generations, although it was believed that this process would take much longer, due to reproduction between an endemic Darwin's finch, Geospiza fortes, and the immigrant finch, Geospiza conirostris.
ref: A study published on Thursday in the journal Science reported on formation of a new bird species on the Ecuadorean Galápagos Islands. Researchers from Princeton University in the United States and Uppsala University in Sweden reported the new species evolved in just two generations, though this process had been believed to take much longer, due to breeding between an endemic Darwin finch, Geospiza fortes, and the immigrant cactus finch, Geospiza conirostris.

src: Na quinta-feira, a revista Science publicou um estudo onde relata a descoberta de uma nova espécie de ave nas Ilhas Galápagos, no Equador. Pesquisadores da Universidade de Princeton, nos EUA, e da Universidade de Uppsala, na Suécia, relataram que a nova espécie evoluiu em apenas duas gerações, embora se acreditasse que esse processo demorasse muito mais, devido à reprodução entre um tentilhão endêmico Darwin, Geospiza fortes, e o cacto imigrante tentilhão, Geospiza conirostris.
mt: On Thursday, the journal Science published a study reporting the discovery of a new species of bird in the Galápagos Islands, Ecuador. Researchers from Princeton University in the United States and Uppsala University in Sweden reported that the new species evolved in just two generations, although it was believed that this process would take much longer, due to reproduction between an endemic Darwin's finch, Geospiza fortes, and the immigrant finch, Geospiza conirostris.
ref: A study published on Thursday in the journal Science reported on formation of a new bird species on the Ecuadorean Galápagos Islands. Researchers from Princeton University in the United States and Uppsala University in Sweden reported the new species evolved in just two generations, though this process had been believed to take much longer, due to breeding between an endemic Darwin finch, Geospiza fortes, and the immigrant cactus finch, Geospiza conirostris.

src: O evento artístico também é parte de uma campanha da Prefeitura de Bucareste para relançar a imagem da capital romena como uma metrópole criativa e colorida. A cidade será a primeira no sudeste da Europa a receber o CowParade, o maior evento de arte pública do mundo, entre junho e agosto deste ano.
mt: The artistic event is also part of a campaign by the Bucharest City Hall to relaunch the image of the Romanian capital as a creative and colorful metropolis. The city will be the first in Southeast Europe to receive the CowParade, the largest public art event in the world, between June and August this year.

The city will be the first in southeastern Europe to host CowParade, the world's largest public art event, between June and August this year.

src: A aeronave foi dirigida para Irkutsk e estava sendo operada por tropas do interior. Foi estabelecido um inquérito para que seja investigado. O II-76 tem sido um importante componente do exército russo e soviético desde a década de 1970, e já havia sofrido um grave acidente na Rússia no mês passado. No dia 7 de outubro, um motor se desmontou durante a decolagem, sem feridos. A Rússia suspendeu brevemente os Il-76s depois do acidente.
mt: The aircraft was bound for Irkutsk and was operated by the interior troops. An investigation was established to investigate. The Il-76 has been an important component of the Russian and Soviet army since the 1970s, and had already suffered a serious accident in Russia last month. On October 7, an engine fell off during takeoff, without injuries. Russia briefly suspended the Il-76s after the accident.
ref: The aircraft had been headed to Irkutsk and was being operated by interior troops. An inquiry was established to investigate. The Il-76 has been a major component of both the Russian and Soviet military since the 1970s, and had already seen a serious accident in Russia last month. On October 7 an engine separated on takeoff, without injuries. Russia briefly grounded Il-76s after that accident.

src: Antes dos Simpsons, Simon trabalhou em várias atrações em diversos cargos. Durante os anos 1980, ele trabalhou em programas como Taxi, Cheers e The Tracey Ullman Show. No ano de 1989, ele ajudou a criar Os Simpsons com Brooks e Groening, e foi responsável por contratar o primeiro time de escritores do programa. Apesar de ter deixado o programa em 1993, ele manteve o título de produtor-executivo e continuou recebendo dezenas de milhões de dólares a cada temporada em royalties.
mt: Before The Simpsons, Simon worked on various shows in various capacities. During the 1980s, he worked on programs such as Taxi, Cheers and The Tracey Ullman Show. In 1989, he helped create The Simpsons with Brooks and Groening, and was responsible for hiring the first writing team for the show. Despite leaving the show in 1993, he maintained the title of executive producer and continued to receive tens of millions of dollars per season in royalties.
ref: Before The Simpsons Simon had worked on several shows in various positions. During the 1980s he worked on shows such as Taxi, Cheers, and The Tracy Ullman Show. In 1989 he helped create The Simpsons with Brooks and Groening, and was responsible for hiring the show's first writing team. Despite leaving the show in 1993 he kept the title of executive producer, and continued to receive tens of millions of dollars every season in royalties.

src: Fluke escreveu que as investidas de alguns para impedir que as mulheres falassem sobre a saúde delas não teve sucesso. Ela chegou a essa conclusão devido à infinidade de comentários positivos e incentivos enviados a ela por indivíduos do sexo feminino e masculino, pedindo que a medicação contraceptiva seja considerada uma necessidade médica.
mt: Fluke wrote that the attempts of some to prevent women from talking about their health had failed. She came to this conclusion due to the infinity of positive comments and encouragements sent to her by individuals of both sexes, asking that contraceptive medication be considered a medical necessity.
ref: Fluke wrote that the efforts by some to drown out women from speaking out about women’s health were unsuccessful. She came to this conclusion due to the multitude of positive comments and encouragement sent to her by both female and male individuals urging that contraception medication be considered a medical necessity.

src: "“Vai se comportar como água. É transparente como água. Sendo assim, você conseguiria contemplar os seixos ou lamaçais que se encontravam no fundo, caso estivesse próximo à costa. Até onde sabemos, há apenas um corpo planetário que se mostra mais dinâmico do que Titã, e é chamado de Terra"", acrescentou Stofan."
mt: "It's going to behave like water. It's transparent like water. So you could see the rocks or mud flats that were on the bottom if you were close to the shore. As far as we know, there's only one planetary body that's more dynamic than Titan, and it's called Earth," Stofan added.
ref: """It's going to behave like water. It's transparent just the way water is. So if you were standing by the shoreline, you would be able to see down to whatever pebbles or gunk that was on the bottom. As far as we know, there is only one planetary body that displays more dynamism than Titan, and its name is Earth,"" added Stofan."

Até onde sabemos, há apenas um corpo planetário que se mostra mais dinâmico do que Titã, e é chamado de Terra"", acrescentou Stofan."

So if you were standing by the shoreline, you would be able to see down to whatever pebbles or gunk that was on the bottom. As far as we know, there is only one planetary body that displays more dynamism than Titan, and its name is Earth,"" added Stofan."

src: Isso não só confirma que ao menos alguns dos dinossauros tinham penas, uma teoria que já é bem aceita, como também oferece detalhes que não são encontrados com tanta frequência em fósseis, como cores e o arranjo tridimensional. . Cientistas afirmam que a plumagem superior desse animal era castanha e a parte inferior era clara ou carotenoide. A descoberta também concede pistas sobre a evolução das penas nas aves. As penas dos dinossauros, conhecidas como raque, não têm uma haste bem desenvolvida, mas possuem outras características, como farpas e bárbulas. Em vista disso, os pesquisadores concluíram que a raque era possivelmente o resultado de um desenvolvimento evolutivo posterior a essas outras características. A estrutura das penas sugere que não foram utilizadas em voo, mas sim, para se exibir ou regular a temperatura. Os pesquisadores sugeriram que, embora esta seja a cauda de um jovem dinossauro, a amostra tem a plumagem de um adulto, e não a de um filhote. Os pesquisadores sugeriram que, apesar do rabo ser de um dinossauro jovem, a amostra revela uma plumagem adulta, não uma penugem.
mt: This not only confirms that at least some of the dinosaurs had feathers, a theory that is already well accepted, but also offers details that are not found as often in fossils, such as colors and three-dimensional arrangement. Scientists say the upper plumage of this animal was chestnut and the lower part was light or carotenoid. The discovery also provides clues about the evolution of feathers in birds. The feathers of the dinosaurs, known as rachis, do not have a well-developed shaft, but have other characteristics, such as barbs and barbs. Given this, researchers concluded that the rachis was probably the result of a later evolutionary development of these other characteristics. The structure of the feathers suggests that they were not used for flight, but rather for display or temperature regulation. Researchers suggested that, although this is the tail of a young dinosaur, the sample has the plumage of an adult, not a down. Researchers suggested that, although the tail is that of a young dinosaur, the sample reveals an adult plumage, not a down.
ref: This not only confirms that at least some dinosaurs had feathers, a theory already widespread, but provides details fossils generally cannot, such as color and three-dimensional arrangement. . Scientists say this animal's plumage was chestnut-brown on top with a pale or carotenoid-colored underside. The find also grants insight into the evolution of feathers in birds. Because the dinosaur feathers do not have a well-developed shaft, called a rachis, but do have other features of feathers — barbs and barbules — the researchers inferred the rachis was likely a later evolutionary development that these other features. The feathers' structure suggests that they were not used in flight but rather for temperature regulation or display. The researchers suggested that, even though this is the tail of a young dinosaur, the sample shows adult plumage and not a chick's down. The researchers suggested that, even though this is the tail of a young dinosaur, the sample shows adult plumage and not a chick's down.

src: Embora uma vacina experimental pareça ser capaz de reduzir a mortalidade do Ebola, até o momento, nenhuma droga foi claramente considerada como adequada para tratar a infecção existente. Um coquetel de anticorpos, ZMapp, inicialmente se mostrou promissor na área, mas estudos formais indicaram que ele tinha menos benefícios do que buscado na prevenção da morte. ZMapp foi usado como controle, isso quer dizer que os cientistas o usaram como linha de base e o compararam os três outros tratamentos no estudo PALM.
mt: Although an experimental vaccine appears to be able to reduce Ebola mortality, to date, no drug has been clearly deemed adequate to treat existing infection. A cocktail of antibodies, ZMapp, initially appeared promising in the area, but formal studies indicated that it had less benefits than sought in preventing death. ZMapp was used as control, that is, the scientists used it as baseline and compared the three other treatments in the PALM study.
ref: While one experimental vaccine appears able to reduce Ebola mortality, up until now, no drugs have been clearly demonstrated suitable for treating existing infection. One antibody cocktail, ZMapp, initially showed promise in the field, but formal studies indicated it had less benefit than sought in preventing death. In the PALM trial, ZMapp served as a control, meaning scientists used it as a baseline and compared the three other treatments to it.

src: Na segunda-feira, cientistas da Escola de Medicina da Universidade de Stanford anunciaram a invenção de uma nova ferramenta de diagnóstico que pode classificar células por tipo: um minúsculo chip imprimível que pode ser fabricado usando impressoras jato de tinta padrão por possivelmente cerca de um centavo de dólar cada. Os principais pesquisadores dizem que isso pode levar ao diagnóstico precoce de câncer, tuberculose, HIV e malária em pacientes em países de baixa renda, onde expectativas de sobrevivência para doenças como o câncer de mama podem chegar à metade em comparação às expectativas de sobrevivência de países mais ricos.
mt: On Monday, scientists at the Stanford School of Medicine announced the invention of a new diagnostic tool that can classify cells by type: a minuscule printable chip that can be made using standard inkjet printers for possibly as little as a penny each. The lead researchers say this could lead to early diagnosis of cancer, tuberculosis, HIV and malaria in patients in low-income countries, where survival expectations for diseases like breast cancer can reach half compared to survival expectations in richer countries.
ref: On Monday, scientists from the Stanford University School of Medicine announced the invention of a new diagnostic tool that can sort cells by type: a tiny printable chip that can be manufactured using standard inkjet printers for possibly about one U.S. cent each. Lead researchers say this may bring early detection of cancer, tuberculosis, HIV and malaria to patients in low-income countries, where the survival rates for illnesses such as breast cancer can be half those of richer countries.

src: Cientistas descobriram formas de relevo na superfície da lua, denominadas escarpas lobadas, que aparentemente resultam do lentíssimo encolhimento da lua. Essas escarpas foram encontradas por toda a lua e parecem estar minimamente desgastadas, indicando que os eventos geológicos que as criaram eram bastante recentes. Esta teoria contradiz a afirmação de que a lua é completamente desprovida de atividade geológica.
mt: Scientists discovered ways of relief on the surface of the moon, called lobate scarps, that apparently result from the extremely slow shrinking of the moon. These scarps were found all over the moon and appear to be minimally worn, indicating that the geological events that created them were fairly recent. This theory contradicts the assertion that the moon is completely devoid of geological activity.
ref: Scientists have discovered landforms littered across the moon's surface called lobate scarps that have apparently resulted from the moon's shrinking very slowly. These scarps were found all over the moon and appear to be minimally weathered, indicating that the geologic events that created them were fairly recent. This theory contradicts the claim that the moon is completely devoid of geologic activity.

src: "Adekoya tem estado no Tribunal do Xerife de Edimburgo desde então, acusada pelo assassinato de seu filho. Ela está sob custódia enquanto aguarda ser indiciada e julgada, mas qualquer evidência de testemunha ocular pode estar comprometida porque sua imagem foi amplamente divulgada. Esta é uma prática comum em outras partes do Reino Unido, mas a justiça da Escócia atua de maneira distinta, e as cortes consideram a publicação de fotos como algo potencialmente prejudicial. A professora Pamela Ferguson, da Universidade de Dundee, observa que ""os jornalistas parecem ir numa direção perigosa quando publicam fotos, vídeos, etc. de suspeitos"". O Crown Office, que está a cargo geral dos processos, tem indicado ao jornalistas que não serão feitos mais comentários, pelo menos até o indiciamento."
mt: "Adekoya has been in custody at Edinburgh Sheriff Court since then, charged with the murder of her son. She is in custody while awaiting to be indicted and tried, but any eyewitness evidence may be compromised because her image has been widely disseminated. This is a common practice in other parts of the United Kingdom, but Scottish justice acts differently, and the courts consider the publication of photos as something potentially prejudicial. Professor Pamela Ferguson of the University of Dundee observes that ""journalists seem to be going in a dangerous direction when they publish photos, videos, etc. of suspects"". The Crown Office, which is in charge of the proceedings, has indicated to journalists that there will be no further comments, at least until the indictment."
ref: "Adekoya has since been in Edinburgh Sheriff Court charged with murdering her son. She is in custody pending indictment and trial, but any eyewitness evidence may be tainted because her image has been widely published. This is common practice elsewhere in the UK but Scottish justice works differently and courts have viewed publication of photos as potentially prejudicial. Professor Pamela Ferguson of the University of Dundee notes ""journalists do seem to be walking a dangerous line if publishing photos etc of suspects."" Crown Office, which is in overall charge of prosecutions, has indicated to journalists that no further comment will be made at least until indictment."

src: Além do gelo esmagador, as condições climáticas extremas têm dificultado os esforços de resgate. Pittman sugeriu que as condições não melhorariam até a próxima semana. De acordo com Pittman, a quantidade e a espessura do gelo foram as piores dos últimos 15 anos.
mt: In addition to the crushing ice, extreme weather conditions have been hampering rescue efforts. Pittman suggested that conditions would not improve until next week. According to Pittman, the amount and thickness of the ice were the worst in the last 15 years.
ref: In addition to the crushing ice, extreme weather conditions have been hampering rescue efforts. Pittman suggested that conditions wouldn't improve until sometime next week. The amount and thickness of the pack ice, according to Pittman, is the worst it has been for sealers in the past 15 years.

src: "Roberts recusou opinar a respeito do início da vida por se tratar de uma questão fundamental e por classificar o aborto como  uma questão ética, ao alegar que seria antiético trazer à tona potenciais casos. Ele, porém, reiterou sua declaração anterior de que Roe v. Wade era a ""lei estabelecida do país"", enfatizando a importância de decisões consistentes da Suprema Corte. Ele também afirmou que acreditava no direito implícito à privacidade do qual dependia a decisão de Roe."
mt: "Roberts declined to comment on the beginning of life because it was a fundamental question and classified abortion as an ethical issue, by saying it would be unethical to bring up potential cases. He, however, reiterated his previous statement that Roe v. Wade was the "established law of the country", emphasizing the importance of consistent decisions by the Supreme Court. He also stated that he believed in the implicit right to privacy on which the decision of Roe depended."
ref: "Roberts flatly refused to say about when he believes life begins, an important question when considering the ethics of abortion, saying that it would be unethical to comment on the specifics of likely cases. He did, however, reiterate his earlier statement that Roe v. Wade was the ""settled law of the land"", emphasizing the importance of consistent Supreme Court rulings. He also confirmed that he believed in the implied right to privacy which the Roe decision depended upon."

Ele, porém, reiterou sua declaração anterior de que Roe v. Wade era a ""lei estabelecida do país"", enfatizando a importância de decisões consistentes da Suprema Corte. Ele também afirmou que acreditava no direito implícito à privacidade do qual dependia a decisão de Roe."
mt: "Roberts declined to comment on the beginning of life because it was a fundamental question and classified abortion as an ethical issue, by saying it would be unethical to bring up potential cases. He, however, reiterated his previous statement that Roe v. Wade was the "established law of the country", emphasizing the importance of consistent decisions by the Supreme Court. He also stated that he believed in the implicit right to privacy on which the decision of Roe depended."
ref: "Roberts flatly refused to say about when he believes life begins, an important question when considering the ethics of abortion, saying that it would be unethical to comment on the specifics of likely cases. He did, however, reiterate his earlier statement that Roe v. Wade was the ""settled law of the land"", emphasizing the importance of consistent Supreme Court rulings. He also confirmed that he believed in the implied right to privacy which the Roe decision depended upon."

src: Às 8:46 da manhã, um silêncio tomou conta da cidade, sinalizando o exato momento em que o primeiro avião havia atingido o alvo. Dois feixes de luz foram instalados para apontar para o céu durante a noite. Cinco novos arranha-céus estão em construção no local, com uma central de transportes e um parque memorial no meio.
mt: 8:46 a.m. a silence took over the city, signaling the exact moment the first plane had hit its target. Two beams of light were installed to point to the sky during the night. Five new skyscrapers are under construction at the site, with a transportation hub and a memorial park in the middle.
ref: At exactly 8:46 a.m. a hush fell across the city, marking the exact moment the first jet struck its target. Two beams of light have been rigged up to point skywards overnight. Construction is ongoing for five new skyscrapers at the site, with a transportation center and memorial park in the middle.

src: "Todas as entradas de cavernas, que foram nomeadas de ""As Sete Irmãs"", têm pelo menos de 100 a 250 metros (328 a 820 pés) de diâmetro. Imagens de infravermelho mostram que as variações de temperatura da noite pro dia indicam que provavelmente são cavernas. Eles são mais frios do que a superfície circunvizinha durante o dia e mais quentes à noite. ""Seu comportamento térmico não é tão estável quanto as grandes cavernas do planeta Terra, que costumam preservar uma temperatura bem constante, mas é consistente com o fato de serem buracos de grande profundidade no solo"", afirmou Glen Cushing, da Equipe de Astrogeologia do Serviço Geológico dos Estados Unidos (USGS) e da Universidade do Norte do Arizona, localizada em Flagstaff, Arizona."
mt: "All the cave entrances, which were named the 'Seven Sisters,' have at least 100 to 250 meters (328 to 820 feet) in diameter. Infrared images show that the temperature variations from night to day indicate that they are probably caves. They are cooler than the surrounding surface during the day and warmer at night. 'Their thermal behavior is not as stable as the large caves on Earth, which tend to preserve a very constant temperature, but is consistent with them being large holes in the ground,' said Glen Cushing, of the U.S. Geological Survey's Astrogeology Team and the University of Northern Arizona, located in Flagstaff, Arizona."
ref: "All of the cave entrances, which were named ""The Seven Sisters"", are at least 100 to 250 meters (328 to 820 feet) in diameter. Infrared images show that the temperature variations from night and day show that they are likely caves. ""They are cooler than the surrounding surface in the day and warmer at night. Their thermal behavior is not as steady as large caves on Earth that often maintain a fairly constant temperature, but it is consistent with these being deep holes in the ground,"" said Glen Cushing of the United States Geological Survey (USGS) Astrogeology Team and of Northern Arizona University located in Flagstaff, Arizona."

src: O homem supostamente teria dirigido um veículo de três rodas, armado com explosivos, até o meio da multidão. O homem suspeito de detonar a bomba foi detido, após sofrer os ferimentos da explosão. O nome dele ainda é desconhecido pelas autoridades, embora saibam que ele é membro do grupo étnico uigur.
mt: The man is believed to have driven a three-wheeled vehicle, armed with explosives, into the middle of the crowd. The suspect who detonated the bomb was detained after suffering the injuries of the explosion. His name is still unknown to authorities, although they know he is a member of the Uighur ethnic group.
ref: The man allegedly drove a three-wheeled vehicle armed with explosives into a crowd. The man suspected of detonating the bomb was detained, after sustaining injuries from the blast. His name is still unknown to authorities, although they do know he is a member of the Uighur ethnic group.

src: A África do Sul derrotou o All Blacks (Nova Zelândia) em um jogo de rúgbi da Tri Nations no estádio Royal Bafokeng, em Rustemburgo, África do Sul. O placar final foi uma vitória por um ponto, 21 a 20, encerrando a sequência de 15 vitórias consecutivas dos All Blacks. Para o Springboks, acabou uma sequência de cinco derrotas consecutivas. Foi a última partida do All Blacks, que já havia ganho o troféu duas semanas atrás. A partida final da série acontecerá no Ellis Park, em Joanesburgo, na próxima semana, quando os Springboks jogarem contra a Austrália.
mt: South Africa defeated the All Blacks (New Zealand) in a rugby Tri Nations game at the Royal Bafokeng Stadium, Rustenburg, South Africa. The final score was a one-point victory, 21 to 20, ending the All Blacks' streak of 15 consecutive victories. For the Springboks, it ended a streak of five consecutive losses. It was the last game of the All Blacks, who had already won the trophy two weeks ago. The final game of the series will be played next week at Ellis Park, Johannesburg, when the Springboks play against Australia.
ref: South Africa have defeated the All Blacks (New Zealand) in a rugby union Tri Nations match at the Royal Bafokeng Stadium in Rustenburg, South Africa. The final score was a one-point victory, 21 to 20, ending the All Blacks' 15 game winning streak. For the Springboks, it ended a five-match losing streak. It was the final match for the All Blacks, who had already won the trophy two weeks ago. The final match of the series will take place at Ellis Park in Johannesburg next week, when the Springboks play Australia.

src: A estação manteve sua atitude, apesar da perda de um giroscópio no início da missão da estação espacial, até o final da caminhada no espaço. Chiao e Sharipov relataram estar a uma distância segura dos propulsores de ajuste de atitude. O controle de terra russo ativou os jatos e a estação recuperou sua altitude normal.
mt: The station maintained its attitude, despite the loss of a gyroscope at the beginning of the space station's mission, until the end of the spacewalk. Chiao and Sharipov reported being at a safe distance from the attitude thrusters. The Russian ground control activated the jets and the station recovered its normal altitude.
ref: The station maintained its attitude, despite the loss of a gyroscope earlier in the space station mission, until the end of the spacewalk. Chiao and Sharipov reported being a safe distance from the attitude adjustment thrusters. Russian ground control activated the jets and normal attitude of the station was regained.

src: O caso foi instaurado na Virgínia porque é onde fica a sede do provedor líder de serviços de Internet AOL, a empresa que instigou as acusações. É a primeira vez que uma condenação é obtida com base na legislação promulgada em 2003 para coibir mensagens eletrônicas em massa, normalmente conhecidas como “spam”, enviadas de forma não solicitada para o correio eletrônico dos usuários.
mt: The case was filed in Virginia because that's where the headquarters of the leading Internet service provider AOL is located, the company that instigated the charges. It's the first time a conviction has been obtained based on legislation promulgated in 2003 to curb unsolicited mass electronic messages, commonly known as "spam," sent to users' email accounts.
ref: The case was prosecuted in Virginia because it is the home to the leading internet service provider AOL, the company who instigated the charges. This is the first time a conviction has been gained using the legislation enacted in 2003 to curb bulk e-mail, aka spam, from unsolicited distribution into users mailboxes.

src: Não foi emitido nenhum alerta de tsunami e segundo a agência de geofísica de Jacarta não haverá necessidade, já que o tremor não alcançou a magnitude de 6,5. Apesar de não haver ameaça de tsunami, os moradores começaram a entrar em pânico e a abandonar os seus negócios e casas.
mt: No tsunami warning was issued and according to the Jakarta Geophysics Agency there is no need, as the quake did not reach a magnitude of 6.5. Despite there being no tsunami threat, residents began panicking and abandoning their businesses and homes.
ref: No tsunami warning has been issued, and according to the Jakarta geophysics agency, no tsunami warning will be issued because the quake did not meet the magnitude 6.5 requirement. Despite there being no tsunami threat, residents started to panic and began to leave their businesses and homes.

src: Eles descobriram que o sol operava com o mesmo princípios básicos que outras estrelas: a atividade de todas as estrelas no sistema foi determinada por sua luminosidade, sua rotação e nada mais. A luminosidade e rotação são utilizadas em conjunto para definir o número de Rossby de uma estrela, o qual tem relação com o fluxo de plasma. Quanto mais baixo o número de Rossby, menos ativa é a estrela no que se refere às inversões magnéticas.
mt: They found that the sun operated on the same basic principles as other stars: the activity of all stars in the system was determined by their luminosity, their rotation, and nothing more. Luminosity and rotation are used together to define a star's Rossby number, which is related to the plasma flow. The lower the Rossby number, the less active the star is in terms of magnetic reversals.
ref: They found the Sun operated on the same basic principles as other stars: The activity of all stars in the system was found to be driven by their luminosity, their rotation, and nothing else. The luminosity and rotation are used together to determine a star's Rossby number, which is related to plasma flow. The smaller the Rossby number, the less active the star with respect to magnetic reversals.

src: Entre as 1.400 pessoas entrevistadas antes das eleições federais de 2010, o percentual dos que se opõem à mudança na Austrália, para ela se tornar uma república, cresceu 8% desde 2008. A Primeira-Ministra em exercício Julia Gillard afirmou, durante a campanha de 2010 para a eleição nacional, que acreditava que a Austrália se tornaria uma república ao fim do reino da Rainha Elizabeth II. 34 por cento dos que participaram da pesquisa compartilham dessa visão, desejando que a Rainha Elizabeth II seja a última monarca da Austrália. Nos extremos da pesquisa, 29% dos entrevistados acreditam que a Austrália deve se tornar uma república o mais rápido possível, enquanto 31% acreditam que a Austrália nunca deve se tornar uma república.
mt: 1,400 people were interviewed before the 2010 federal election, the percentage of those who oppose the change in Australia, for it to become a republic, grew 8% since 2008. The acting Prime Minister Julia Gillard said during the 2010 campaign for the national election that she believed that Australia would become a republic at the end of the reign of Queen Elizabeth II. 34 percent of those who participated in the survey share this view, wanting Queen Elizabeth II to be the last monarch of Australia. At the extremes of the survey, 29% of the interviewees believe that Australia should become a republic as soon as possible, while 31% believe that Australia should never become a republic.
ref: Out of 1,400 people polled prior to the 2010 federal election, those who oppose Australia becoming a republic grew by 8 per cent since 2008. Caretaker Prime Minister Julia Gillard claimed during the campaign of the 2010 federal election that she believed Australia should become a republic at the end of Queen Elizabeth II's reign. 34 per cent of those in the poll share this view, wanting Queen Elizabeth II to be Australia's last monarch. At the extremes of the poll, 29 per cent of those surveyed believe Australia should become a republic as soon as possible, while 31 per cent believe Australia should never become a republic.

src: Leslie Aun, um porta-voz para a Fundação Komen, disse que a organização adotou uma nova regra que não permite que bolsas ou financiamento sejam concedidos a organizações sob investigação legal. A política de Komen desqualificou a Paternidade Planejada em razão de uma investigação em andamento sobre como a Paternidade Planejada gasta e declara seu dinheiro que está sendo conduzida pelo deputado Cliff Stearns. Stearns, em seu papel como presidente do Subcomitê de Supervisão e Investigações, que está subordinado ao Comitê de Energia e Comércio, está investigando se os impostos estão sendo usados para financiar abortos por meio do Planejamento Familiar.
mt: Leslie Aun, a spokeswoman for the Komen Foundation, said the organization adopted a new rule that disqualifies grants or funding from being awarded to organizations under legal investigation. Komen's policy disqualified Planned Parenthood because of an ongoing investigation into how Planned Parenthood spends and declares its money that is being conducted by Rep. Cliff Stearns. Stearns, in his role as chairman of the Subcommittee on Oversight and Investigations, which is subordinated to the Committee on Energy and Commerce, is investigating whether taxes are being used to fund abortions through Planned Parenthood.
ref: Leslie Aun, a spokesperson for the Komen Foundation, said the organization adopted a new rule that does not allow grants or funding to be awarded to organizations that are under legal investigation. Komen's policy disqualified Planned Parenthood due to a pending investigation on how Planned Parenthood spends and reports its money that is being conducted by Representative Cliff Stearns. Stearns is investigating whether taxes are used to fund abortions through Planned Parenthood in his role as chairman of the Oversight and Investigations Subcommittee, which is under the umbrella of the House Energy and Commerce Committee.
