src: "A Polícia de Madhya Pradesh recuperou o laptop e celular roubados. O vice-inspetor geral D K Arya disse: ""Prendemos cinco pessoas que estupraram a suíça e recuperamos o seu celular e laptop"". Os acusados foram nomeados como Baba Kanjar, Bhutha Kanjar, Rampro Kanjar, Gaza Kanjar e Vishnu Kanjar. O acusado compareceu ao tribunal com o rosto coberto, declarou o superintendente da polícia Chandra Shekhar Solanki."
mt: "The Madhya Pradesh Police recovered the laptop and cell phone stolen. Deputy Inspector General D K Arya said: ""We arrested five people who raped the Swiss and recovered her cell phone and laptop"". The accused were named as Baba Kanjar, Bhutha Kanjar, Rampro Kanjar, Gaza Kanjar and Vishnu Kanjar. The accused appeared in court with his face covered, declared the superintendent of police Chandra Shekhar Solanki."
ref: "The Madhya Pradesh Police recovered the stolen laptop and mobile phone. Deputy Inspector General D K Arya said, ""We have arrested five persons who raped the Swiss woman and recovered her mobile and laptop"". The accused are named as Baba Kanjar, Bhutha Kanjar, Rampro Kanjar, Gaza Kanjar and Vishnu Kanjar. Police superintendent Chandra Shekhar Solanki said the accused appeared in court with covered faces."

src: O ASUS Eee PC, recentemente lançado em todo o mundo com melhoria das funcionalidades e objetivando a redução de custos, se tornou um assunto muito comentado no Mês de TI de 2007 em Taipei. Mas o mercado consumidor de notebooks será radicalmente variado e transformado depois que a ASUS foi premiada no Prêmio Sustentável de Taiwan em 2007 pelo Yuan Executivo da República da China.
mt: The recently released ASUS Eee PC, with improvements in functionality and aiming to reduce costs, has become a very talked about subject in the 2007 IT Month in Taipei. But the consumer notebook market will be radically changed and transformed after ASUS was awarded the 2007 Taiwan Sustainable Award by the Executive Yuan of the Republic of China.
ref: ASUS Eee PC, earlier launched world-wide for cost-saving and functionality factors, became a hot topic in 2007 Taipei IT Month. But the consumer market on laptop computer will be radically varied and changed after ASUS was awarded in the 2007 Taiwan Sustainable Award by Executive Yuan of the Republic of China.

src: O problema começou em 1º de janeiro, quando dúzias de cidadãos locais começaram a reclamar para a Agência de Correios de Obanazawa que eles não haviam recebido seus cartões de Ano Novo habituais e tradicionais. Ontem os correios emitiram um pedido de desculpas aos cidadãos e à mídia depois de descobrirem que o menino havia escondido mais de 600 documentos postais, incluindo 429 cartões postais de Ano Novo que não foram entregues aos destinatários.
mt: The problem began on January 1st, when dozens of local citizens began complaining to the Obanazawa Post Office that they had not received their usual and traditional New Year's cards. Yesterday the post office issued an apology to the citizens and the media after discovering that the boy had hidden more than 600 postal documents, including 429 New Year's cards that were not delivered to the recipients.
ref: The issue started on January 1st when dozens of local residents started complaining to the Obanazawa Post Office that they hadn't received their traditional and regular New Year cards. Yesterday, the post office released their apology to citizens and the media after discovering that the boy had hidden more than 600 postal documents, including 429 New Year postcards, which weren't delivered to their intended recipients.

src: Murray sofreu uma derrota no primeiro set no desempate depois que os dois serviram no set. Del Potro mantinha vantagem inicial no segundo set, porém esse também demandou um desempate depois de chegar a 6-6. Potro recebeu tratamento no ombro, mas conseguiu voltar ao jogo.
mt: Murray lost the first set tiebreaker after both served the set. Del Potro maintained an early advantage in the second set, but that also required a tiebreaker after reaching 6-6. Potro received treatment on the shoulder, but was able to return to the match.
ref: Murray lost the first set in a tie break after both men held each and every serve in the set. Del Potro had the early advantage in the second set, but this too required a tie break after reaching 6-6. Potro received treatment to his shoulder at this point but managed to return to the game.

src: "Acompanhado por esses oficiais, ele garantiu aos cidadãos de Texas que medidas estavam sendo tomadas para proteger a segurança pública. Perry disse especificamente: ""Existem poucos lugares no mundo mais bem equipados para enfrentar o desafio que é apresentado aqui."" O governador afirmou ainda: “Hoje soubemos que algumas crianças em idade escolar tiveram contato com o paciente.” Ele continuou, dizendo: ""Este caso é sério. Pode ter certeza de que nosso sistema está trabalhando tão bem quanto deveria."""
mt: "Accompanied by these officials, he assured the citizens of Texas that measures were being taken to protect public safety. Perry specifically said: ""There are few places in the world better equipped to face the challenge that is presented here."" The governor also said, "Today we learned that some school-aged children had contact with the patient." He continued, saying, "This case is serious. You can be sure that our system is working as well as it should be.""
ref: "Accompanied by those officials, he assured Texas citizens that steps were being taken to protect the public's safety. Perry specifically said, ""There are few places in the world better equipped to meet the challenge that is posed in this case."" The governor also stated, ""Today, we learned that some school aged children have been identified as having had contact with the patient."" He went on to say, ""This case is serious. Rest assured that our system is working as well as it should."""

src: Muito antes do The Daily Show e do The Colbert Report, Heck e Johnson vislumbraram uma publicação que iria parodiar as notícias — e reportagens — quando eram estudantes na Universidade de Washington, em 1988. Desde sua concepção, o The Onion se tornou um verdadeiro império de paródias de notícias, com uma edição impressa, um site que atraiu 5.000.000 visitantes únicos no mês de outubro, anúncios pessoais, uma rede de notícias 24 horas, podcasts e um atlas mundial lançado recentemente, chamado Nosso Mundo Estúpido. Al Gore e o General Tommy Franks casualmente recitam suas manchetes preferidas (a de Gore foi quando o The Onion relatou que ele e Tipper estavam fazendo o melhor sexo da vida deles após sua derrota no Colégio Eleitoral em 2000). Muitos de seus escritores exerceram grande influência nos programas de paródias de notícias de Jon Stewart e Stephen Colbert.
mt: Before The Daily Show and The Colbert Report, Heck and Johnson envisioned a publication that would spoof the news — and reports — when they were students at the University of Washington in 1988. Since its inception, The Onion has become a true empire of news parodies, with a print edition, a website that attracted 5 million unique visitors in October, personal ads, a 24-hour news network, podcasts and a recently released world atlas called Our Dumb World. Al Gore and General Tommy Franks casually recite their favorite headlines (Gore's was when The Onion reported that he and Tipper were having the best sex of their lives after his defeat in the Electoral College in 2000). Many of its writers have had a great influence on the news parody programs of Jon Stewart and Stephen Colbert.
ref: Long before The Daily Show and The Colbert Report, Heck and Johnson envisioned a publication that would parody the news—and news reporting—when they were students at UW in 1988. Since its inception, The Onion has become a veritable news parody empire, with a print edition, a website that drew 5,000,000 unique visitors in the month of October, personal ads, a 24 hour news network, podcasts, and a recently launched world atlas called Our Dumb World. Al Gore and General Tommy Franks casually rattle off their favorite headlines (Gore's was when The Onion reported he and Tipper were having the best sex of their lives after his 2000 Electoral College defeat). Many of their writers have gone on to wield great influence on Jon Stewart and Stephen Colbert's news parody shows.

src: O protesto começou por volta das 11:00 hora local (Tempo Universal Coordenado + 1) em Whitehall, em frente à entrada da residência oficial do Primeiro Ministro, guardada pela polícia de Downing Street. Logo após as 11h, os manifestantes bloquearam o acesso em direção ao norte de Whitehall. Às 11h20, a polícia pediu aos manifestantes que voltassem para a calçada, argumentando que o direito de protestar não poderia atrapalhar o tráfego. Por volta das 11:29, o protesto se encaminhou para Whitehall, passando por Trafalgar Square pela Strand, depois pela Aldwych até Kingsway em direção a Holborn onde o Partido Conservador celebrava seu fórum de primavera  no hotel Grand Connaught Rooms.
mt: The protest began at around 11:00 local time (UTC+1) in Whitehall, outside the official residence of the Prime Minister, guarded by police at Downing Street. Shortly after 11:00, the protesters blocked the access towards the north of Whitehall. At 11:20, the police asked the protesters to return to the pavement, arguing that the right to protest could not hinder traffic. Around 11:29, the protest moved towards Whitehall, passing through Trafalgar Square by the Strand, then by Aldwych towards Kingsway in the direction of Holborn where the Conservative Party celebrated its spring forum at the Grand Connaught Rooms hotel.
ref: The protest started around 11:00 local time (UTC+1) on Whitehall opposite the police-guarded entrance to Downing Street, the Prime Minister's official residence. Just after 11:00, protesters blocked traffic on the northbound carriage in Whitehall. At 11:20, the police asked the protesters to move back on to the pavement, stating that they needed to balance the right to protest with the traffic building up. Around 11:29, the protest moved up Whitehall, past Trafalgar Square, along the Strand, passing by Aldwych and up Kingsway towards Holborn where the Conservative Party were holding their Spring Forum in the Grand Connaught Rooms hotel.

src: """Agora temos ratos de 4 meses de idade que não são diabéticos e que antes eram diabéticos,""complementou. O Médico Ehud Ur, um professor de medicina na Universidade de Dalhousie em Halifax, Nova Escócia, e presidente da divisão clínica e científica da Canadian Diabetes Association disse que o estudo ainda está dando seus primeiros passos. Assim como alguns outros especialistas, ele é cético sobre a cura do diabetes, observando que essas descobertas não têm relevância às pessoas que já têm diabetes tipo 1."
mt: """Now we have rats that are four months old that are not diabetic and were diabetic before,"" he said. Dr. Ehud Ur, a professor of medicine at Dalhousie University in Halifax, Nova Scotia, and president of the clinical and scientific division of the Canadian Diabetes Association said the study is still in its early stages. Like some other experts, he is skeptical about curing diabetes, noting that these findings have no relevance to people who already have type 1 diabetes."
ref: """We now have 4-month-old mice that are non-diabetic that used to be diabetic,"" he added. Dr. Ehud Ur, professor of medicine at Dalhousie University in Halifax, Nova Scotia and chair of the clinical and scientific division of the Canadian Diabetes Association cautioned that the research is still in its early days. Like some other experts, he is skeptical about whether diabetes can be cured, noting that these findings have no relevance to people who already have Type 1 diabetes."

src: O Twin Otter tentou descer na região de Kokoda no dia anterior como o voo CG4684 da compania aérea Airlines PNG, mas tinha abortado uma vez já. Cerca de dez minutos antes da hora prevista para a segunda aterrissagem, desapareceu. O local do acidente foi localizado hoje e é tão inacessível que dois policiais foram deixados na selva para caminharem até a cena e procurar sobreviventes. O mesmo tipo de mau tempo que causou o cancelamento do pouso prejudicou, também, a busca.
mt: The Twin Otter had attempted to land in the Kokoda region the day before as flight CG4684 of the airline Airlines PNG, but had aborted once already. About ten minutes before the scheduled second landing, it disappeared. The crash site was located today and is so inaccessible that two police officers were left in the jungle to walk to the scene and look for survivors. The same bad weather that caused the landing cancellation also hampered the search.
ref: The Twin Otter had been trying to land at Kokoda yesterday as Airlines PNG Flight CG4684, but had aborted once already. About ten minutes before it was due to land from its second approach it disapeared. The crash site was located today and is so inaccessable that two policemen were dropped into the jungle in order to hike to the scene and seek survivors. The search had been hampered by the same bad weather that had caused the aborted landing.

src: "Por sorte, nada me aconteceu, mas eu vi uma cena macabra, quando as pessoas tentavam quebrar as janelas para sair. As pessoas colidiam nos vidros com bancos, mas as janelas eram impossíveis de quebrar. ""Uma das vidraças finalmente quebrou, e eles começaram a sair pela janela"", disse o sobrevivente Franciszek Kowal."
mt: "Luckily, nothing happened to me, but I saw a gruesome scene, when people were trying to break the windows to get out. People were colliding with the glass with benches, but the windows were impossible to break. ""One of the windows finally broke, and they started to get out through the window"", said the survivor Franciszek Kowal."
ref: """Luckily nothing happened to me, but I saw a macabre scene, as people tried to break windows in order to get out. People were hitting the panes with chairs, but the windows were unbreakable. One of the panes finally broke, and they started to get out by the window,"" said survivor Franciszek Kowal."

src: A tempestade tropical Danielle, a quarta tempestade da estação de furações de 2010 no Atlântico a ganhar um nome, se formou na parte leste do Oceano Atlântico. A tempestade, localizada a aproximadamente 4.800 km de Miami, Flórida, tem ventos máximos sustentados de 65 km/h. Os cientistas do Centro Nacional de Furacões preveem que Danielle vai se transformar em um furacão na quarta-feira. Como a tempestade ainda está distante de tocar terra, ainda é difícil prever seu impacto nos EUA e no Caribe.
mt: Tropical Storm Danielle, the fourth named storm of the 2010 Atlantic hurricane season, formed in the eastern Atlantic Ocean. The storm, located about 3,000 miles east of Miami, Florida, has maximum sustained winds of 40 mph. National Hurricane Center scientists predict Danielle will become a hurricane on Wednesday. As the storm is still far from land, it is difficult to predict its impact on the U.S. and the Caribbean.
ref: Tropical Storm Danielle, fourth named storm of the 2010 Atlantic hurricane season, has formed in the eastern Atlantic Ocean. The storm, located approximately 3,000 miles from Miami, Florida, has maximum sustained winds of 40 mph (64 kph). Scientists at the National Hurricane Center predict that Danielle will strengthen to a hurricane by Wednesday. As the storm is far from landfall, it remains difficult to assess potential impact to the United States or Caribbean.

src: O Médico Lee também falou sobre sua apreensão com as informações de que crianças turcas foram infectadas com o vírus da influenza aviária A (H5N1) e não estiveram doentes. Alguns estudos sugerem que a doença deve se tornar menos letal antes que consiga provocar uma epidemia global, ele observou. Existe uma preocupação de que os pacientes possam continuar infectando mais pessoas ao seguirem sua rotina diária caso os sintomas da gripe se mantenham leves.
mt: Dr. Lee also spoke about his concern over reports that Turkish children had been infected with the avian influenza A (H5N1) virus and were not ill. Some studies suggest that the disease must become less deadly before it can cause a global epidemic, he noted. There is concern that patients may continue to infect more people by following their daily routine if the flu symptoms remain mild.
ref: Dr. Lee also expressed his concern about reports that children in Turkey have now become infected with the A(H5N1) avian influenza virus without becoming ill. Some studies suggest that the disease must become less lethal before it can cause a global epidemic, he noted. There is concern that patients may continue to infect more people by going through their daily routines if the flu symptoms remain mild.

src: Na noite de 9 de agosto, o núcleo do tufão Morakot estava a setenta quilômetros da província chinesa de Fujian. Estima-se que o tufão esteja se movendo em direção à China numa velocidade de 11 quilômetros por hora.
mt: On the night of August 9, the Morakot typhoon's core was seventy kilometers from the Chinese province of Fujian. It is estimated that the typhoon is moving towards China at a speed of 11 kilometers per hour.
ref: As of the night of August 9, the eye of Morakot was about seventy kilometres away from the Chinese province of Fujian. The typhoon is estimated to be moving toward China at eleven kph.

src: O presidente norte-americano, George W. Bush, chegou em Singapura na manhã de 16 de novembro, iniciando uma visita de uma semana pela Ásia. Ele foi recebido pelo vice-primeiro-ministro de Cingapura, Wong Kan Seng, e discutiu questões de comércio e terrorismo com o primeiro-ministro de Cingapura,  Lee Hsien Loong. Após uma semana de derrotas na eleição intercalar, Bush falou publicamente sobre a expansão comercial na Ásia.
mt: U.S. President George W. Bush arrived in Singapore on the morning of November 16, beginning a week-long tour of Asia. He was greeted by Singapore's Deputy Prime Minister Wong Kan Seng, and discussed trade and terrorism issues with Singapore's Prime Minister Lee Hsien Loong. After a week of defeats in the midterm elections, Bush spoke publicly about Asian commercial expansion.
ref: U.S. President George W. Bush arrived in Singapore the morning of November 16, beginning a week-long tour of Asia. He was greeted by Singapore's Deputy Prime Minister Wong Kan Seng and discussed trade and terrorism issues with the Singapore Prime Minister Lee Hsien Loong. After a week of losses in the midterm election, Bush told an audience about the expansion of trade in Asia.

src: O presidente norte-americano, George W. Bush, chegou em Singapura na manhã de 16 de novembro, iniciando uma visita de uma semana pela Ásia. Ele foi recebido pelo vice-primeiro-ministro de Cingapura, Wong Kan Seng, e discutiu questões de comércio e terrorismo com o primeiro-ministro de Cingapura,  Lee Hsien Loong. Após uma semana de derrotas na eleição intercalar, Bush falou publicamente sobre a expansão comercial na Ásia.
mt: U.S. President George W. Bush arrived in Singapore on the morning of November 16, beginning a week-long tour of Asia. He was greeted by Singapore's Deputy Prime Minister Wong Kan Seng, and discussed trade and terrorism issues with Singapore's Prime Minister Lee Hsien Loong. After a week of defeats in the midterm elections, Bush spoke publicly about Asian commercial expansion.
ref: U.S. President George W. Bush arrived in Singapore the morning of November 16, beginning a week-long tour of Asia. He was greeted by Singapore's Deputy Prime Minister Wong Kan Seng and discussed trade and terrorism issues with the Singapore Prime Minister Lee Hsien Loong. After a week of losses in the midterm election, Bush told an audience about the expansion of trade in Asia.

src: O anúncio de hoje também estendeu o compromisso do governo feito em março desse ano para financiar transportes extras. Um adicional de 300 eleva o total para 1.300 vagões a serem adquiridos a fim de reduzir a superlotação.
mt: Today's announcement also extended the government's commitment made in March this year to fund extra trains. An additional 300 brings the total to 1,300 carriages to be acquired to reduce overcrowding.
ref: Today's announcement also extended the government's commitment made in March of this year to fund extra carriages. An additional 300 brings the total to 1,300 carriages to be acquired to relieve overcrowding.

src: "Ela afirmou: ""Não há inteligência para sugerir que espera-se um ataque iminente. Porém, a redução do nível de ameaça para grave não significa que a ameaça geral desapareceu."""
mt: "She said: "There is no intelligence to suggest an imminent attack is expected. However, the reduction in threat level to severe does not mean the general threat has disappeared.""
ref: "She said, ""There is no intelligence to suggest that an attack is expected imminently. However, the reduction of the threat level to severe does not mean the overall threat has gone away."""

src: Ontem, Martelly prometeu um novo Conselho Eleitoral Provisório (CEP) de nove membros. É o quinto CEP do Martelly em quatro anos. No mês passado, uma comissão presidencial recomendou a renúncia prévia do CEP como parte de um pacote de medidas para avançar o país rumo a novas eleições. A comissão foi a resposta dada por Martelly aos protestos gerais organizados contra o regime. As manifestações tiveram início em outubro. Os protestos ocasionalmente violentos foram desencadeados pelo fracasso na realização de eleições, algumas previstas desde 2011.
mt: Yesterday, Martelly promised a new Provisional Electoral Council (PEC) of nine members. It is the fifth PEC of Martelly in four years. Last month, a presidential commission recommended the pre-resignation of the PEC as part of a package of measures to advance the country towards new elections. The commission was the response given by Martelly to the general protests organized against the regime. The demonstrations occasionally violent were triggered by the failure to hold elections, some scheduled since 2011.
ref: Martelly swore in a new Provisional Electoral Council (CEP) of nine members yesterday. It is Martelly's fifth CEP in four years. Last month a presidential commission recommended the prior CEP's resignation as part of a package of measures to move the country towards new elections. The commission was Martelly's response to widespread anti-regime protests that started in October. The sometimes-violent protests were triggered by failure to hold elections, some due since 2011.

A comissão foi a resposta dada por Martelly aos protestos gerais organizados contra o regime. As manifestações tiveram início em outubro. Os protestos ocasionalmente violentos foram desencadeados pelo fracasso na realização de eleições, algumas previstas desde 2011.
mt: Yesterday, Martelly promised a new Provisional Electoral Council (PEC) of nine members. It is the fifth PEC of Martelly in four years. Last month, a presidential commission recommended the pre-resignation of the PEC as part of a package of measures to advance the country towards new elections. The commission was the response given by Martelly to the general protests organized against the regime. The demonstrations occasionally violent were triggered by the failure to hold elections, some scheduled since 2011.
ref: Martelly swore in a new Provisional Electoral Council (CEP) of nine members yesterday. It is Martelly's fifth CEP in four years. Last month a presidential commission recommended the prior CEP's resignation as part of a package of measures to move the country towards new elections. The commission was Martelly's response to widespread anti-regime protests that started in October. The sometimes-violent protests were triggered by failure to hold elections, some due since 2011.

src: A equipe de ginástica norte-americana apoia a carta do Comitê Olímpico dos Estados Unidos e concorda com a necessidade absoluta de que a família olímpica promova um ambiente seguro para todos os nossos atletas. Concordamos com a declaração do USOC de que os interesses de nossos atletas e clubes, e seus esportes, podem ser melhor servidos ao avançarmos com mudanças significativas dentro de nossa organização, ao invés da descertificação. A equipe de ginástica norte-americana apoia uma investigação independente que possa esclarecer como um abuso da proporção que foi relatada tão corajosamente pelo sobrevivente, Larry Nassar, pôde acontecer sem que ninguém notasse, e defende qualquer mudança que for necessária e apropriada. A equipe de ginástica norte-americana e o USOC têm o mesmo objetivo — tornar a ginástica e qualquer outro esporte o mais seguro possível para que os atletas possam ir atrás dos seus sonhos em um ambiente de respeito, saudável e positivo.
mt: The United States gymnastics team supports the letter from the United States Olympic Committee and agrees with the absolute necessity that the Olympic family promotes a safe environment for all our athletes. We agree with the USOC's statement that the interests of our athletes and clubs, and their sports, can be better served by advancing significant changes within our organization, rather than decertification. The United States gymnastics team supports an independent investigation that can clarify how an abuse of the proportion that was reported so courageously by the survivor, Larry Nassar, could have happened without anyone noticing, and defends any change that is necessary and appropriate. The United States gymnastics team and the USOC have the same goal — making gymnastics and any other sport as safe as possible so that athletes can pursue their dreams in a respectful, healthy, and positive environment.
ref: USA Gymnastics supports the United States Olympic Committee's letter and accepts the absolute need of the Olympic family to promote a safe environment for all of our athletes. We agree with the USOC's statement that the interests of our athletes and clubs, and their sport, may be better served by moving forward with meaningful change within our organization, rather than decertification. USA Gymnastics supports an independent investigation that may shine light on how abuse of the proportion described so courageously by the survivors of Larry Nassar could have gone undetected for so long and embraces any necessary and appropriate changes. USA Gymnastics and the USOC have the same goal — making the sport of gymnastics, and others, as safe as possible for athletes to follow their dreams in a safe, positive and empowered environment.

src: "A Marinha dos Estados Unidos falou também que estava investigando o acontecimento. Eles também disseram em uma declaração, ""Atualmente, a equipe está trabalhando para determinar o melhor método para extrair o navio de modo seguro"". Um navio de contramedidas de minagem da categoria Avenger, a embarcação seguia para Puerto Princesa em Palawan. Ele foi designado para a Sétima Frota dos Estados Unidos e está atracado em Sasebo, Nagasaki, no Japão."
mt: "The United States Navy also said it was investigating the incident. They also said in a statement, "Currently, the team is working to determine the best method to safely extract the ship." A mine countermeasure ship of the Avenger class, the ship was heading for Puerto Princesa in Palawan. It was assigned to the Seventh Fleet of the United States and is moored in Sasebo, Nagasaki, Japan."
ref: "The US Navy also said they were investigating the incident. They also said in a statement, ""The crew is currently working to determine the best method of safely extracting the ship"". An Avenger class mine countermeasures ship, the ship was on its way to Puerto Princesa in Palawan. It is assigned to the U.S. Navy’s Seventh Fleet and based in Sasebo, Nagasaki in Japan."

src: No domingo à noite, o presidente dos Estados Unidos, Donald Trump, em uma declaração transmitida pelo secretário de imprensa, anunciou que as tropas americanas iriam deixar a Síria. O anúncio foi feito após Trump ter uma conversa por telefone com o presidente turco Recep Tayyip Erdoğan. A Turquia também assumiria a guarda de membros do Estado Islâmico que, como afirma a declaração, as nações europeias se recusaram a repatriar.
mt: On Sunday night, the president of the United States, Donald Trump, in a statement broadcast by the press secretary, announced that American troops would leave Syria. The announcement came after Trump had a phone call with Turkish President Recep Tayyip Erdoğan. Turkey would also take over the guard of members of the Islamic State who, as the statement says, European nations refused to repatriate.
ref: Late on Sunday, the United States President Donald Trump, in a statement delivered via the press secretary, announced US troops would be leaving Syria. The announcement was made after Trump had a phone conversation with Turkish President Recep Tayyip Erdoğan. Turkey would also take over guarding captured ISIS fighters which, the statement said, European nations have refused to repatriate.

src: A coalizão e as tropas afegãs se dirigiram para a área para proteção do local, e outras aeronaves da coalizão foram enviadas para ajudar. O acidente ocorreu em grande altitude no terreno montanhoso, e acredita-se que tenha sido causado por fogo inimigo. Esforços para buscar o local do acidente estão sendo afetados pelo clima ruim e por terrenos hostis.
mt: The coalition and Afghan forces moved to the area for protection of the site, and other coalition aircraft were sent to help. The accident occurred at high altitude in mountainous terrain, and it is believed to have been caused by enemy fire. Efforts to search the accident site are being affected by bad weather and hostile terrain.
ref: Coalition and Afghan troops moved into the area to secure the site and other coalition aircraft have been sent to assist. The crash occurred high up in mountainous terrain, and is believed to have been the result of hostile fire. Efforts to search for the crash site are being met by bad weather and harsh terrain.

src: Após a construção da barragem em 1963, as enchentes sazonais que espalhavam sedimentos por todo o rio pararam. Esse sedimento foi essencial para criar bancos de areia e praias, que serviram de habitat para a vida selvagem. Consequentemente, duas espécies de peixe entraram em extinção, e duas outras passaram a correr risco, como a espécie Gila cypha. Apesar que o nível da água só suba alguns metros depois da enchente, as autoridades esperam que ela seja suficiente para resgatar os bancos de areia erodidos no sentido da correnteza.
mt: After the dam was built in 1963, seasonal floods that spread sediments along the entire river stopped. This sediment was essential to create sandbars and beaches, which served as habitat for wildlife. Consequently, two fish species went extinct, and two others became endangered, such as the Gila cypha species. Although the water level only rises a few meters after the flood, authorities hope that it will be enough to rescue the eroded sandbars in the direction of the current.
ref: After the dam was built in 1963, the seasonal floods that would spread sediment throughout the river were halted. This sediment was necessary for creating sandbars and beaches, which served as wildlife habitats. As a result, two fish species have become extinct, and two others have become endangered, including the humpback chub. Although the water level will only rise a few feet after the flood, officials are hoping it will be enough to restore eroded sandbars downstream.

src: "A embaixada dos Estados Unidos em Nairóbi, no Quênia, emitiu um alerta de que ""extremistas da Somália"" planejam fazer ataques suicidas à bomba no Quênia e na Etiópia. Os Estados Unidos falam que teriam recebido informações de uma fonte que não foi divulgada, que menciona especificamente a utilização de homens-bomba para explodir ""pontos importantes"" na Etiópia e em Quênia."
mt: "The U.S. Embassy in Nairobi, Kenya, issued a warning that ""Somali extremists"" are planning suicide bombings in Kenya and Ethiopia. The United States says it has received information from an undisclosed source that specifically mentions the use of suicide bombers to explode ""important points"" in Ethiopia and Kenya."
ref: "The United States embassy located in Nairobi, Kenya has issued a warning that ""extremists from Somalia"" are planning to launch suicide bomb attacks in Kenya and Ethiopia. The U.S. says it has received information from an undisclosed source that specifically mentions the use of suicide bombers to will blow up ""prominent landmarks"" in Ethiopia and Kenya."

src: "Os famosos advogados gregos, Sakis Kechagioglou e George Nikolakopoulos, foram presos na prisão de Korydallus, em Atenas, pois foram considerados culpados de corrupção. Como consequência disso, houve um grande escândalo na comunidade jurídica grega pela exposição de ações ilegais de juízes, advogados, procuradores e promotores ao longo dos últimos anos. Há algumas semanas, após a informação divulgada pelo jornalista Makis Triantafylopoulos no seu programa popular de TV ""Zougla"", na emissora Alpha TV, Petros Mantouvalos, parlamentar e advogado, abdicou por conta de membros do seu gabinete terem tido envolvimento com suborno ilegal e corrupção. Além disso, o juiz principal Evangelos Kalousis está preso por ser considerado culpado de corrupção e comportamento degenerado."
mt: "The famous Greek lawyers, Sakis Kechagioglou and George Nikolakopoulos, were arrested in the Korydallus prison in Athens, because they were considered guilty of corruption. As a result of this, there was a great scandal in the Greek legal community by the exposure of illegal actions of judges, lawyers, prosecutors and prosecutors over the past years. A few weeks ago, after the information released by journalist Makis Triantafylopoulos in his popular TV show ""Zougla"", in the Alpha TV channel, Petros Mantouvalos, parliamentarian and lawyer, resigned because members of his office had been involved in illegal bribery and corruption. In addition, the main judge Evangelos Kalousis is in prison because he is considered guilty of corruption and degenerate behavior."
ref: "The famous Greek lawyers, Sakis Kechagioglou and George Nikolakopoulos have been imprisoned in the Athens' jail of Korydallus, as they were found guilty of graft and corruption. As a result of this, a big scandal within the Greek legal community has been raised through the exposure of illegal actions that judges, lawyers, solicitors and attorneys have done during the previous years. A few weeks ago, after the information published by the journalist Makis Triantafylopoulos in his popular Television show ""Zoungla"" in Alpha TV, the member of Parliament and lawyer, Petros Mantouvalos was abdicated as members of his office had been involved in illegal graft and corruption. Moreover, top judge Evangelos Kalousis is imprisoned as he found guilty of corruption and degenerate behaviour."

src: Robin Uthappa fez a pontuação mais alta do Innings, 70 corridas em apenas 41 bolas, acertando 11 quatros e 2 seis. Os batedores da ordem média, Sachin Tendulkar e Rahul Dravid, tiveram um bom desempenho e fizeram uma parceria de cem corridas. Mas, depois de não atingir o alvo do capitão, a Índia só conseguiu fazer 36 corridas e perdeu 7 alvos, finalizando as entradas.
mt: Robin Uthappa made the highest score of the innings, 70 runs in just 41 balls, hitting 11 fours and 2 sixes. The batting order's average hitters, Sachin Tendulkar and Rahul Dravid, had a good performance and made a partnership of 100 runs. But, after not reaching the target of the captain, India could only make 36 runs and lost 7 wickets, ending the innings.
ref: Robin Uthappa made the innings highest score, 70 runs in just 41 balls by hitting 11 fours and 2 sixes. Middle order batsmen, Sachin Tendulkar and Rahul Dravid, performed well and made a hundred-run partnership. But, after losing the captain's wicket India only made 36 runs loosing 7 wickets to end the innings.

src: "Adam Cuerden, administrador do Commons, manifestou sua decepção com as exclusões quando conversou com o Wikinews no mês passado. ""Ele [Wales] basicamente mentiu desde o princípio. Primeiro, agindo como se fosse por uma razão legal. Segundo, fingindo que ele estava anos ouvindo, até sua exclusão de artigos"" A irritação da comunidade levou aos esforços atuais para a criação de uma política relativa a conteúdo sexual para o site que hospeda milhões de arquivos de mídia de licença aberta."
mt: "Adam Cuerden, Commons administrator, expressed his disappointment with the exclusions when he spoke with Wikinews last month. 'He [Wales] basically lied from the beginning. First, acting as if it was for a legal reason. Second, pretending he had been listening for years until his exclusions.' Community frustration led to the current efforts to create a policy regarding sexual content for the site that hosts millions of open-license media files."
ref: "Commons Administrator Adam Cuerden expressed his frustration over the deletions when he spoke to Wikinews last month. ""He [Wales] basically lied to us from the start. First, by acting as if this was for legal reasons. Second, by pretending he was listening to us, right up to his art deletion."" The community irritation led to current efforts to draft a policy regarding sexual content for the site which hosts millions of openly-licensed media."

src: "Adam Cuerden, administrador do Commons, manifestou sua decepção com as exclusões quando conversou com o Wikinews no mês passado. ""Ele [Wales] basicamente mentiu desde o princípio. Primeiro, agindo como se fosse por uma razão legal. Segundo, fingindo que ele estava anos ouvindo, até sua exclusão de artigos"" A irritação da comunidade levou aos esforços atuais para a criação de uma política relativa a conteúdo sexual para o site que hospeda milhões de arquivos de mídia de licença aberta."

The community irritation led to current efforts to draft a policy regarding sexual content for the site which hosts millions of openly-licensed media."

src: "Nem todos apoiaram a inclusão das mulheres na categoria. O ganhador da medalha de prata das Olimpíadas de 2004 Amir Khan falou: ""Para falar a verdade, eu penso que as mulheres não tinham que lutar. Essa é a minha opinião."" Apesar de seus comentários, ele declarou que vai apoiar os competidores britânicos nas Olimpíadas de 2012 em Londres."
mt: "Not everyone supported the inclusion of women in the category. The silver medalist at the 2004 Olympics Amir Khan spoke: "To be honest, I think the women should not have fought. That's my opinion." Despite his comments, he declared that he will support the British competitors at the 2012 Olympics in London."
ref: "Not all were supportive of the inclusion of the women’s ranks. 2004 Olympic silver medallist Amir Khan said, ""Deep down I think women shouldn’t fight. That’s my opinion."" Despite his comments he said he will be supporting the British competitors at the 2012 Olympics being held in London."

src: Peter Lenz, um piloto de motociclismo de 13 anos, morreu após se envolver em um acidente no Indianapolis Motor Speedway. Durante sua volta de aquecimento, Lenz caiu de sua bicicleta e foi atingido pelo companheiro de corrida, Xavier Zayat. Ele foi imediatamente atendido pela equipe médica de plantão e transportado para um hospital local, onde morreu mais tarde. Zayat não teve ferimentos no acidente.
mt: 13-year-old motocross pilot Peter Lenz died after being involved in an accident at the Indianapolis Motor Speedway. During his warm-up lap, Lenz fell off his bike and was hit by his fellow racer, Xavier Zayat. He was immediately attended to by the on-site medical team and transported to a local hospital, where he later died. Zayat was not injured in the accident.
ref: Peter Lenz, a 13-year-old motorcycle racer, has died after being involved in a crash at the Indianapolis Motor Speedway. While on his warm-up lap, Lenz fell off his bike, and was then struck by fellow racer Xavier Zayat. He was immediately attended to by the on-track medical staff and transported to a local hospital where he later died. Zayat was unhurt in the accident.

src: Viajar de avião pode ser uma experiência assustadora para pessoas de todas as idades e origens, especialmente se essas pessoas não tiverem viajado de avião antes ou se nunca passaram por um evento traumático. Não é algo para se envergonhar: não é diferente dos medos pessoais e antipatias por outras coisas que muitas pessoas têm. Para alguns, entender algo sobre como funcionam as aeronaves e o que acontece durante um voo pode auxiliar a superar o medo que se baseia no desconhecido ou em não estar no controle.
mt: Traveling by plane can be a frightening experience for people of all ages and backgrounds, especially if those people have never flown before or if they have never gone through a traumatic event. It's not something to be ashamed of: it's no different from personal fears and dislikes of other things that many people have. For some, understanding something about how airplanes work and what happens during a flight can help overcome the fear that is based on the unknown or not being in control.
ref: Travelling by plane can be a scary experience for people of all ages and backgrounds, particularly if they've not flown before or have experienced a traumatic event. It is not something to be ashamed of: it is no different from the personal fears and dislikes of other things that very many people have. For some, understanding something about how aircraft work and what happens during a flight may help to overcome a fear which is based on the unknown or on not being in control.

src: Hoje em dia as viagens raramente são reservadas diretamente com a companhia aérea sem que se faça uma busca e comparação de preços antes. Às vezes, o mesmo voo pode ter preços imensamente diferentes em vários agregadores, e ele paga para comparar resultados de busca e também para verificar o site da própria companhia área antes de fazer a reserva.
mt: Today, few trips are booked directly with the airline without first searching and comparing prices. Sometimes the same flight can have immeasurably different prices on various aggregators, and it pays to compare search results and also to check the airline's own site before making the reservation.
ref: Nowadays air travel is only rarely booked directly through the airline without first searching and comparing prices. Sometimes the same flight can have vastly differing prices at various agregators and it pays to compare search results and to also look at the website of the airline itself before booking.

src: Empresas transportadoras são bem pagas para entregar coisas rapidamente. Frequentemente, o tempo é muito importante no envio de documentos comerciais, mercadorias ou peças sobressalentes para um reparo urgente. Em algumas rotas, as empresas maiores têm seus próprios aviões, mas para outras rotas e empresas menores, houve um problema. Se eles enviaram coisas por frete aéreo, dependendo da rota, pode levar dias para chegar ao desembarque e passar pela alfândega. A única maneira de passar mais rápido era enviar como bagagem despachada. As regulamentações das companhias aéreas não permitem que enviem bagagens sem um passageiro, que é onde você entra.
mt: Shipping companies are well paid to deliver things quickly. Often, time is very important in sending commercial documents, merchandise or spare parts for an urgent repair. On some routes, the larger companies have their own planes, but for other routes and smaller companies, there was a problem. If they sent things by air freight, depending on the route, it could take days to arrive at the destination and pass through customs. The only way to go faster was to send as checked baggage. The airline regulations do not allow them to send baggage without a passenger, which is where you come in.
ref: Courier companies are well paid for delivering things quickly. Frequently, time is very important with business documents, merchandise or spare parts for an urgent repair. On some routes, the larger companies have their own planes, but for other routes and smaller firms there was a problem. If they sent things by air freight, on some routes it may have taken days to get through unloading and customs. The only way to get it through faster was to send it as checked luggage. Airline regulations will not allow them to send luggage without a passenger, which is where you come in.

src: Você deve escolher com cuidado sua empresa aérea com programa de milhagem numa aliança. Por mais que você pense ser intuitivo fazer parte de uma empresa aérea pela qual voa frequentemente, tenha ciência de que as regalias oferecidas, na maioria das vezes, são diferentes e o programa de milhagem pode ser mais vantajoso em uma companhia aérea diversa dentro do mesmo sistema de parceria.
mt: You should choose your airline alliance carefully. While you may think it is intuitive to be part of an airline you fly frequently, be aware that the perks offered are often different and the mileage program may be more advantageous in a different airline within the same alliance.
ref: You should choose your Frequent Flyer airline in an alliance carefully. Although you may think it is intuitive to join the airline you fly most, you should be aware that privileges offered are often different and frequent flyer points may be more generous under a different airline in the same alliance.

src: Beba bebidas alcoólicas de forma moderada. O álcool afeta a todos de maneira diferente, e saber seu limite é muito importante. O consumo excessivo de álcool pode trazer problemas a saúde em longo prazo, incluindo danos ao fígado e até cegueira e morte. Nos casos de consumo de álcool produzido ilegalmente, o risco aumenta. Os destilados ilegais podem conter várias substâncias perigosas, incluindo metanol, que pode cegar ou matar, mesmo em pequenas doses.
mt: Drink alcohol in moderation. Alcohol affects everyone differently, and knowing your limit is very important. Excessive alcohol consumption can bring long-term health problems, including liver damage and even blindness and death. In cases of illegal alcohol production, the risk increases. Illicit distillates may contain several dangerous substances, including methanol, which can blind or kill, even in small doses.
ref: Drink alcoholic drinks with moderation. Alcohol affects everyone differently, and knowing your limit is very important. Possible long term health events from excessive drinking can include liver damage and even blindness and death. The potential danger is increased when consuming illegally produced alcohol. Illegal spirits can contain various dangerous impurities including methanol, which can cause blindness or death even in small doses.

src: O Canal District (traduzido do holandês: Grachtengordel) é o distrito famoso que tem sua origem no século 17 que cerca o Binnenstad de Amsterdã. O distrito todo é designado como um Local de Patrimônio da Humanidade pela UNESCO, pelo seu valor cultural e histórico únicos, e seus valores de propriedade estão entre os mais altos do país.
mt: The Canal District (translated from Dutch: Grachtengordel) is the famous district that has its origins in the 17th century that surrounds the Binnenstad of Amsterdam. The entire district is designated as a World Heritage Site by UNESCO, for its unique cultural and historical value, and its property values are among the highest in the country.
ref: The Canal District (Dutch: Grachtengordel) is the famous 17th-century district surrounding the Binnenstad of Amsterdam. The whole district is designated as a UNESCO World Heritage Site for its unique cultural and historical value, and its property values are among the highest of the country.

src: Phnom Krom, 12 km a sudoeste de Siem Reap. Este templo no topo da colina foi construído no final do século 9, durante o reinado do Rei Yasovarman. A atmosfera sombria do templo e a vista do lago Tonle Sap fazem a subida à colina valer a pena. Uma visita ao local pode ser convenientemente combinada com um passeio de barco até o lago. O Angkor Pass é necessário para entrar no templo, então não se esqueça de trazer seu passaporte quando for para Tonle Sap.
mt: 12 km southwest of Siem Reap. This temple on top of the hill was built at the end of the 9th century, during the reign of King Yasovarman. The somber atmosphere of the temple and the view of the Tonle Sap lake make the climb up the hill worth it. A visit to the site can be conveniently combined with a boat trip to the lake. The Angkor Pass is required to enter the temple, so don't forget to bring your passport when going to Tonle Sap.
ref: Phnom Krom, 12 km southwest of Siem Reap. This hilltop temple was built at the end of the 9th century, during the reign of King Yasovarman. The gloomy atmosphere of the temple and the view over the Tonle Sap lake make the climb to the hill worthwhile. A visit to the site can be conveniently combined with a boat trip to the lake. The Angkor Pass is needed to enter the temple so do not forget to bring your passport along when heading to Tonle Sap.

src: A Antártica é o lugar mais frio do planeta e cerca o Polo Sul. Os passeios turísticos são caros, exigem boa forma física, só podem ser feitos no verão (entre novembro e fevereiro) e são limitados, em grande parte, à Península, às Ilhas e ao Mar de Ross. Alguns milhares de funcionários vivem aqui no verão em aproximadamente 48 bases, principalmente nessas áreas; um pequeno número permanece durante o inverno. O interior da Antártica é um planalto desolado coberto por 2–3 km de gelo. Excursões aéreas especializadas ocasionais vão para o interior, para montanhismo ou chegar ao Polo, que tem uma base grande.
mt: The Antarctic is the coldest place on the planet and surrounds the South Pole. Tourist trips are expensive, require good physical condition, can only be done in the summer (between November and February) and are limited, for the most part, to the Peninsula, the Islands and the Ross Sea. Thousands of employees live here in the summer in approximately 48 bases, mainly in these areas; a small number remains during the winter. The interior of Antarctica is a desolate plateau covered by 2–3 km of ice. Occasional specialized air trips go to the interior, for mountaineering or to reach the Pole, which has a large base.
ref: Antarctica is the coldest place on Earth, and surrounds the South Pole. Tourist visits are costly, demand physical fitness, can only take place in summer Nov-Feb, and are largely limited to the Peninsula, Islands and Ross Sea. A couple of thousand staff live here in summer in some four dozen bases mostly in those areas; a small number stay over winter. Inland Antarctica is a desolate plateau covered by 2-3 km of ice. Occasional specialist air tours go inland, for mountaineering or to reach the Pole, which has a large base.

src: Os observatórios pré-modernos são na maioria das vezes ultrapassados hoje em dia e permanecem em museus ou escolas. Como a poluição luminosa em sua época de ouro não era um problema, eles costumam se encontrar em cidades ou campus de universidades, mais fáceis de chegar do que os construídos mais recentemente. A maioria dos telescópios de pesquisa modernos são instalações enormes em áreas remotas que apresentam condições atmosféricas favoráveis.
mt: Pre-modern observatories are usually surpassed today and remain in museums or schools. As light pollution was not a problem in their heyday, they tend to be found in cities or university campuses, easier to get to than the more recently built ones. Most modern research telescopes are enormous installations in remote areas that present favorable atmospheric conditions.
ref: Pre-modern observatories are usually obsolete today, and remain as museums, or sites of education. As light pollution in their heyday was not the kind of problem it is today, they are usually located in cities or at campuses, easier to reach than those built in modern times. Most modern research telescopes are enormous facilities in remote areas with favorable atmospheric conditions.

src: Há muitas praias, devido a Auckland ficar entre duas enseadas. As mais populares ficam em três áreas. As praias da costa norte (no distrito de North Harbour) são banhadas pelo Oceano Pacífico e vão desde Long Bay ao norte até Devonport ao sul. Elas são quase todas praias arenosas com nado seguro, e muitas têm sombras provenientes das árvores pohutukawa. As praias da Tamaki Drive estão localizadas no Waitemata Harbour, nos sofisticados subúrbios de Mission Bay e St Heliers, na região central de Auckland. Estas são, algumas vezes, praias familiares lotadas com uma grande variedade de lojas ao redor da costa. Nadar é bem seguro.
mt: There are many beaches, due to Auckland being between two harbours. The most popular are in three areas. The North Shore beaches (in the North Harbour district) are washed by the Pacific Ocean and range from Long Bay in the north to Devonport in the south. They are mostly sandy beaches with safe swimming, and many have pohutukawa tree shade. The Tamaki Drive beaches are located on the Waitemata Harbour, in the sophisticated suburbs of Mission Bay and St Heliers, in central Auckland. These are, sometimes, family beaches packed with a wide variety of shops around the coast. Swimming is safe.
ref: There are many beaches, due to Auckland's straddling of two harbours. The most popular ones are in three areas. North Shore beaches (in North Harbour district) are on the Pacific Ocean and stretch from Long Bay in the north to Devonport in the south. They are almost all sandy beaches with safe swimming, and most have shade provided by pohutukawa trees. Tamaki Drive beaches are on the Waitemata Harbour, in the upmarket suburbs of Mission Bay and St Heliers in Central Auckland. These are sometimes-crowded family beaches with a good range of shops lining the shore. Swimming is safe.

src: Recorde-se de que você está basicamente fazendo uma visita a um enorme cemitério, também como um lugar que tem um significado praticamente incalculável para uma porção significativa da população do mundo. Ainda há muitos homens e mulheres vivos que sobreviveram ao seu período aqui e muitos outros tanto judeus e quanto não judeus, cujos entes queridos foram assassinados ou lá trabalharam até a morte. Por favor, trate o local com toda a dignidade, solenidade e respeito que ele merece. Não faça piadas sobre o Holocausto ou nazistas. Não danificar o lugar manchando ou rachando as construções com pichações.
mt: Remember that you are basically visiting a huge cemetery, also as a place that has a meaning practically incalculable to a significant portion of the world's population. There are still many men and women alive who survived their time here and many others both Jews and non-Jews, whose loved ones were killed or worked here until death. Please treat the place with all the dignity, solemnity and respect that it deserves. Do not make jokes about the Holocaust or Nazis. Do not damage the place by staining or cracking the buildings with graffiti.
ref: Please remember that you are essentially visiting a mass grave site, as well as a site that has an almost incalculable meaning to a significant portion of the world's population. There are still many men and women alive who survived their time here, and many more who had loved ones who were murdered or worked to death there, Jews and non-Jews alike. Please treat the site with all of the dignity, solemnity and respect it deserves. Do not make jokes about the Holocaust or Nazis. Do not deface the site by marking or scratching graffiti into structures.

src: Linguagens auxiliares são linguagens artificiais ou construídas criadas com o objetivo de facilitar a comunicação entre pessoas que, de outra maneira, teriam dificuldade de se comunicar. Elas são separadas das línguas francas, que são línguas naturais ou  orgânicas que se tornam dominantes por alguma razão como meio de comunicação entre falantes de outras línguas.
mt: Auxiliary languages are artificial or constructed languages created with the purpose of facilitating communication between people who, otherwise, would have difficulty communicating. They are distinguished from  lingua francas, which are natural or organic languages that become dominant for some reason as a means of communication between speakers of other languages.
ref: Auxiliary languages are artificial or constructed languages created with the intent of facilitating communication between peoples who would otherwise have difficulty communicating. They are separate from lingua francas, which are natural or organic languages that become dominant for one reason or another as means of communication between speakers of other languages.

src: Se você atravessar o norte do Báltico no inverno, confira a localização da cabine, pois ao atravessar o gelo é gerado um ruído terrível para os mais sensíveis. Os cruzeiros em São Petersburgo incluem passeios na cidade. Os passageiros ficam isentos dos requisitos de visto (consulte os termos).
mt: If you cross the Baltic Sea in winter, check the location of the cabin, as crossing the ice generates a terrible noise for the most sensitive. Cruises in St. Petersburg include city tours. Passengers are exempt from visa requirements (see terms).
ref: If crossing the Northern Baltic in winter, check the cabin location, as going through ice causes quite horrible noise for those most affected. Saint Petersburg cruises include time in town. Cruise passengers are exempted from visa requirements (check the terms).

src: Os idiomas oficiais de Barcelona são catalão e espanhol. Quase metade das pessoas preferem falar catalão, grande parte o compreende, e quase todos sabem espanhol Porém, a maioria das placas estão apenas em catalão, porque este é o idioma que foi estabelecido por lei como língua oficial. Ainda assim, o espanhol é amplamente utilizado no transporte público e em outras instalações. Os anúncios regulares no metrô são feitos apenas em catalão, mas interrupções não planejadas são anunciadas por um sistema automatizado em uma ampla variedade de idiomas, incluindo espanhol, inglês, francês, árabe e japonês.
mt: The official languages of Barcelona are Catalan and Spanish. Almost half the people prefer to speak Catalan, most understand it, and almost all speak Spanish However, most signs are only in Catalan, because this is the language that was established by law as the official language. Still, Spanish is widely used in public transport and other facilities. Regular announcements on the metro are made only in Catalan, but unplanned interruptions are announced by an automated system in a wide variety of languages, including Spanish, English, French, Arabic and Japanese.
ref: Barcelona's official languages are Catalan and Spanish. About a half prefer to speak Catalan, a vast majority understands it, and virtually everyone knows Spanish. However, most signs are indicated only in Catalan because it is established by law as the first official language. Yet, Spanish is also widely used in public transport and other facilities. Regular announcements in the Metro are made only in Catalan, but unplanned disruptions are announced by an automated system in a wide variety of languages including Spanish, English, French, Arabic and Japanese.

src: Nos dias de hoje, em países desenvolvidos, o fornecimento de acomodações e café da manhã de luxo foi elevado a algo próximo de uma forma de arte. No topo, as acomodações B&Bs competem principalmente em dois quesitos: cama e café da manhã. Consequentemente, nos mais finos destes estabelecimentos, podem-se encontrar os mais luxuosos artigos de cama, talvez um edredom feito à mão ou uma cama antiga. O café da manhã pode incluir delícias da estação da região ou pratos que são especialidade do anfitrião. O cenário pode ser um velho edifício histórico com móveis velhos, jardins com um bom cuidado e uma piscina para natação.
mt: Today, in developed countries, the provision of luxury accommodations and breakfast has been elevated to something close to an art form. At the top, B&Bs compete mainly in two criteria: bed and breakfast. Consequently, in the most refined of these establishments, the most luxurious bed linens can be found, perhaps a handmade quilt or an antique bed. Breakfast may include delicacies of the season in the region or dishes that are the specialty of the host. The setting may be an old historical building with old furniture, gardens with good care and a pool for swimming.
ref: In developed countries today, providing deluxe bed and breakfasts has been raised to a sort of art-form. At the top end, B&Bs obviously compete mainly on two main things: bedding and breakfast. Accordingly, at the finest such establishments one is apt to find the most luxurious bedding, maybe a handmade quilt or an antique bed. Breakfast may include seasonal delights of the region or the host's speciality dish. The setting might be an historic old building with antique furnishings, manicured grounds and a swimming pool.

src: A cidade de Pequim, na China, será a sede dos Jogos Olímpicos de Inverno em 2022, o que a tornará a primeira cidade a sediar tanto os Jogos Olímpicos de verão quanto os de inverno. Pequim será a sede das cerimônias de abertura e encerramento e dos eventos de gelo coberto. Os demais eventos de esqui ocorrerão na região de esqui de Taizicheng, em Zhangjiakou, a aproximadamente 220 km (cerca de 140 milhas) de Pequim.
mt: Beijing, China, will be the host city for the 2022 Winter Olympics, making it the first city to host both the Summer and Winter Olympics. Beijing will host the opening and closing ceremonies and the ice events. The other skiing events will take place at the ski area of Taizicheng, in Zhangjiakou, about 220 km (140 miles) from Beijing.
ref: The city of Beijing in China will be the host city of the Olympic Winter Games in 2022, which will make it the first city to have hosted both the summer and winter Olympics. Beijing will host the opening and closing ceremonies and the indoor ice events. Other skiing events will be at the Taizicheng ski area in Zhangjiakou, about 220 km (140 miles) from Beijing.

src: A gripe aviária, mais formalmente descrita como a influenza aviária, pode infectar tanto as aves quanto os mamíferos. Menos de mil casos foram relatados em humanos, mas alguns deles foram fatais. A maioria envolve pessoas que trabalham diretamente com aves, mas para os observadores também pode haver algum risco.
mt: Avian influenza, more formally described as avian influenza, can infect both birds and mammals. Less than a thousand cases have been reported in humans, but some of them were fatal. Most involve people who work directly with birds, but for observers there may also be some risk.
ref: Bird flu, or more formally avian influenza, can infect both birds and mammals. Fewer than a thousand cases have ever been reported in humans, but some of them have been fatal. Most have involved people who work with poultry, but there is also some risk to birdwatchers.

src: Os vikings utilizaram os canais da Rússia para chegar ao Mar Negro e ao Mar Cáspio. Partes dessas rotas ainda podem ser usadas. Verifique se são necessárias licenças especiais, que podem ser difíceis de se obter. O Canal Báltico do Mar Branco conecta o Oceano Ártico ao Mar Báltico, via Lago Onega, Lago Ladoga e São Petersburgo, em sua maioria por rios e lagos. O Lago Onega também é conectado ao Volga, então ainda é possível vir do Mar Cáspio pela Rússia.
mt: The Vikings used the Russian channels to reach the Black Sea and the Caspian Sea. Parts of these routes can still be used. Check if special licenses are needed, which can be difficult to obtain. The Baltic Canal of the White Sea connects the Arctic Ocean to the Baltic Sea, via Lake Onega, Lake Ladoga and Saint Petersburg, mostly by rivers and lakes. Lake Onega is also connected to the Volga, so it is still possible to come from the Caspian Sea through Russia.
ref: Vikings used the Russian waterways to get to the Black Sea and Caspian Sea. Parts of these routes can still be used. Check possible need for special permits, which may be difficult to get. The White Sea–Baltic Canal connects the Arctic Ocean to the Baltic Sea, via Lake Onega, Lake Ladoga and Saint Petersburg, mostly by rivers and lakes. Lake Onega is also connected to Volga, so coming from the Caspian Sea through Russia is still possible.

src: Um ponto de controle de imigração costuma ser a primeira parada após desembarcar de um avião, navio ou outro veículo. Em alguns trens transfronteiriços, as inspeções são feitas dentro do trem em movimento e você deve ter um documento de identidade com validez ao entrar em um desses veículos. Em trens noturnos, os passaportes podem ser recolhidos pelo condutor para que você não tenha seu sono interrompido.
mt: A border control point is usually the first stop after disembarking from an airplane, ship or other vehicle. In some cross-border trains, the inspections are done inside the moving train and you must have an identification document with validity to enter one of these vehicles. In night trains, passports may be collected by the conductor so that you do not have your sleep interrupted.
ref: An immigration checkpoint is usually the first stop when disembarking from a plane, a ship, or another vehicle. In some cross-border trains inspections are done on the running train and you should have valid ID with you when boarding one of those trains. On night sleeper trains, passports may be collected by the conductor so that you do not have your sleep interrupted.

src: "Cingapura é geralmente um lugar extremamente seguro e muito fácil de explorar, e você pode comprar quase tudo depois de chegar. Mas estando nos ""trópicos altos"" a apenas alguns graus a norte do Equador, você precisará lidar tando com o calor (constante) quanto com o sol forte (quando o céu está claro, mais raramente)."
mt: "Singapore is generally a very safe and easy place to explore, and you can buy almost anything after you arrive. But being in the "high tropics" just a few degrees north of the Equator, you'll need to deal with both the heat (constant) and the strong sun (when the sky is clear, more rarely)."
ref: "Singapore is generally an extremely safe place to be and very easy to navigate, and you can buy almost anything after arriving. But being placed in the ""high tropics"" just a few degrees north of equator you will need to deal with both heat (always) and strong sun (when the sky is clear, more rarely)."

src: Os doces alemães são muito bons e, na Baviera, são bem caprichados e variados, parecidos com os do vizinho do sul, a Áustria. Os doces com frutas são recorrentes, com maçãs assadas nos doces o ano inteiro, e cerejas e ameixas marcando presença durante o verão. Muitas mercadorias de padarias alemãs também têm amêndoas, avelãs e outras castanhas. Os bolos famosos costumam combinar muito bem com uma xícara de café bem forte. Se você quiser alguns doces pequenos, porém saborosos, experimente o que, dependendo da região, pode se chamar Berliner, Pfannkuchen ou Krapfen.
mt: German pastries are very good and, in Bavaria, are well fussy and varied, similar to those of its southern neighbor, Austria. Fruit cakes are common, with baked apples in cakes all year round, and cherries and plums marking their presence during the summer. Many German bakery products also have almonds, hazelnuts and other nuts. Famous cakes usually go very well with a strong cup of coffee. If you want some small, but tasty, cakes, try what, depending on the region, may be called Berliner, Pfannkuchen or Krapfen.
ref: German pastries are quite good, and in Bavaria, are quite rich and varied, similar to those of their southern neighbor, Austria. Fruit pastries are common, with apples cooked into pastries year round, and cherries and plums making their appearances during the summer. Many German baked goods also feature almonds, hazelnuts, and other tree nuts. Popular cakes often pair particularly well with a cup of strong coffee. If you want some small though rich pastries, try what depending on region are called Berliner, Pfannkuchen or Krapfen.

src: Se quer conhecer o mundo sem gastar muito, seja por necessidade, estilo de vida ou desafio, existem algumas maneiras de fazer isso. Basicamente, eles pertencem a duas categorias: os que trabalham em viagem e os que tentam limitar as despesas. Esta matéria aborda sobre o último. Para aqueles dispostos a sacrificar conforto, tempo e previsibilidade para diminuir as despesas para quase zero, confira o orçamento mínimo para viagens. O conselho presume que os viajantes não roubem, invadam, participem do mercado ilegal, implorem ou explorem outras pessoas em interesse próprio.
mt: If you want to know the world without spending much, whether by necessity, lifestyle or challenge, there are some ways to do that. Basically, they belong to two categories: those who work on the road and those who try to limit expenses. This article deals with the latter. For those willing to sacrifice comfort, time and predictability to reduce expenses to almost zero, check out the minimum budget for travel. The advice assumes that travelers do not steal, invade, participate in the illegal market, implore or exploit other people in their own interest.
ref: If you want to see the world on the cheap, for necessity, lifestyle or challenge, there are some ways to do that. Basically, they fall into two categories: Either work while you travel or try and limit your expenses. This article is focused on the latter. For those willing to sacrifice comfort, time and predictability to push expenses down close to zero, see minimum budget travel. The advice assumes that travellers do not steal, trespass, participate in the illegal market, beg, or otherwise exploit other people for their own gain.

src: O trecho entre Point Marion e Fairmont apresenta as condições mais desafiadoras para motoristas na rodovia Buffalo-Pittsburgh, que passam frequentemente por áreas de sertão isoladas. Se você não tem o costume de dirigir em estradas do interior, tenha juízo: declives íngremes, pistas estreitas e curvas acentuadas são comuns. Os limites de velocidade anunciados são visivelmente mais baixos do que nas seções anteriores e subsequentes - comumente 55-65 km/h - e a estrita obediência a eles é ainda mais importante do que o contrário. Curiosamente, no entanto, o serviço de telefone celular é muito mais forte aqui do que ao longo de muitos outros trechos da rota, como, por exemplo, em Pennsylvania Wilds.
mt: The stretch between Point Marion and Fairmont presents the most challenging driving conditions for motorists on the Buffalo-Pittsburgh Highway, which frequently passes through isolated backcountry areas. If you're not used to driving in the backcountry, use your head: steep grades, narrow lanes, and sharp curves are common. Posted speed limits are visibly lower than in the preceding and subsequent sections - commonly 35-45 mph - and strict adherence to them is even more important than the opposite. Curiously, however, cellular phone service is much stronger here than along many other stretches of the route, such as in Pennsylvania Wilds.
ref: The stretch between Point Marion and Fairmont presents the most challenging driving conditions on the Buffalo-Pittsburgh Highway, passing frequently through isolated backwoods terrain. If you're not used to driving on country roads, keep your wits about you: steep grades, narrow lanes, and sharp curves predominate. Posted speed limits are noticeably lower than in previous and subsequent sections — commonly 35-40 mph (56-64 km/h) — and strict obedience to them is even more important than otherwise. Curiously, though, mobile phone service is much stronger here than along many other stretches of the route, e.g. the Pennsylvania Wilds.

src: O canyoning (ou canionismo) diz respeito a ir até o fundo de um cânion, que pode ser seco ou repleto de água. O canionismo combina elementos de natação, escalada, e salto - mas exige relativamente pouco treino ou forma física dos iniciantes (quando comparado com escalada de rochas, mergulho submarino, ou esqui alpino, por exemplo).
mt: Canyoning (or canyoneering) refers to going to the bottom of a canyon, which may be dry or full of water. Canyoning combines elements of swimming, climbing, and jumping - but requires relatively little training or physical fitness from beginners (when compared to rock climbing, scuba diving, or alpine skiing, for example).
ref: Canyoning (or: canyoneering) is about going in a bottom of a canyon, which is either dry or full of water. Canyoning combines elements from swimming, climbing and jumping--but requires relatively little training or physical shape to get started (compared to rock climbing, scuba diving or alpine skiing, for example).

src: "Entrar no próprio carro e fazer uma viagem grande tem um apelo intrínseco pela simplicidade. Diferente de carros maiores, você provavelmente está familiarizado com dirigir o seu e conhece as limitações dele. Montar barraca em propriedade privada ou em qualquer tipo de cidade pode atrair muita atenção indesejada. Em suma, usar seu carro é uma ótima maneira de fazer uma viagem por terra, mas raramente, por si só, uma maneira de ""acampar"". Acampar no carro é possível caso você tenha uma minivan, SUV, sedã, ou perua com bancos reclináveis."
mt: "Getting into your own car and making a big trip has an intrinsic appeal for its simplicity. Unlike larger cars, you're probably familiar with driving yours and know its limitations. Setting up camp on private property or in any kind of city can attract unwanted attention. In short, using your car is a great way to make a land trip, but rarely, by itself, a way to ""camp"". Camping in your car is possible if you have a minivan, SUV, sedan, or station wagon with reclining seats."
ref: "Getting into your own car and heading off on a long road trip has an intrinsic appeal in its simplicity. Unlike larger vehicles, you are probably already familiar with driving your car and know its limitations. Setting up a tent on private property or in a town of any size can easily attract unwanted attention. In short, using your car is a great way to take a road trip but seldom in itself a way to ""camp"". Car camping is possible if you have a large minivan, SUV, Sedan or Station Wagon with seats that lay down."

src: A moderna cidade de Casablanca foi fundada por pescadores berberes no século 10 a.C., e foi usada pelos fenícios, romanos e merenidas como um porto estratégico chamado de Anfa. Os portugueses a destruíram e reconstruíram com o nome de Casa Branca, apenas para abandoná-la após um terremoto em 1755. O sultão marroquino reconstruiu a cidade como Daru l-Badya, que recebeu o nome de Casablanca pelos comerciantes espanhóis que estabeleceram bases comerciais lá. Casablanca é um dos lugares menos interessantes para se fazer compras no Marrocos como um todo. Perto da parte histórica de Medina é fácil encontrar mercadorias marroquinas tradicionais, como tagines, cerâmica, artigos de couro, narguilés e mais um monte de bugigangas, todas para turistas.
mt: Casablanca was founded by Berber fishermen in the 10th century BC, and was used by the Phoenicians, Romans and Merenidas as a strategic port called Anfa. The Portuguese destroyed and rebuilt it with the name Casa Branca, only to abandon it after an earthquake in 1755. The Moroccan sultan rebuilt the city as Daru l-Badya, which received the name Casablanca from Spanish merchants who established commercial bases there. Casablanca is one of the least interesting places to shop in Morocco as a whole. Near the historic Medina it is easy to find traditional Moroccan goods, such as tagines, ceramics, leather goods, hookahs and more a lot of trinkets, all for tourists.
ref: The modern city of Casablanca was founded by Berber fishermen in the 10th century BCE, and was used by the Phoenicians, Romans, and the Merenids as a strategic port called Anfa. The Portuguese destroyed it and rebuilt it under the name Casa Branca, only to abandon it after an earthquake in 1755. The Moroccan sultan rebuilt the city as Daru l-Badya and it was given the name Casablanca by Spanish traders who established trading bases there. Casablanca is one of the least interesting places to shop in all of Morocco. Around the old Medina it's easy to find places selling traditional Moroccan goods, such as tagines, pottery, leather goods, hookahs, and a whole spectrum of geegaws, but it's all for the tourists.

src: Ao norte, e facilmente acessível, está a romântica e fascinante cidade de Sintra, que ficou famosa entre os estrangeiros após um relato exuberante de seus esplendores feito por Lorde Byron. O Ônibus Scotturb 403 viaja para Sintra frequentemente, com parada no Cabo da Roca. Também ao norte, visite o grande Santuário de Nossa Senhora de Fátima (Relicário), um lugar famoso no mundo todo por aparições marianas.
mt: To the north, and easily accessible, is the romantic and fascinating city of Sintra, which became famous among foreigners after an exuberant report of its splendors made by Lord Byron. The Scotturb bus 403 travels to Sintra frequently, with stop at Cabo da Roca. Also to the north, visit the great Sanctuary of Our Lady of Fatima (Relicary), a place famous all over the world for Marian apparitions.
ref: To the north and within easy reach is the romantic and fascinating town of Sintra and which was made famous to foreigners after a glowing account of its splendours recorded by Lord Byron. Scotturb Bus 403 travels regularly to Sintra, stopping at Cabo da Roca. Also to the north visit the great Sanctuary of Our Lady of Fatima (Shrine), a place of worldwide famous Marian apparitions.

src: Em 1994, a região etnicamente armênia de Nagorno-Karabakh do Azerbaijão travou uma guerra contra os azeris. Com o apoio da Armênia, uma nova república foi criada. No entanto, nenhuma nação estabilizada - nem mesmo a Armênia - a reconheceu oficialmente. Questões diplomáticas que envolvem a região continuam a prejudicar as relações entre a Armênia e o Azerbaijão.
mt: 1994, the ethnically Armenian region of Nagorno-Karabakh of Azerbaijan fought a war against the Azeris. With the support of Armenia, a new republic was created. However, no stabilized nation - not even Armenia - officially recognized it. Diplomatic issues involving the region continue to hinder relations between Armenia and Azerbaijan.
ref: In 1994, the ethnically Armenian Nagorno-Karabakh region of Azerbaijan waged war against the Azeris. With Armenian backing, a new republic was created. However, no established nation - not even Armenia - officially recognizes it. Diplomatic arguments over the region continue to mar relations between Armenia and Azerbaijan.
