src: Um dos pontos fortes de Charlotte, na Carolina do Norte, é que tem uma abundância de opções de alta qualidade para famílias. Moradores de outras regiões costumam citar a relação familiar como o principal motivo para se mudarem para lá, e os visitantes acham a cidade agradável para levar as crianças. Nos últimos 20 anos, a quantidade de opções para crianças em Uptown Charlotte cresceu exponencialmente. Em geral, as famílias de Charlotte não usam táxis, embora elas possam usá-los em determinadas circunstâncias. Há uma cobrança extra para mais que 2 passageiros, então esta opção pode ser mais cara do que o necessário.
mt: One of Charlotte's strong points is that it has an abundance of high-quality options for families. Residents of other regions often cite the family-friendly atmosphere as the main reason for moving there, and visitors find the city pleasant to bring children. Over the last 20 years, the number of options for children in Uptown Charlotte has grown exponentially. In general, Charlotte families don't use taxis, although they may use them in certain circumstances. There is an extra charge for more than 2 passengers, so this option may be more expensive than necessary.
ref: One of strong points of Charlotte, North Carolina, is that it has an abundance of high-quality options for families. Residents from other areas often cite family-friendliness as a primary reason for moving there, and visitors often find the city easy to enjoy with children around. In the past 20 years, the amount of child-friendly options in Uptown Charlotte has grown exponentially. Taxis are not generally used by families in Charlotte, though they can be of some use in certain circumstances. There is a surcharge for having more than 2 passengers, so this option might be more expensive than necessary.

src: Antes dos espanhóis chegarem, no século 16, o norte do Chile estava sob domínio dos incas. Neste período, os indígenas araucanos (mapuches) habitavam o centro e o sul do Chile. Os Mapuches também foram um dos últimos grupos indígenas americanos independentes, a não serem completamente assimilados pelo domínio da língua espanhola, até depois da independência do Chile. Mesmo o Chile tendo declarado independência em 1810 (em meio às guerras napoleônicas que deixaram a Espanha sem um governo central operacional por alguns anos), a vitória decisiva contra a Espanha só foi alcançada em 1818.
mt: Before the Spanish arrived in the 16th century, the north of Chile was under Inca rule. During this period, the Araucanians (Mapuches) inhabited the center and south of Chile. The Mapuches were also one of the last independent indigenous American groups, not being completely assimilated by the Spanish language, until after the independence of Chile. Even Chile having declared independence in 1810 (in the midst of the Napoleonic Wars that left Spain without a functioning central government for several years), the decisive victory against Spain was only achieved in 1818.
ref: Before the Spanish arrived in the 16th century, northern Chile was under Inca rule while the indigenous Araucanians (Mapuche) inhabited central and southern Chile. The Mapuche were also one of the last independent American indigenous groups, that were not fully absorbed into Spanish-speaking rule until after Chile's independence. Although Chile declared independence in 1810 (amid the Napoleonic wars that left Spain without a functioning central government for a couple of years), decisive victory over the Spanish was not achieved until 1818.

src: Cinque Terre, que significa Cinco Terras, abrange as cinco comunas litorâneas de Riomaggiore, Manarola, Corniglia, Vernazza e Monterosso localizadas na região italiana da Ligúria. Eles estão na lista do Patrimônio Mundial da Unesco. Através dos séculos, na paisagem enrugada e clivosa, terraços têm sido construídos, com cuidado, pelas pessoas, indo até os despenhadeiros com vista para o oceano. Parte de seu charme é a notável falta de desenvolvimento. Os caminhos, trens e barcos conectam as aldeias, coisa que os carros não conseguem alcançar de fora.
mt: Cinque Terre, which means Five Lands, encompasses the five coastal villages of Riomaggiore, Manarola, Corniglia, Vernazza and Monterosso located in the Italian region of Liguria. They are on the UNESCO World Heritage List. Through the centuries, in the rugged and cliffy landscape, terraces have been built, with care, by the people, going up to the cliffs with a view of the ocean. Part of their charm is the notable lack of development. The paths, trains and boats connect the villages, something that cars cannot reach from outside.
ref: Cinque Terre, which means Five Lands, comprises the five small coastal villages of Riomaggiore, Manarola, Corniglia, Vernazza and Monterosso located in the Italian region of Liguria. They are listed on the UNESCO World Heritage List. Over the centuries, people have carefully built terraces on the rugged, steep landscape right up to the cliffs that overlook the sea. Part of its charm is the lack of visible corporate development. Paths, trains and boats connect the villages, and cars cannot reach them from the outside.

src: A causa mais comum de acidentes no inverno são estradas escorregadias, calçadas (calçadas) e, principalmente, escadas. No mínimo, você precisa de calçados com sola adequada. Os sapatos de verão são geralmente muito escorregadios no gelo e na neve, até mesmo algumas botas de inverno não são adequadas. O perfil deve ser profundo o suficiente, 5 mm (1/5 polegada) ou mais, e o material deve ser macio o suficiente para baixas temperaturas. Algumas botas têm grampos e existe um acessório com grampos para condições escorregadias, adequado para a maioria dos sapatos e botas, tanto para o salto, como o salto e a sola. Os saltos devem ser baixos e largos. Areia, cascalho ou sal (cloreto de cálcio) são frequentemente espalhados nas estradas ou trilhas para melhorar a tração.
mt: The most common cause of winter accidents are slippery roads, sidewalks (sidewalks) and, especially, stairs. At the very least, you need footwear with suitable soles. Summer shoes are often very slippery on ice and snow, even some winter boots are not suitable. The profile should be deep enough, 5 mm (1/5 inch) or more, and the material should be soft enough for low temperatures. Some boots have cleats and there is a cleat accessory for slippery conditions, suitable for most shoes and boots, both for the heel, as the heel and the sole. Heels should be low and wide. Sand, gravel or salt (calcium chloride) are often spread on roads or trails to improve traction.
ref: The most common cause for accidents in winter is slippery roads, pavements (sidewalks) and especially steps. At a minimum, you need footwear with suitable soles. Summer shoes are usually very slippery on ice and snow, even some winter boots are deficient. The pattern should be deep enough, 5 mm (1/5 inch) or more, and the material soft enough in cold temperatures. Some boots have studs and there is studded add-on equipment for slippery conditions, suitable for most shoes and boots, for the heels or heels and sole. Heels should be low and wide. Sand, gravel or salt (calcium chloride) is often scattered on roads or paths to improve traction.

src: "As Ilhas Cook são um país insular livremente associado à Nova Zelândia, localizado na Polinésia, no meio do Pacífico Sul. É um arquipélago com 15 ilhas espalhadas por 2,2 milhões de quilômetros quadrados de oceano. Com o mesmo fuso horário do Havaí, às vezes as ilhas são consideradas como ""Havaí lá embaixo"". Apesar de menor, me lembra alguns visitantes antigos do Havaí antes do estatuto de Estado, sem todos os hotéis turísticos enormes e outros desenvolvimentos. As Ilhas Cook não têm nenhuma cidade, mas são compostas por 15 ilhas diferentes. As principais são Rarotonga e Aitutaki."
mt: "The Cook Islands are a self-governing associated state of New Zealand, located in the South Pacific Ocean, in Polynesia. It is an archipelago of 15 islands spread out over 2.2 million square kilometers of ocean. With the same time zone as Hawaii, the islands are sometimes considered as "Hawaii down below". Despite being smaller, it reminds me of some old visitors to Hawaii before statehood, without all the huge tourist hotels and other developments. The Cook Islands have no city, but are composed of 15 different islands. The main ones are Rarotonga and Aitutaki."
ref: "The Cook Islands are an island country in free association with New Zealand, located in Polynesia, in the middle of the South Pacific Ocean. It is an archipelago with 15 islands spread out over 2.2 million km2 of ocean. With the same time zone as Hawaii, the islands are sometimes thought of as ""Hawaii down under"". Though smaller, it reminds some elderly visitors of Hawaii before statehood without all the large tourist hotels and other development. The Cook Islands do not have any cities but are composed of 15 different islands. The main ones are Rarotonga and Aitutaki."

ref: "The Cook Islands are an island country in free association with New Zealand, located in Polynesia, in the middle of the South Pacific Ocean. It is an archipelago with 15 islands spread out over 2.2 million km2 of ocean. With the same time zone as Hawaii, the islands are sometimes thought of as ""Hawaii down under"". Though smaller, it reminds some elderly visitors of Hawaii before statehood without all the large tourist hotels and other development. The Cook Islands do not have any cities but are composed of 15 different islands. The main ones are Rarotonga and Aitutaki."

src: As licenças devem ser solicitadas de forma antecedente. Você deve estar com uma autorização para pernoitar em Sirena. Além de área para acampamento, Sirena é o único posto da guarda-florestal que disponibiliza hospedagem em dormitório e refeições quentes. La Leona, San Pedrillo e Los Patos oferecem área para acampamento, mas sem serviço de alimentação. É possível obter licenças para o parque diretamente da Estação Florestal em Puerto Jiménez, mas eles não aceitam cartões de crédito. O Serviço do Parque (MINAE) não emite permissões com mais de um mês de antecedência da chegada prevista. O CafeNet El Sol oferece um serviço de reserva por uma taxa de 30 ou 10 dólares para passeios de um dia; mais detalhes na página do Corcovado.
mt: Permits must be requested in advance. You must have a permit to stay overnight in Sirena. In addition to camping area, Sirena is the only ranger station that offers dormitory accommodation and hot meals. La Leona, San Pedrillo and Los Patos offer camping area, but without food service. It is possible to obtain permits for the park directly from the Forest Station in Puerto Jiménez, but they do not accept credit cards. The Park Service (MINAE) does not issue permits more than one month in advance of the expected arrival. CafeNet El Sol offers a reservation service for a fee of 30 or 10 dollars for one-day tours; more details on the Corcovado page.
ref: Permits must be reserved in advance. You must have a permit to stay overnight at Sirena. Sirena is the only ranger station that offers dormitory lodging and hot meals in addition to camping. La Leona, San Pedrillo, and Los Patos offer only camping with no food service. It is possible to secure park permits directly from the Ranger Station in Puerto Jiménez, but they do not accept credit cards The Park Service (MINAE) does not issue park permits more than one month in advance of anticipated arrival. CafeNet El Sol offers a reservation service for a fee of US$30, or $10 for one-day passes; details on their Corcovado page.

src: Mochilão de esqui: atividade também conhecida como esqui do sertão, esqui de passeio ou esqui-alpinismo. Está relacionado, mas geralmente não envolve turismo para esqui alpino ou montanhismo, os últimos feitos em terreno íngreme e exigindo esquis e botas muito mais rígidos. Pense na rota de esqui como uma rota de caminhada. Em boas condições, você conseguirá cobrir distâncias um pouco maiores do que a pé — mas apenas muito raramente conseguirá as velocidades do esqui cross-country sem uma mochila pesada em pistas preparadas.
mt: Backcountry skiing: also known as ski touring, ski touring or ski-alpinism. It is related, but generally does not involve alpine ski tourism or mountaineering, the latter done in steep terrain and requiring much stiffer skis and boots. Think of ski touring as a hike. In good conditions, you will be able to cover distances a little further than on foot — but only very rarely will you be able to achieve the speeds of cross-country skiing without a heavy backpack on groomed trails.
ref: Backpacking by ski: This activity is also called backcountry ski, ski touring or ski hiking. It is related to but usually not involving alpine style ski touring or mountaineering, the latter ones done in steep terrain and requiring much stiffer skis and boots. Think of the skiing route as of a similar hiking route. In good conditions you will be able to cover somewhat greater distances than walking – but only very seldom you will get the speeds of cross country skiing without a heavy backpack in groomed tracks.

src: O choque de reentrada ocorre antes do que o choque cultural (ocorre menos tempo de lua de mel), dura mais tempo e pode ser mais grave. Os viajantes que se adaptaram facilmente à nova cultura às vezes têm uma dificuldade especial em se reajustar à cultura nativa deles. Ao voltar para casa depois de morar no exterior, você se adaptou à nova cultura e perdeu alguns dos hábitos de sua cultura local. Quando você foi para o exterior pela primeira vez, as pessoas provavelmente foram pacientes e compreensivas, sabendo que viajantes em um novo país precisam se adaptar. As pessoas não imaginam que paciência e compreensão também são fundamentais para os viajantes que estão voltando para casa.
mt: Reentry shock occurs before culture shock (occurs less time of honeymoon), lasts longer and can be more serious. Travelers who adapted easily to the new culture sometimes have a special difficulty in readjusting to their native culture. When you return home after living abroad, you adapted to the new culture and lost some of the habits of your local culture. When you first went abroad, people were probably patient and understanding, knowing that travelers in a new country need to adapt. People don't imagine that patience and understanding are also fundamental for travelers who are returning home.
ref: Re-entry shock comes on sooner than culture shock (there's less of a honeymoon phase), lasts longer, and can be more severe. Travellers who had an easy time adjusting to the new culture sometimes have a particularly hard time readjusting to their native culture. When returning home after living abroad, you've adapted to the new culture and lost some of your habits from your home culture. When you went abroad at first, people were probably patient and understanding, knowing that travellers in a new country need to adapt. People may not anticipate that patience and understanding are also necessary for travellers returning home.

src: Os alces não são inerentemente agressivos, mas se defenderão se perceberem uma ameaça. Quando os alces não são vistos como realmente perigosos, as pessoas podem chegar perto demais e se colocar em risco.
mt: Moose are not inherently aggressive, but will defend themselves if they perceive a threat. When moose are not seen as truly dangerous, people may get too close and put themselves at risk.
ref: Moose (also known as elk) aren't inherently aggressive, but will defend themselves if they perceive a threat. When people don't see moose as potentially dangerous, they may approach too closely and put themselves at risk.

src: No calor do dia, os viajantes podem experimentar miragens que dão a ilusão de água (ou outras coisas). Isso pode ser perigoso se o viajante perseguir a miragem, desperdiçando uma energia preciosa e a água restante. Até o deserto mais quente pode ficar muito frio de noite. A hipotermia é realmente um risco sem roupas que aquecem.
mt: In the heat of the day, travelers may experience mirages that give the illusion of water (or other things). This can be dangerous if the traveler pursues the mirage, wasting precious energy and remaining water. Even the hottest desert can get very cold at night. Hypothermia is really a risk without clothing that warms.
ref: In the heat of the day, travelers can experience mirages that give the illusion of water (or other things). These can be dangerous if the traveler pursue the mirage, wasting precious energy and remaining water. Even the hottest of deserts can become extremely cold at night. Hypothermia is a real risk without warm clothing.

src: A República Dominicana (tanto em português quanto em espanhol) é um país do caribe que ocupa a metade oriental da Ilha de São Domingos, a qual divide com o Haiti Além das praias de areias brancas e das paisagens montanhosas, o país possui a cidade europeia mais antiga das Américas, que agora faz parte de Santo Domingo. A ilha foi habitada pela primeira vez pelos taínos e pelos caribes. Os caribes eram um povo falante da língua aruaque que ali chegou por volta de 10.000 AC. Apenas poucos anos após a chegada dos exploradores europeus, a população de Tainos foi reduzida significativamente pelos conquistadores espanhóis. De acordo com Fray Bartolomé de las Casas (Tratado das Índias), entre 1492 e 1498, os conquistadores espanhóis assassinaram cerca  de 100.000 Taínos.
mt: The Dominican Republic (in both Portuguese and Spanish) is a Caribbean country that occupies the eastern half of the island of Hispaniola, which it shares with Haiti. In addition to its white sand beaches and mountainous landscapes, the country has the oldest European city in the Americas, which is now part of Santo Domingo. The island was first inhabited by the Taínos and the Caribs. The Caribs were a people who spoke the Arawakan language who arrived around 10,000 BC. Only a few years after the arrival of European explorers, the population of Taínos was significantly reduced by Spanish conquistadors. According to Fray Bartolomé de las Casas (Treatise on the Indies), between 1492 and 1498, Spanish conquistadors killed about 100,000 Taínos.
ref: The Dominican Republic (Spanish: República Dominicana) is a Caribbean country that occupies the eastern half of the island of Hispaniola, which it shares with Haiti Besides white sand beaches and mountain landscapes, the country is home to the oldest European city in the Americas, now part of Santo Domingo. The island was first inhabited by the Taínos and Caribes. The Caribes were an Arawakan-speaking people who had arrived around 10,000 BCE. Within a few short years following the arrival of European explorers, the population of Tainos had significantly been reduced by the Spanish conquerors Based on Fray Bartolomé de las Casas (Tratado de las Indias) between 1492 and 1498 the Spanish conquerors killed around 100,000 Taínos.

src: "Os esportes praticados na neve, que incluem esqui e snowboard, são esportes populares que envolvem deslizar por terrenos cobertos de neve com esquis ou uma prancha de snowboard fixada nos pés. Esquiar é uma atividade importante na viagem para muitos entusiastas, ocasionalmente conhecidos como ""ski bums"", que planejam férias inteiras só para esquiarem em um local específico. A ideia de esquiar é muito antiga— pinturas rupestres que retratam esquiadores, datam de 5000 a.C.! O esqui alpino como esporte remete ao século 17 no mínimo e, no ano de 1861, o primeiro time de esqui recreativo foi aberto por cidadãos da Noruega na Austrália."
mt: "Snow sports, which include skiing and snowboarding, are popular sports that involve sliding over snow-covered terrain on skis or a snowboard attached to the feet. Skiing is an important part of the trip for many enthusiasts, occasionally known as "ski bums," who plan entire vacations just to ski at a specific location. The idea of skiing is very old—rock paintings depicting skiers date back to 5000 B.C.! Alpine skiing as a sport dates back to at least the 17th century and, in 1861, the first recreational ski club was opened by citizens of Norway in Australia."
ref: "Downhill snowsports, which include skiing and snowboarding, are popular sports involving sliding down snow-covered terrain with skis or a snowboard attached to your feet. Skiing is a major travelling activity with many enthusiasts, occasionally known as ""ski bums,"" planning entire vacations around skiing at a particular location. The idea of skiing is very old — cave paintings depicting skiers date back as far as 5000 BC! Downhill skiing as a sport goes back to at least the 17th century, and in 1861 the first recreational ski club was opened by Norwegians in Australia."

src: As Ilhas do Leste da África estão no Oceano Índico, a uma distância da costa leste da África. Madagascar é, de longe, o maior, e um continente por si só, quando se trata da vida selvagem. A maioria das ilhas menores são nações independentes, ou associadas à França, e são conhecidas como hotéis de praia luxuosos. Os árabes também levaram para as terras o Islã, que ganhou muita popularidade em Comores e Maiote. A influência europeia e o colonialismo começaram no século XV, quando o explorador português Vasco da Gama encontrou a Rota do Cabo da Europa à Índia.
mt: The East African Islands are in the Indian Ocean, off the east coast of Africa. Madagascar is, by far, the largest, and a continent in its own right, when it comes to wildlife. Most of the smaller islands are independent nations, or associated with France, and are known as luxury beach resorts. The Arabs also brought Islam to the lands, which gained much popularity in Comoros and Mayotte. European influence and colonialism began in the 15th century, when Portuguese explorer Vasco da Gama found the Cape Route of Europe to India.
ref: The East African Islands are in the Indian Ocean off the eastern coast of Africa. Madagascar is by far the biggest, and a continent on its own when it comes to wildlife. Most of the smaller islands are independent nations, or associated with France, and known as luxury beach resorts. The Arabs also brought Islam to the lands, and it took in a big way in the Comoros and Mayotte. European influence and colonialism began in the 15th century, as Portuguese explorer Vasco da Gama found the Cape Route from Europe to India.

src: Há uma tradição de passar a noite de Páscoa acordado em algum lugar aberto para ver o nascer do Sol. Existem, é claro, explicações teológicas cristãs para essa tradição, mas pode se tratar de um ritual pré-cristão da Primavera e da fertilidade. As igrejas mais tradicionais costumam realizar uma vigília de Páscoa no sábado à noite durante o fim de semana da Páscoa. As congregações muitas vezes quebram a celebração à meia-noite para celebrar a ressurreição de Cristo.
mt: There is a tradition of staying up all night on Easter Sunday to see the sunrise. There are, of course, theological Christian explanations for this tradition, but it may be a pre-Christian ritual of Spring and fertility. More traditional churches often hold an Easter vigil on Saturday night during the Easter weekend. Congregations often break up the celebration at midnight to celebrate the resurrection of Christ.
ref: There's a tradition to pass the Easter night awake at some exposed point to see the sunrise. There are of course Christian theological explanations for this tradition, but it may well be a pre-Christian Spring and Fertility ritual. More traditional churches often hold an Easter Vigil on Saturday night during the Easter weekend, with the congregations often breaking into celebration at the stroke of midnight to celebrate Christ's resurrection.

src: O Equador exige que cidadãos cubanos recebam uma carta-convite antes de entrar no país através de aeroportos internacionais ou pontos de entrada fronteiriços. Essa carta precisa ser legalizada pelo Ministério das Relações Exteriores do Equador, e atender a alguns requisitos. Estas condições são criados para fornecer um fluxo de migração organizado entre ambas as nações. Cidadãos cubanos que são detentores de Green Cards americanos devem visitar um consulado equatoriano para obter uma dispensa dessa exigência. Seu passaporte deve estar válido por pelo menos 6 meses das suas datas de viagem. É necessária uma passagem de ida ou de ida e volta para comprovar o seu tempo de permanência.
mt: Ecuador requires Cuban citizens to receive an invitation letter before entering the country through international airports or border entry points. This letter must be legalized by the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of Ecuador, and meet some requirements. These conditions are created to provide an organized migration flow between both nations. Cuban citizens who are holders of American Green Cards must visit an Ecuadorian consulate to obtain an exemption from this requirement. Your passport must be valid for at least 6 months of your travel dates. A round-trip ticket is required to prove your time of stay.
ref: Ecuador requires that Cuban citizens receive an invitation letter prior to entering Ecuador through international airports or frontier admission points. This letter must be legalized by the Ecuadorian Ministry of Foreign Affairs, and comply with certain requirements. These requirements are designed to provide an organized migratory flow between both countries. Cuban citizens who are US green card holders should visit an Ecuadorian Consulate to obtain an exemption to this requirement. Your passport must be valid for at least 6 months beyond your travel dates. A round/onward trip ticket is needed to prove the length of your stay.

This letter must be legalized by the Ecuadorian Ministry of Foreign Affairs, and comply with certain requirements. These requirements are designed to provide an organized migratory flow between both countries. Cuban citizens who are US green card holders should visit an Ecuadorian Consulate to obtain an exemption to this requirement. Your passport must be valid for at least 6 months beyond your travel dates. A round/onward trip ticket is needed to prove the length of your stay.

src: Os óculos podem ser mais baratos num país estrangeiro, especialmente em países de renda baixa, já que os custos de trabalho são menores. Considere realizar um exame de vista em domicílio, principalmente no caso de o seguro cobri-lo, e leve a receita para ser arquivada em um lugar diverso. Armações de marcas de luxo disponíveis nestas áreas podem apresentar dois problemas; algumas podem ser imitações, e as reais importadas podem ser mais caras do que em seu país.
mt: Glasses may be cheaper in another country, especially in low-income countries, as labor costs are lower. Consider having an eye exam at home, especially if your insurance covers it, and take the prescription to be filed in a different place. Luxury brand frames available in these areas may present two problems; some may be fakes, and the real imported ones may be more expensive than in your country.
ref: Eyeglasses can be cheaper in a foreign country, especially in low-income countries where labour costs are lower. Consider getting an eye exam at home, especially if insurance covers it, and bringing the prescription along to be filed elsewhere. High-end brand-name frames available in such areas may have two problems; some may be knock-offs, and the real imported ones may be more expensive than at home.

src: A moeda oficial de Falklands, é a libra das Malvinas (FKP), cujo valor é equivalente a uma libra britânica (GBP). O dinheiro pode ser trocado no único banco das ilhas que está localizado em Stanley, em frente à loja FIC West. A libra esterlina é geralmente aceita em qualquer lugar nas ilhas e em Stanley são aceitos cartões de crédito e dólares americanos. Em ilhas remotas, é pouco provável que cartões de crédito sejam aceitos, embora moedas britânicas e americanas possam ser recebidas. Por favor, informe-se com os proprietários com antecedência para saber qual é o método de pagamento que eles aceitam. É praticamente impossível mudar a moeda corrente das Malvinas fora das ilhas, portanto, troque o dinheiro antes de deixar as ilhas.
mt: The official currency of the Falklands is the Falkland pound (FKP), which is equivalent to the British pound (GBP). Money can be exchanged at the only bank on the islands, which is located in Stanley, in front of the FIC West store. The British pound is generally accepted anywhere on the islands and British and American pounds are accepted in Stanley, as are credit cards and American dollars. In remote islands, it is unlikely that credit cards will be accepted, although British and American coins may be received. Please check with the owners in advance to find out which payment method they accept. It is almost impossible to change the current currency of the Falklands outside the islands, so exchange your money before leaving the islands.
ref: The official Falklands currency is the Falkland pound (FKP) whose value is set equivalent to that of one British pound (GBP). Money can be exchanged at the only bank in the islands which is located in Stanley across from the FIC West store. British pounds will generally be accepted anywhere in the islands and within Stanley credit cards and United States dollars are also often accepted. On the outlying islands credit cards will probably not be accepted, although British and United States currency may be taken; check with the owners in advance to determine what is an acceptable payment method. It is nearly impossible to exchange Falklands currency outside of the islands, so exchange money prior to leaving the islands.

src: A maioria dos templos tem um festival anual que inicia em novembro e termina meados de maio, que varia de acordo com o calendário anual de cada templo. A maioria dos festivais do templo é celebrada como parte do aniversário do templo ou do aniversário da divindade presidente ou qualquer outro evento importante associado ao templo. Os festivais dos templos de Kerala são muito interessantes, com procissões regulares de elefantes enfeitados, orquestra no templo e outras festividades.
mt: Most temples have an annual festival that begins in November and ends mid-May, which varies according to the annual calendar of each temple. Most temple festivals are celebrated as part of the temple anniversary or the anniversary of the presiding deity or any other important event associated with the temple. Temple festivals in Kerala are very interesting, with regular processions of decorated elephants, temple orchestra and other festivities.
ref: Most of the temples do have an Annual festival starting from November end to Mid of May, which varies according to each temple's annual calendar. Most of the temple festivals is celebrated as part of temple's anniversary or presiding deity's birthday or any other major event associated with the temple. Kerala's temple festivals are very interesting to see, with regular procession of decorated elephants, temple orchestra and other festivities.

src: A maneira óbvia de voar na primeira classe ou na classe executiva, é desembolsando uma grande quantidade de dinheiro pelo privilégio (ou, melhor ainda, fazendo com que a sua empresa faça isso por você). No entanto, não é barato: como regras básicas, você pode esperar pagar até quatro vezes mais em relação à tarifa econômica normal para a classe executiva e onze vezes mais para a primeira classe! Em termos gerais, não vale a pena sequer procurar por descontos nos assentos para classe executiva ou primeira classe em voos diretos de A a B. As companhias aéreas sabem muito bem que há um pequeno grupo de passageiros que estão dispostos a pagar um preço alto pelo privilégio de chegar a algum lugar rapidamente e com conforto, e cobram de acordo com isso.
mt: The obvious way to fly first or business class is to shell out a large amount of money for the privilege (or, better yet, have your company do it for you). However, it's not cheap: as basic rules go, you can expect to pay up to four times as much as the normal economy fare for business class and eleven times as much for first class! In general, it's not even worth looking for discounts on first or business class seats on direct flights from A to B. Airlines know very well that there is a small group of passengers willing to pay a high price for the privilege of getting somewhere quickly and comfortably, and charge accordingly.
ref: The obvious way of flying in first or business class is to fork out a thick wad of money for the privilege (or, better yet, get your company to do it for you). However, this does not come cheap: as rough rules of thumb, you can expect to pay up to four times the normal economy fare for business, and eleven times for first class! Generally speaking, there is no point in even looking for discounts for business or first-class seats on direct flights from A to B. Airlines know well that there is a certain core group of flyers who are willing to pay top dollar for the privilege of getting somewhere fast and in comfort, and charge accordingly.

src: Companhias aéreas como a Emirates, a Etihad Airways, a Qatar Airways e a Turkish Airlines ampliaram muito os seus serviços para a África e oferecem conexões para muitas das principais cidades africanas a preços competitivos em relação a outras companhias aéreas europeias. A Turkish Airlines voa para 39 destinos em 30 países africanos desde 2014. Se você tiver tempo extra para viajar, cheque se a tarifa total para a África se compara com uma tarifa de volta ao mundo. Não se esqueça de acrescentar os custos adicionais de vistos extras, de taxas de embarque, de transporte terrestre, etc. para todos os locais de fora da África.
mt: Airlines such as Emirates, Etihad Airways, Qatar Airways and Turkish Airlines have greatly expanded their services to Africa and offer connections to many of the continent's major cities at competitive prices compared to other European airlines. Turkish Airlines flies to 39 destinations in 30 African countries since 2014. If you have extra time to travel, check if the total fare to Africa compares to a round-the-world fare. Don't forget to add extra visa costs, boarding fees, ground transportation, etc. for all locations outside Africa.
ref: Airlines such as Emirates, Etihad Airways, Qatar Airways & Turkish Airlines have greatly expanded their services to Africa, and offer connections to many major African cities at competitive rates than other European airlines. Turkish Airlines flies to 39 destinations in 30 African countries as of 2014. If you have additional travel time, check to see how your total fare quote to Africa compares with a round-the-world fare. Don't forget to add in the extra costs of additional visas, departure taxes, ground transportation, etc. for all those places outside of Africa.

src: Geralmente comprar comida em supermercados é a forma mais barata de se alimentar. Porém, se não souber cozinhar, as opções se limitam a comidas congeladas. Cada vez mais os supermercados adicionam seções mais variada de alimentos prontos. Alguns até são próprios para micro-ondas ou outras formas de reaquecimento. Em alguns países ou tipos de lojas, há no mínimo um restaurante no local, geralmente um bastante informal com preços acessíveis.
mt: Generally buying food at supermarkets is the cheapest way to eat. However, if you don't know how to cook, your options are limited to frozen foods. More and more supermarkets are adding more varied sections of ready-to-eat foods. Some are even microwaveable or other forms of reheating. In some countries or types of stores, there is at least one restaurant on site, usually a fairly informal one with affordable prices.
ref: Buying food in supermarkets is usually the cheapest way to get fed. Without cooking opportunities, choices are however limited to ready-made food. Increasingly supermarkets are getting a more varied section of ready-made food. Some even provide a microwave oven or other means to heat food. In some countries or types of stores there is at least one on-site restaurant, often a rather informal one with affordable prices.

src: As diversas formas de francês faladas na Bélgica e na Suíça diferem um pouco do francês falado na França, por mais que sejam parecidos o suficiente para serem mutuamente inteligíveis. Particularmente, o sistema de numeração na Bélgica e na Suíça francófonas tem algumas leves peculiaridades que são diferentes do francês falado na França, e a pronúncia de algumas palavras é ligeiramente diferente. Porém, todos os francófonos da Bélgica e da Suíça aprendem o francês básico na escola, de forma que são capazes de entender ele mesmo que você utilizasse o sistema de numeração padrão do francês.
mt: The various forms of French spoken in Belgium and Switzerland differ slightly from French spoken in France, though they are close enough to be mutually intelligible. Particularly, the Belgian and Swiss French systems of numeration have some minor peculiarities that are different from French spoken in France, and the pronunciation of some words is slightly different. However, all Francophones of Belgium and Switzerland learn basic French in school, so they are able to understand it even if you use the standard French system of numeration.
ref: The varieties of French which are spoken in Belgium and Switzerland differ slightly from the French spoken in France, though they are similar enough to be mutually intelligible. In particular, the numbering system in French-speaking Belgium and Switzerland has some slight peculiarities that are different from the French spoken in France, and the pronunciation of some words is slightly different. Nevertheless, all French-speaking Belgians and Swiss would have learned standard French in school, so they would be able to understand you even if you used the standard French numbering system.

src: Apenas algumas companhias aéreas ainda oferecem tarifas de luto, que dão um pequeno desconto no custo da viagem de última hora para um funeral. As companhias aéreas que oferecem essas tarifas incluem a Air Canada, a Delta Air Lines, a Lufthansa para voos partindo dos EUA ou do Canadá, e a WestJet. Em todos os casos, você deve reservar por telefone diretamente com a companhia aérea.
mt: Only a few airlines still offer bereavement fares, which give a small discount on the cost of a last-minute flight to a funeral. Airlines that offer these fares include Air Canada, Delta Air Lines, Lufthansa for flights departing from the U.S. or Canada, and WestJet. In all cases, you must book by phone directly with the airline.
ref: Only a few airlines still offer bereavement fares, which slightly discount the cost of last-minute funeral travel. Airlines that offer these include Air Canada, Delta Air Lines, Lufthansa for flights originating from the U.S. or Canada, and WestJet. In all cases, you must book by phone directly with the airline.

src: O uso de aplicativos de GPS no seu celular pode ser o jeito mais fácil e conveniente de se localizar quando estiver fora do seu país. Ele pode economizar dinheiro comprando novos mapas para um GPS, ou um dispositivo GPS autônomo, ou alugando um de uma locadora de veículos. Se você não tiver uma conexão de dados para o seu telefone, ou quando ele estiver fora de alcance, sua performance pode ser limitada ou indisponível.
mt: Using GPS apps on your phone may be the easiest and most convenient way to locate yourself when you are out of your country. It can save money buying new maps for a GPS, or a stand-alone GPS device, or renting one from a car rental agency. If you do not have data connection for your phone, or when it is out of range, your performance may be limited or unavailable.
ref: Using GPS navigation apps on your smartphone can be the easiest and most convenient way to navigate when out of your home country. It can save money over buying new maps for a GPS, or a standalone GPS device or renting one from a car rental company. If you don't have a data connection for your phone, or when it is out of range, their performance can be limited or unavailable.

src: É melhor visualizar os locais e a vida selvagem de Galápagos de barco, assim como Charles Darwin fez em 1835. Mais de 60 navios de cruzeiro navegam nas águas de Galápagos, com tamanhos que acomodam de 8 a 100 passageiros. A maioria das pessoas reserva seu lugar com bastante antecedência (uma vez que o barcos estão geralmente cheios na alta temporada). Tenha a certeza de que o agente de viagens que você usar seja um especialista em Galápagos e conheça bem uma vasta gama de navios. Assim, você poderá encontrar o navio mais apropriado para seus interesses e/ou restrições.
mt: It's better to view the sites and wildlife of Galápagos by boat, as Charles Darwin did in 1835. More than 60 cruise ships sail the waters of Galápagos, accommodating from 8 to 100 passengers. Most people book their place well in advance (as the ships are usually full in high season). Make sure that the travel agent you use is an expert in Galápagos and knows well a wide range of ships. Thus, you can find the most appropriate ship for your interests and/or restrictions.
ref: Seeing the sites and wildlife of the Galapagos is best done by boat, just as Charles Darwin did it in 1835. Over 60 cruise ships ply the Galapagos waters - ranging in size from 8 to 100 passengers. Most people book their place well in advance (as the boats are usually full during the high season). Be sure the agent through whom you book is a Galapagos specialist with a good knowledge of a wide variety of ships. This will ensure that your particular interests and/or constraints are matched with the ship most suitable to them.

src: Cassinos normalmente fazem muitos esforços para maximizar o tempo e o dinheiro gastos por seus visitantes. Em geral não há janelas ou relógios, e saídas podem ser difíceis de se encontrar. Eles geralmente têm ofertas especiais de comida, bebida e entretenimento para manter os convidados de bom humor e para mantê-los no local. Alguns locais oferecem bebidas alcoólicas por conta da casa. No entanto, a embriaguez prejudica o julgamento, e todos os bons apostadores sabem da importância de manter a sobriedade.
mt: Casinos generally make many efforts to maximize the time and money spent by their visitors. In general there are no windows or clocks, and exits may be difficult to find. They usually have special offers of food, drink and entertainment to keep the guests in good humor and to keep them on the premises. Some places offer free drinks. However, intoxication impairs judgment, and all good gamblers know the importance of keeping sober.
ref: Casinos typically make many efforts to maximize time and money spent by guests. Windows and clocks are usually absent, and exits can be hard to find. They usually have special food, drink and entertainment offers, to keep guests in a good mood, and keep them at the premise. Some venues offer alcoholic beverages on the house. However, drunkenness impairs judgement, and all good gamblers know the importance of staying sober.

src: Todos os substantivos, juntamente com a palavra Sie para você, sempre iniciam com letra maiúscula, mesmo no meio de uma frase. Esta é uma maneira importante de distinguir entre alguns verbos e objetos. Isso também torna a leitura mais fácil, sem dúvida, embora a escrita seja um tanto complicada pela necessidade de descobrir se um verbo ou adjetivo é usado de forma substantivada.
mt: All nouns, along with the word Sie for you, always start with a capital letter, even in the middle of a sentence. This is an important way to distinguish between some verbs and objects. This also makes reading easier, no doubt, although writing is somewhat complicated by the need to find out if a verb or adjective is used substantively.
ref: All nouns, alongside the word Sie for you, always begin with a capital letter, even in the middle of a sentence. This is an important way to distinguish between some verbs and objects. It also arguably makes reading easier, though writing is somewhat complicated by the need to find out whether a verb or adjective is used in a substantivized form.

src: Todos os substantivos, juntamente com a palavra Sie para você, sempre iniciam com letra maiúscula, mesmo no meio de uma frase. Esta é uma maneira importante de distinguir entre alguns verbos e objetos. Isso também torna a leitura mais fácil, sem dúvida, embora a escrita seja um tanto complicada pela necessidade de descobrir se um verbo ou adjetivo é usado de forma substantivada.
mt: All nouns, along with the word Sie for you, always start with a capital letter, even in the middle of a sentence. This is an important way to distinguish between some verbs and objects. This also makes reading easier, no doubt, although writing is somewhat complicated by the need to find out if a verb or adjective is used substantively.
ref: All nouns, alongside the word Sie for you, always begin with a capital letter, even in the middle of a sentence. This is an important way to distinguish between some verbs and objects. It also arguably makes reading easier, though writing is somewhat complicated by the need to find out whether a verb or adjective is used in a substantivized form.

src: "Em muitas partes do mundo, acenar é um gesto amigável que indica ""olá"". Contudo, na Malásia, ao menos entre os malaios em áreas rurais, significa ""venha aqui"", similar ao dedo indicador dobrado em direção ao corpo, um gesto que é usado em certos países ocidentais, e deveria ser usado apenas para esse propósito. Da mesma forma, um viajante britânico na Espanha pode confundir um aceno de despedida, envolvendo a palma voltada para a pessoa que acena (ao invés da pessoa a qual o aceno é direcionado), como um gesto para voltar."
mt: "In many parts of the world, waving is a friendly gesture that means "hello." However, in Malaysia, at least among the Malays in rural areas, it means "come here," similar to the index finger pointed toward the body, a gesture that is used in certain Western countries, and should be used only for that purpose. Similarly, a British traveler in Spain may confuse a farewell wave, involving the palm turned toward the person waving (instead of the person to whom the wave is directed), as a gesture to return."
ref: "In many parts of the world, waving is a friendly gesture, indicating ""hello."" However, in Malaysia, at least among the Malays in rural areas, it means ""come over,"" similar to the index finger bent toward the body, a gesture which is used in certain Western countries, and should be used only for that purpose. Similarly, a British traveller in Spain may mistake a wave goodbye involving the palm facing the waver (rather than the person being waved at) as a gesture to come back."

src: As geleiras não são estáveis, mas deslizam pela montanha. Isso causa rachaduras, fendas, que podem ser obscurecidas por pontes de neve. Há a possibilidade de as paredes e os tetos das cavernas glaciais desabarem e de as rachaduras se fecharem. Nas pontas das geleiras, blocos enormes se soltam, caem e por vezes pulam ou rolam para longe da borda.
mt: Glaciers are not stable, but slide down the mountain. This causes cracks, fissures, which can be obscured by snow bridges. There is a possibility that the walls and ceilings of glacial caves collapse and the cracks close. At the ends of glaciers, huge blocks break off, fall and sometimes jump or roll away from the edge.
ref: The glaciers are not stable, but flow down the mountain. This will cause cracks, crevasses, which may be obscured by snow bridges. The walls and roofs of ice caves can collapse and cracks can get closed. At the edge of glaciers huge blocks break loose, fall down and perhaps jump or roll farther from the edge.

src: Goma é uma cidade de turismo da República Democrática do Congo, no extremo leste, perto de Ruanda. No ano de 2002, Goma foi destruída pela lava do vulcão Nyiragongo, que enterrou uma grande parte das ruas da cidade, principalmente o centro. Embora Goma seja razoavelmente segura, qualquer visita fora de Goma deve ser estudada para compreender o estado da batalha que persiste na província de Nord-Kivu. A cidade também é a base para escalar o vulcão Nyiragongo, junto com algumas das trilhas montanhosas com gorilas mais baratas da África. Você pode usar um boda-boda (mototáxi) para passear por Goma. O preço normal (local) é de cerca de 500 francos congoleses para um passeio rápido.
mt: Goma is a tourist city of the Democratic Republic of the Congo, in the far east, near Rwanda. In the year 2002, Goma was destroyed by lava from the Nyiragongo volcano, which buried a large part of the city's streets, especially the center. Although Goma is reasonably safe, any visit outside of Goma should be studied to understand the state of the battle that persists in the province of Nord-Kivu. The city is also the base for climbing the Nyiragongo volcano, along with some of the cheapest mountain gorilla trails in Africa. You can use a boda-boda (motorcycle taxi) to tour Goma. The normal price (local) is about 500 Congolese francs for a quick ride.
ref: Goma is a tourist city of the Democratic Republic of Congo in the extreme east near Rwanda. In 2002 Goma was destroyed by lava from the Nyiragongo volcano which buried most of the town’s streets, particularly the town centre. While Goma is reasonably safe, any visits outside of Goma should be researched to understand the state of the fighting that persists in the North Kivu province. The city is also the base to climb the Nyiragongo volcano along with some of the cheapest Mountain Gorilla tracking in Africa. You can use boda-boda (motorcycle taxi) to get around Goma. The normal (local) price is ~500 Congolese Francs for the short ride.

src: É preciso autorização para acampar em qualquer lugar que esteja abaixo da borda do Grand Canyon. As licenças são limitadas com objetivo de proteger o cânion. Elas ficam disponíveis no primeiro dia do mês, quatro meses antes do mês de início. Portanto, uma licença de paisagem para qualquer data de início em maio estará disponível em 1° de janeiro. O espaço para as áreas mais populares, como o Bright Angel Campground, que fica ao lado do Ohantom Ranch, geralmente fica lotado já na primeira data que é aberta para reservas. Existe uma quantidade limitada de licenças reservadas para pedidos de entrada disponíveis pela ordem de chegada.
mt: You need a permit to camp anywhere below the rim of the Grand Canyon. Permits are limited to protect the canyon. They become available on the first day of the month, four months before the month of start. So, a landscape permit for any start date in May will be available on January 1st. Space for the more popular areas, such as the Bright Angel Campground, which is next to the Ohatham Ranch, is usually booked up by the first date that is opened for reservations. There is a limited number of permits reserved for walk-in requests available on a first-come, first-served basis.
ref: Any camping below the rim in Grand Canyon requires a backcountry permit. Permits are limited to protect the canyon, and become available on the 1st day of the month, four months prior to the start month. Thus, a backcountry permit for any start date in May becomes available on 1 Jan. Space for the most popular areas, such as the Bright Angel Campground adjacent to Phantom Ranch, generally fill up by the requests received on first date they are opened to reservations. There are a limited number permits reserved for walk-in requests available on a first come, first served basis.

src: Alguns hotéis têm uma herança da época de ouro das ferrovias a vapor e transatlânticos; antes da Segunda Guerra Mundial, no século 19 ou início do século 20. Estes hotéis eram onde os ricos e famosos da época se hospedavam e diversas vezes contavam com restaurantes bons e ótima vida noturna Os acessórios ultrapassados, a falta das mais recentes amenidades, e um certo envelhecimento gracioso, também fazem parte de sua personalidade. Embora geralmente sejam de propriedade privada, algumas vezes acomodam chefes de estado e outros dignitários visitantes. Um viajante com muito dinheiro pode considerar uma volta pelo mundo, intercalando com estadias em muitos desses hotéis.
mt: Some hotels have a heritage from the age of steam railways and transatlantic liners; before the Second World War, in the 19th or early 20th century. These hotels were where the rich and famous of the time stayed and often had good restaurants and lively nightlife. The outdated accessories, the lack of the latest amenities, and a certain graceful aging, also make up their personality. Although generally privately owned, sometimes they accommodate visiting heads of state and other dignitaries. A wealthy traveler may consider a world tour, interspersing stays in many of these hotels.
ref: Some hotels have a heritage from the golden age of steam railways and ocean liners; before the Second World War, in the 19th or early 20th centuries. These hotels were where the rich and the famous of the day would stay, and often had fine dining and nightlife. The old fashioned fittings, the lack of the latest amenities, and a certain graceful agedness are also part of their character. While they are usually privately owned, they sometimes accommodate visiting heads of state and other dignitaries. A traveller with piles of money might consider a round the world flight, broken up with stays in many of these hotels.

src: "Graças às ligações de cabo de fibra ótica sob o mar para a Europa e ao satélite de banda larga, a Groenlândia está bem conectada com 93% da população tendo acesso à Internet. Seu hotel ou seus anfitriões (no caso de estadia em pousada ou casa particular) provavelmente terão internet sem fio ou um computador conectado à internet, e todos os assentamentos possuem uma lan house ou um local com internet sem fio disponível. Como mencionado anteriormente, embora o termo ""Esquimó"" continue sendo aceito nos EUA, ele é considerado pejorativo por muitos povos árticos fora dos EUA, especialmente no Canadá. Embora você possa ouvir a palavra usada por nativos da Groenlândia, seu uso deve ser evitado por estrangeiros. Os habitantes nativos da Groenlândia chamam a si mesmos de Inuítes no Canadá e Kalaalleq (Kalaallit no plural), um groenlandês na Groenlândia. Crimes, e má vontade contra estrangeiros em geral, são praticamente desconhecidos na Groenlândia. Mesmo nas cidades, não existem ""áreas perigosas"". O tempo frio é talvez o único perigo real que os despreparados enfrentarão. Se visitar a Groenlândia durante as estações frias (considerando que, quanto mais ao norte for, mais frio estará), é necessário levar suficientes roupas quentes. Os dias muito longos no verão podem causar problemas para dormir o suficiente e problemas de saúde associados. Durante o verão, preste atenção também aos mosquitos nórdicos. Embora não transmitam doenças, eles podem ser irritantes."
mt: "Thanks to the undersea fiber-optic cable connections to Europe and the broadband satellite, Greenland is well connected with 93% of the population having access to the Internet. Your hotel or your hosts (in the case of staying in a guesthouse or private home) will probably have internet access or a computer connected to the internet, and all settlements have an internet cafe or a place with wireless internet available. As mentioned earlier, although the term ""Eskimo"" is still accepted in the US, it is considered pejorative by many Arctic peoples outside the US, especially in Canada. Although you may hear the word used by Greenlandic natives, its use should be avoided by foreigners. Greenlandic natives call themselves Inuit in Canada and Kalaalleq (Kalaallit in the plural), a Greenlandic in Greenland. Crimes, and ill will against foreigners in general, are practically unknown in Greenland. Even in the cities, there are no ""dangerous areas"". The cold weather is perhaps the only real danger that the unprepared will face. If you visit Greenland during the winter seasons (considering that, the further north you are, the colder it will be), you will need to bring enough warm clothes. The very long days in the summer may cause problems sleeping enough and associated health problems. During the summer, also pay attention to the Nordic mosquitoes. Although they do not transmit diseases, they can be irritating."
ref: "Thanks to undersea fiber optic cable links to Europe and broadband satellite, Greenland is well connected with 93% of the population having internet access. Your hotel or hosts (if staying in a guesthouse or private home) will likely have wifi or an internet connected PC, and all settlements have an internet cafe or some location with public wifi. As mentioned above, though the word ""Eskimo"" remains acceptable in the United States, it is considered pejorative by many non-U.S. Arctic peoples, especially in Canada. While you may hear the word used by Greenlandic Natives, its use should be avoided by foreigners. The native inhabitants of Greenland call themselves Inuit in Canada and Kalaalleq (plural Kalaallit), a Greenlander, in Greenland. Crime, and ill-will toward foreigners in general, is virtually unknown in Greenland. Even in the towns, there are no ""rough areas."" Cold weather is perhaps the only real danger the unprepared will face. If you visit Greenland during cold seasons (considering that the further north you go, the colder it will be), it is essential to bring warm enough clothing. The very long days in the summer can lead to problems getting sufficient sleep and associated health issues. During the summer, also watch out for the Nordic mosquitoes. Although they do not transmit any diseases, they can be irritating."

src: Jardín de la Unión. Este espaço foi construído como átrio de um convento do século 17, do qual o Templo de San Diego é o único edifício remanescente. Funciona atualmente como uma espécie de praça principal, onde sempre está ocorrendo muitas atrações, tanto durante o dia como a noite. Há vários restaurantes cercando o jardim, e, nas tardes e noites de lá, concertos grátis são frequentemente oferecidos no gazebo central. Callejon del Beso (Beco do Beijo). Duas varandas separadas por somente 69 centímetros é o lar de uma antiga lenda do amor. Por alguns trocados, algumas crianças lhe contarão a história.
mt: Garden of the Union. This space was built as a courtyard of a 17th century convent, of which the Temple of San Diego is the only remaining building. It currently functions as a kind of main square, where there are always many attractions, both during the day and at night. There are several restaurants surrounding the garden, and, in the afternoons and evenings there, free concerts are frequently offered in the central gazebo. Callejon del Beso (Beco do Beijo). Two balconies separated by only 69 centimeters is the home of an old love legend. For some change, some children will tell you the story.
ref: Jardín de la Unión. This space was built as the atrium for a 17th-century convent, of which the Templo de San Diego is the sole surviving building. It now functions as the central plaza, and always has a lot of things going on, day and night. There are a number of restaurants surrounding the garden, and in the afternoons and evening there free concerts are often given from the central gazebo. Callejon del Beso (Alley of the Kiss). Two balconies separated by only 69 centimeters is home of an old love legend. For a few pennies some children will tell you the story.

src: A caminhada é uma atividade ao ar livre que consiste em andar em ambientes naturais, muitas vezes em trilhas de caminhada. Caminhadas ao dia vão desde distâncias de menos de um quilômetro até distâncias que podem ser completadas em um só dia. Para uma caminhada de um dia em uma trilha fácil, é preciso poucos preparativos, e qualquer pessoa relativamente em forma consegue aproveitá-las. As famílias com crianças pequenas talvez precisem estar mais bem preparadas, mas um dia do lado de fora é bem possível, mesmo com bebês e crianças em idade pré-escolar.
mt: Hiking is an outdoor activity which consists of walking in natural environments, often on hiking trails. Hikes range from distances of less than one kilometer to distances that can be completed in a single day. For a day hike on an easy trail, little preparation is needed, and anyone in reasonably good health can enjoy them. Families with small children may need to be better prepared, but a day outdoors is well possible, even with babies and preschoolers.
ref: Hiking is an outdoor activity which consists of walking in natural environments, often on hiking trails. Day hiking involves distances of less than a mile up to longer distances that can be covered in a single day. For a day hike along an easy trail little preparations are needed, and any moderately fit person can enjoy them. Families with small children may need more preparations, but a day outdoors is easily possible even with babies and pre-school children.

src: "Típicos da Noruega, são fiordes íngremes e vales que, de repente, dão lugar a um planalto alto, mais ou menos uniforme. Tais planaltos costumam ser se referidos como ""vidde"", que significa um espaço grande e aberto sem árvores, uma extensão ilimitada. Em Rogaland e em Agder eles são usualmente denominados de ""hei"", significando uma charneca sem árvores, geralmente coberta de estorga."
mt: "Typical of Norway, they are steep fjords and valleys that suddenly give way to a high, more or less uniform plateau. Such plateaus are usually referred to as "vidde", meaning a large and open space without trees, an unlimited expanse. In Rogaland and in Agder they are usually called "hei", meaning a heath without trees, usually covered with heather."
ref: "Typical for Norway are steep fjords and valleys that suddenly give way to a high, more or less even plateau. These plateaus are often referred to as ""vidde"" meaning a wide, open treeless space, a boundless expanse. In Rogaland and Agder they are usually called ""hei"" meaning a treeless moorland often covered in heather."

src: A época de turismo para as estações de montanha costuma chegar ao seu ápice durante o verão indiano. Porém, eles têm um tipo diferente de beleza e charme durante o inverno, com muitas estações nas montanhas que recebem grandes quantidades de neve e oferecem atividades como esqui e snowboard.
mt: The tourist season for ski resorts usually peaks during the Indian summer. However, they have a different kind of beauty and charm during the winter, with many resorts in the mountains that receive large amounts of snow and offer activities such as skiing and snowboarding.
ref: The tourist season for the hill stations generally peaks during the Indian summer. However, they have a different kind of beauty and charm during winter, with many hill stations receiving healthy amounts of snow and offering activities such as skiing and snowboarding.

ref: The tourist season for the hill stations generally peaks during the Indian summer. However, they have a different kind of beauty and charm during winter, with many hill stations receiving healthy amounts of snow and offering activities such as skiing and snowboarding.

src: Tenha certeza de que ao chegar às marinas, tudo ficará bem óbvio. Você conhecerá outros passageiros de barco que compartilharão suas informações com você. Basicamente, você colocará avisos oferecendo sua ajuda, andará pelas docas, abordará as pessoas para limpar seus iates, tentará fazer contato com marinheiros no bar, etc. Tente conversar com o máximo de pessoas possível. Depois de algum tempo, todo mundo vai conhecer você e dará dicas sobre quais barcos estão procurando alguém.
mt: When you arrive at the marinas, everything will be obvious. You will meet other boat passengers who will share their information with you. Basically, you will post notices offering your help, walk the docks, board people to clean their yachts, try to make contact with sailors at the bar, etc. Try to talk to as many people as possible. After some time, everyone will know you and give tips on which boats are looking for someone.
ref: Be assured that once you hit the marinas everything will be pretty obvious. You will meet other boat hitchhikers and they will share their information with you. Basically you'll be putting up notices offering your help, pacing the docks, approaching people cleaning their yachts, trying to make contact with sailors in the bar, etc. Try to talk to as many people as possible. After a while everyone will know you and will give you hints as to which boat is looking for someone.

After some time, everyone will know you and give tips on which boats are looking for someone.
ref: Be assured that once you hit the marinas everything will be pretty obvious. You will meet other boat hitchhikers and they will share their information with you. Basically you'll be putting up notices offering your help, pacing the docks, approaching people cleaning their yachts, trying to make contact with sailors in the bar, etc. Try to talk to as many people as possible. After a while everyone will know you and will give you hints as to which boat is looking for someone.

src: A ilha de Hong Kong dá seu nome ao território de Hong Kong e é o local que muitos turistas consideram como seu principal atrativo. O desfile de prédios que formam o horizonte de Hong Kong já foi comparado a um gráfico de barras cintilante que se faz visível pela presença das águas do Victoria Harbour. Para ter as melhores vistas de Hong Kong, saia da ilha e vá até a orla de Kowloon, do lado oposto. A maior parte do desenvolvimento urbano da ilha de Hong Kong está densamente concentrada em terras recuperadas ao longo da costa norte. Esse é o lugar que os colonizadores britânicos escolheram para morar e, por isso, se você busca evidências do passado colonial do território, esse é um ótimo lugar para começar.
mt: The island of Hong Kong gives its name to the territory of Hong Kong and is the place that many tourists consider its main attraction. The skyline of buildings that form the Hong Kong horizon has been compared to a glittering bar chart that is visible by the presence of the waters of Victoria Harbour. To get the best views of Hong Kong, leave the island and go to the Kowloon waterfront, on the other side. Most of the urban development of the island of Hong Kong is densely concentrated in reclaimed lands along the north coast. This is the place that the British colonizers chose to live and, therefore, if you are looking for evidence of the colonial past of the territory, this is a good place to start.
ref: Hong Kong Island gives the territory of Hong Kong its name and is the place that many tourists regard as the main focus. The parade of buildings that make the Hong Kong skyline has been likened to a glittering bar chart that is made apparent by the presence of the waters of Victoria Harbour. To get the best views of Hong Kong, leave the island and head for the Kowloon waterfront opposite. The great majority of Hong Kong Island's urban development is densely packed on reclaimed land along the northern shore. This is the place the British colonisers took as their own and so if you are looking for evidence of the territory's colonial past, this is a good place to start.

src: Para que os pés de um cavaleiro tenham apoio, são usados estribos, que ficam pendurados em ambos os lados da sela. Eles fornecem maior estabilidade para o cavaleiro, mas podem apresentar problemas de segurança, pois os pés do cavaleiro podem ficar presos neles. Se um cavaleiro é jogado de um cavalo, mas teve um de seus pés agarrado no estribo, ele pode ser arrastado caso o animal acabe fugindo. Para diminuir esse perigo, várias prevenções de segurança podem ser tomadas Primeiro, uma grande parte dos pilotos usa botas de montaria com salto e sola lisa, que é bastante estreita. Em seguida, algumas selas, principalmente selas inglesas, têm barras de segurança que permitem que um estribo de couro caia da sela se puxado para trás por um cavaleiro em queda.
mt: To give a knight's feet support, stirrups are used, which are hung on both sides of the saddle. They provide greater stability for the knight, but can present safety issues, as the knight's feet can get caught in them. If a knight is thrown from a horse, but had one of his feet caught in a stirrup, he may be dragged if the animal ends up running away. To reduce this risk, several safety precautions can be taken First, a large part of riders use riding boots with heel and smooth sole, which is quite narrow. Then, some saddles, especially English saddles, have safety bars that allow a leather stirrup to fall off the saddle if pulled back by a falling knight.
ref: Stirrups are supports for the rider's feet that hang down on either side of the saddle. They provide greater stability for the rider but can have safety concerns due to the potential for a rider's feet to get stuck in them. If a rider is thrown from a horse but has a foot caught in the stirrup, they could be dragged if the horse runs away. To minimize this risk, a number of safety precautions can be taken. First, most riders wear riding boots with a heel and a smooth, quite narrow, sole. Next, some saddles, particularly English saddles, have safety bars that allow a stirrup leather to fall off the saddle if pulled backwards by a falling rider.

src: Uma rede de intercâmbio de hospitalidade é a organização que liga os viajantes aos habitantes locais das cidades que eles visitarão. Para fazer parte desse tipo de rede, geralmente se faz necessário o preenchimento de um formulário on-line; embora algumas redes disponibilizem ou exijam verificação complementar. É oferecida então uma listagem de anfitriões disponíveis de forma impressa e/ou online, às vezes com referências e avaliações por outros viajantes. O Couchsurfing foi fundado em janeiro de 2004, após o programador de computadores Casey Fenton encontrar um voo barato para a Islândia, sem, no entanto, encontrar um lugar para ficar. Ele enviou um e-mail aos estudantes da universidade local e recebeu um número enorme de ofertas de acomodação gratuita.
mt: A hospitality exchange network is the organization that links travelers to local residents of the cities they will visit. To be part of this type of network, usually an online form must be filled out; although some networks offer or require additional verification. Then a list of available hosts is offered in print and/or online, sometimes with references and reviews by other travelers. Couchsurfing was founded in January 2004, after computer programmer Casey Fenton found a cheap flight to Iceland, without, however, finding a place to stay. He sent an email to the local university students and received a huge number of offers of free accommodation.
ref: A hospitality exchange network is the organization that connects travelers with locals in the cities they are going to visit. Joining such a network usually just requires filling out an online form; although some networks offer or require additional verification. A listing of available hosts is then provided either in print and/or online, sometimes with references and reviews by other travelers. Couchsurfing was founded in January 2004 after computer programmer Casey Fenton found a cheap flight to Iceland but did not have a place to stay. He emailed students at the local university and received an overwhelming number of offers for free accommodation.

src: Os hostels são basicamente para jovens - um hóspede típico está na casa dos 20 anos - mas frequentemente você pode encontrar viajantes mais velhos também. Famílias com crianças não são muito frequentes, mas alguns albergues permitem que elas fiquem em acomodações privadas.
mt: Hostels are basically for young people - a typical guest is in their twenties - but you can often find older travellers too. Families with children are not very common, but some hostels allow them to stay in private rooms.
ref: Hostels cater primarily to young people – a typical guest is in their twenties – but you can often find older travellers there too. Families with children are a rare sight, but some hostels do allow them in private rooms.

src: Arremesso de bumerangue é uma habilidade popular que muitos turistas querem aprender. Se você quer aprender a lançar um bumerangue que volte para sua mão, confira se você tem um modelo de bumerangue adequado para isso. A maioria dos bumerangues disponíveis na Austrália, na verdade, não volta ao ponto de lançamento. Iniciantes são aconselhados a não tentar jogar durante ventanias.
mt: Throwing boomerangs is a popular skill that many tourists want to learn. If you want to learn to throw a boomerang that will return to your hand, check that you have a boomerang model that is suitable for this. Most boomerangs available in Australia, in fact, do not return to the point of launch. Beginners are advised not to try throwing during gales.
ref: Boomerang throwing is a popular skill that many tourists want to acquire. If you want to learn throwing a boomerang that comes back to your hand, make sure you have a suitable boomerang for returning. Most boomerangs available in Australia are in fact non-returning. It is best for beginners to not try throwing in windy

src: Com 17.000 ilhas para se escolher, a culinária indonésia é um leque que abrange uma grande variedade de cozinhas regionais encontradas por todo o país. Mas, se usados sem outros qualificadores, o termo tende a significar que o alimento originalmente é das partes central e oriental da ilha principal Java. Agora amplamente disponível pelo arquipélago, a culinária javanesa inclui uma variedade de pratos temperados de maneira simples, os condimentos predominantes de preferência javanesa sendo amendoim, pimentas, açúcar (principalmente açúcar de coco javanês) e várias especiarias aromáticas.
mt: With 17,000 islands to choose from, Indonesian cuisine is a smorgasbord that encompasses a wide variety of regional cuisines found throughout the country. But, if used without other qualifiers, the term tends to mean that the food originally comes from the central and eastern parts of the main island of Java. Now widely available throughout the archipelago, Javanese cuisine includes a variety of dishes seasoned simply, the predominant Javanese spices being peanuts, peppers, sugar (particularly Javanese coconut sugar) and various aromatic spices.
ref: With 17,000 islands to choose from, Indonesian food is an umbrella term covering a vast variety of regional cuisines found across the nation. But, if used without further qualifiers, the term tends to mean the food originally from the central and eastern parts of the main island Java. Now widely available throughout the archipelago, Javanese cuisine features an array of simply seasoned dishes, the predominant flavorings the Javanese favor being peanuts, chillies, sugar (especially Javanese coconut sugar) and various aromatic spices.

src: Para quem não tem costume com o jargão médico, as palavras infecciosa e contagiosa têm significados distintos. Uma doença infecciosa é aquela causada por um patógeno, como um vírus, uma bactéria, um fungo ou outros parasitas. Uma doença contagiosa é uma doença facilmente transmitida ao ficar perto de alguém infectado. Muitos países pedem que os viajantes que entram ou saiam de seus países tenham sido vacinados contra uma alcance bem diverso de doenças. Essas condições geralmente podem depender de quais países um viajante visitou ou pretende visitar.
mt: For those not familiar with medical jargon, the words infectious and contagious have distinct meanings. An infectious disease is one caused by a pathogen, such as a virus, bacteria, fungus or other parasites. A contagious disease is one easily transmitted by being near someone infected. Many countries require travelers entering or leaving their countries to have been vaccinated against a wide range of diseases. These conditions usually depend on which countries a traveler has visited or plans to visit.
ref: For those unfamiliar with medical jargon, the words infectious and contagious have distinct meanings. An infectious disease is one that is caused by a pathogen, such as a virus, bacterium, fungus or other parasites. A contagious disease is a disease which is easily transmitted by being in the vicinity of an infected person. Many governments require visitors entering, or residents leaving, their countries to be vaccinated for a range of diseases. These requirements may often depend on what countries a traveller has visited or intends to visit.

src: Provedores de VPN (rede privada virtual) pessoal são uma excelente forma de contornar a censura política e a filtragem geográfica de IP comercial. Eles são superiores aos proxies da Web por vários motivos: Eles redirecionam todo o tráfego da internet, não apenas o http. Eles normalmente oferecem maior largura de banda e melhor qualidade de serviço. Eles são encriptados e, portanto, mais difíceis de espionar.
mt: Personal VPN (virtual private network) providers are a great way to circumvent political censorship and commercial IP geo-filtering. They are superior to web proxies for several reasons: They redirect all internet traffic, not just http. They typically offer greater bandwidth and better service quality. They are encrypted and therefore harder to spy on.
ref: Personal VPN (virtual private network) providers are an excellent way of circumventing both political censorship and commercial IP-geofiltering. They are superior to web proxies for several reasons: They re-route all Internet traffic, not only http. They normally offer higher bandwidth and better quality of service. They are encrypted and thus harder to spy on.

They are superior to web proxies for several reasons: They re-route all Internet traffic, not only http. They normally offer higher bandwidth and better quality of service. They are encrypted and thus harder to spy on.

src: Como as chamadas são roteadas pela internet, não há necessidade de ter uma operadora telefônica localizada onde você mora ou para onde você vai viajar. Também não há nenhuma exigência de que você tenha um número local na comunidade onde vive; você pode obter conexão de internet por satélite na região selvagem de Chicken, Alaska e escolher um número que diz que você está no ensolarado Arizona. Geralmente, você tem que comprar um número global separadamente que permita que telefones RPTC liguem para você. De onde o número é faz diferença para as pessoas que ligam para você.
mt: Because calls are routed over the Internet, there is no need to have a telephone company located where you live or where you are traveling. There is also no requirement that you have a local number in the community where you live; you can get satellite Internet connection in the Chicken, Alaska wilderness and choose a number that says you are in sunny Arizona. Generally, you have to buy a separate global number that allows RPTC phones to call you. Where the number is from makes a difference to people who call you.
ref: Because calls are routed over the Internet, you do not need to use a phone company located where you live or where you travel. There is also no requirement that you obtain a local number from the community in which you live; you can obtain a satellite Internet connection in the wilds of Chicken, Alaska and select a number which claims you're in sunny Arizona. Often, you have to buy a global number separately that allows PSTN phones to call you. Where the number is from makes a difference for people calling you.
