src: A pronúncia é relativamente fácil em italiano, já que a maioria das palavras são pronunciadas exatamente como foram escritas. As principais letras a serem observadas são o C e G, pois sua pronúncia varia de acordo com a vogal a seguir. Além disso, certifique-se de pronunciar r e rr de forma diferente: caro significa querido, enquanto carro significa automóvel.
mt: Italian pronunciation is relatively easy, as most words are pronounced exactly as they are written. The main letters to be aware of are C and G, as their pronunciation varies depending on the following vowel. Also, make sure to pronounce r and rr differently: caro means dear, while carro means car.
ref: Pronunciation is relatively easy in Italian since most words are pronounced exactly how they are written The main letters to watch out for are c and g, since their pronunciation varies based on the following vowel. Also, make sure to pronounce r and rr differently: caro means dear, whereas carro means chariot.

src: Izmir é a terceira maior cidade da Turquia, com aproximadamente 3,7 milhões de pessoas, e tem o segundo maior porto depois de Istambul, além de um excelente centro de transportes. Uma vez a antiga cidade de Esmirna, agora é um centro comercial moderno, desenvolvido e agitado, localizado em torno de uma grande baía e cercado por montanhas. As amplas avenidas, os prédios com fachada de vidro e os centros comerciais modernos são marcados por telhados vermelhos tradicionais, o mercado do século 18, e as antigas mesquitas e igrejas, embora a cidade tenha uma atmosfera que remete mais à Europa mediterrânea do que à Turquia clássica.
mt: Izmir is the third largest city in Turkey, with approximately 3.7 million people, and has the second largest port after Istanbul, as well as an excellent transport hub. Once the ancient city of Smyrna, it is now a modern, developed and bustling commercial center, located around a large bay and surrounded by mountains. The wide avenues, glass-fronted buildings and modern shopping centers are marked by traditional red-tiled roofs, the 18th century market, and the old mosques and churches, although the city has an atmosphere that is more reminiscent of the Mediterranean Europe than the classical Turkey.
ref: İzmir is the third largest city in Turkey with a population of around 3.7 million, the second biggest port after Istanbul, and a very good transport hub. Once the ancient city of Smyrna, it is now a modern, developed, and busy commercial center, set around a huge bay and surrounded by mountains. The broad boulevards, glass-fronted buildings and modern shopping centers are dotted with traditional red-tiled roofs, the 18th century market, and old mosques and churches, although the city has an atmosphere more of Mediterranean Europe than traditional Turkey.

src: A observação das flores de cerejeira, conhecida como hanami, faz parte da cultura japonesa desde o século oitavo. O conceito veio da China, onde os florescimentos da ameixeira eram a flor preferida. No Japão, as primeiras festas da florada das cerejeiras eram realizadas pelo imperador somente para ele mesmo e para outros membros da aristocracia ao redor da Corte Imperial.
mt: The observation of cherry blossoms, known as hanami, has been part of Japanese culture since the eighth century. The concept came from China, where the flowering of the plum tree was the preferred flower. In Japan, the first cherry blossom festivals were held by the emperor only for himself and other members of the aristocracy around the Imperial Court.
ref: Cherry blossom viewing, known as hanami, has been a part of Japanese culture since the 8th century. The concept came from China where plum blossoms were the flower of choice. In Japan, the first cherry blossom parties were hosted by the emperor only for himself and other members of the aristocracy around the Imperial Court.

src: Jerusalém é a capital e maior cidade de Israel, embora a maioria dos outros países e as Nações Unidas não a reconheçam como a capital de Israel. A antiga cidade nas Colinas da Judéia tem uma história fascinante que abrange milhares de anos. A cidade é sagrada para as três religiões monoteístas — judaísmo, cristianismo e islamismo — e serve como um centro espiritual, religioso e cultural. Devido à importância religiosa da cidade, e especialmente aos vários locais da área da Cidade Antiga, Jerusalém é um dos principais destinos turísticos em Israel. Jerusalém tem muitos locais históricos, arqueológicos e culturais, além de shopping centers, cafés e restaurantes vibrantes e lotados.
mt: Jerusalem is the capital and largest city of Israel, although most other countries and the United Nations do not recognize it as the capital of Israel. The ancient city on the Hills of Judaea has a fascinating history that spans thousands of years. The city is sacred to the three monotheistic religions — Judaism, Christianity and Islam — and serves as a spiritual, religious and cultural center. Due to the city's religious importance, and especially to the various sites in the Old City area, Jerusalem is one of the main tourist destinations in Israel. Jerusalem has many historical, archaeological and cultural sites, as well as vibrant and crowded shopping centers, cafes and restaurants.
ref: Jerusalem is the capital and largest city of Israel, though most other countries and the United Nations do not recognize it as Israel's capital. The ancient city in the Judean Hills has a fascinating history spanning thousands of years. The city is holy to the three monotheistic religions - Judaism, Christianity and Islam, and serves as a spiritual, religious, and cultural center. Due to the religious significance of the city, and in particular the many sites of the Old City area, Jerusalem is one of the main tourist destinations in Israel. Jerusalem has many historic, archeological and cultural sites, along with vibrant and crowded shopping centers, cafés, and restaurants.

src: O Parque Nacional Kruger fica no nordeste da África do Sul, ao longo da fronteira de Moçambique ao leste, do Zimbábue ao norte, e o Crocodile River na fronteira sul. O parque abrange 19.500 Km² e é dividido em 14 zonas ecológicas diferentes, cada uma sustentando diferentes espécies animais. É uma das principais atrações da África do Sul e é considerado o estandarte dos Parques Nacionais da África do Sul (SANParks). Há taxas para entrada e conservação do parque, assim como acontece com todos os parques nacionais da África do Sul. Pode ser muito útil também adquirir um Wild Card. Com ele você pode ter acesso a vários parques da África do Sul ou a todos os parques nacionais sul-africanos.
mt: Kruger National Park is in the northeast of South Africa, along the border with Mozambique to the east, Zimbabwe to the north, and the Crocodile River to the south. The park covers 19,500 km² and is divided into 14 ecological zones, each supporting different animal species. It is one of the main attractions of South Africa and is considered the flagship of South African National Parks (SANParks). There are entrance and conservation fees for the park, as there are for all national parks in South Africa. It may also be useful to purchase a Wild Card. With it you can have access to several parks in South Africa or to all national parks in South Africa.
ref: The Kruger National Park (KNP) lies in the north-east of South Africa and runs along the border of Mozambique in the east, Zimbabwe in the north, and the southern border is the Crocodile River. The park covers 19,500 km² and is divided in 14 different ecozones, each supporting different wildlife. It is one of the main attractions of South Africa and it is considered the flagship of South African National Parks (SANParks). As with all South African National Parks, there are daily conservation and entry fees for the park. It may also be beneficial for one to buy a Wild Card, which provides entry to either selections of parks in South Africa or all of the South African National Parks.

src: Acima da ponta norte de Machu Picchu fica esta montanha íngreme, que muitas vezes serve de pano de fundo para muitas fotos das ruínas. É uma subida íngreme e difícil, por isso pode ser um pouco assustador quando se olha de baixo, mas quem está em boa forma física consegue fazer o percurso em cerca de 45 minutos. Degraus de pedra foram colocados ao longo da maior parte do caminho, e nas partes mais íngremes, cabos de aço fornecem um corrimão de apoio. Isso posto, espere ficar sem fôlego, e tenha cuidado em porções mais acentuadas, especialmente quando molhado, já que pode se tornar perigoso rapidamente. É preciso atravessar uma pequena caverna no topo. Ela é bem baixa e estreita para se enfiar.
mt: Above the northern tip of Machu Picchu lies this steep mountain, which often serves as a backdrop for many photos of the ruins. It is a steep and difficult climb, so it can be a little scary when looking down, but those in good physical shape can make the trek in about 45 minutes. Stone steps have been placed along most of the path, and in the steeper portions, steel cables provide a handrail for support. All that said, expect to be out of breath, and be careful in steeper portions, especially when wet, as it can become dangerous quickly. You must cross a small cave at the top. It is well low and narrow to squeeze through.
ref: Towering above the north end of Machu Picchu is this steep mountain, often the backdrop to many photos of the ruins. It looks a bit daunting from below, and it is a steep and difficult ascent, but most reasonably fit persons should be able to make it in about 45 minutes. Stone steps are laid along most of the path, and in the steeper sections steel cables provide a supporting handrail. That said, expect to be out of breath, and take care in the steeper portions, especially when wet, as it can become dangerous quickly. There's a tiny cave near the top that must be passed through, it is quite low and a rather tight squeeze.

src: A culinária maiorquina, assim como a de zonas similares no Mediterrâneo, é baseada em pão, vegetais e carne (especialmente de porco), e utiliza azeite de oliva em tudo. Um jantar simples e popular, especialmente no verão, é o Pa amb Oli: pão com azeite de oliva, tomate e qualquer ingrediente à disposição, como queijo, atum, etc.
mt: Majorcan cuisine, like that of similar areas in the Mediterranean, is based on bread, vegetables and meat (especially pork), and uses olive oil in everything. A simple and popular dinner, especially in the summer, is Pa amb Oli: bread with olive oil, tomato and any ingredient available, such as cheese, tuna, etc.
ref: Majorcan cuisine, like that of similar zones in the Mediterranean, is based on bread, vegetables and meat (specially pork), and uses olive oil throughout. A simple popular dinner, especially during the summer, is the Pa amb Oli: Bread with olive oil, tomato, and any available condiments such as cheese, tunafish, etc.

src: Uma refeição tipo Hangi é feita em uma cavidade aquecida no chão. O buraco é aquecido com pedras quentes tiradas de uma fogueira ou, em alguns lugares, o calor geotérmico torna partes do terreno naturalmente quentes. O hangi costuma ser utilizado para cozinhar um  tradicional jantar assado. Diversos lugares em Rotorua oferecem hangi geotérmico, enquanto outros hangi podem ser amostrados em Christchurch, Wellington e em outros lugares.
mt: A Hangi is a traditional Maori meal cooked in a heated pit. The pit is heated with hot stones taken from a fire or, in some places, the natural geothermal heat of the ground makes parts of the land naturally hot. The hangi is usually used to cook a traditional roast dinner. Several places in Rotorua offer geothermal hangi, while other hangi can be sampled in Christchurch, Wellington and other places.
ref: A Hangi Meal is cooked in a hot pit in the ground. The pit is either heated with hot stones from a fire, or in some places geothermal heat makes areas of ground naturally hot. The hangi is often used to cook a traditional roast style dinner. Several places in Rotorua offer geothermal hangi, while other hangi can be sampled in Christchurch, Wellington and elsewhere.

src: Enquanto visitam os mosteiros, as mulheres são obrigadas a usar saias cobrindo os joelhos e também precisam ter seus ombros cobertos. A maioria dos mosteiros fornece trajes para mulheres que chegam despreparadas, mas, se você trouxer os próprios trajes, especialmente com cores brilhantes, será recebida com um sorriso do monge ou da freira. De forma semelhante, exige-se que os homens usem calças cobrindo os joelhos. É possível pegar roupas emprestadas na entrada; contudo, elas não são lavadas após cada uso, portanto, talvez você não se sinta à vontade para usar estas saias. Para os homens, há um tamanho único!
mt: While visiting the monasteries, women are required to wear skirts covering the knees and also need to have their shoulders covered. Most of the monasteries provide attire for women who arrive unprepared, but if you bring your own attire, especially with bright colors, you will be greeted with a smile from the monk or nun. Similarly, men are required to wear pants covering the knees. It is possible to borrow clothes at the entrance; however, they are not washed after each use, so you may not feel comfortable wearing these skirts. For men, there is only one size!
ref: While visiting the monasteries, women are required to wear skirts covering the knees and have their shoulders covered, too. Most of the monasteries do provide wraps for women who come unprepared, but if you bring your own, especially one with bright colors, you'll get a smile from the monk or nun at the entrance. Along the same line, men are required to wear trousers covering the knees. This too can be borrowed from the stock at the entrance but that clothing isn't washed after every user so you may not feel comfortable wearing these skirts. One size fits all for men!

src: Se for visitar as áreas árticas ou antárticas no inverno, você vai experimentar a noite polar, o que significa que o sol não sobe acima do horizonte. Essa é uma ótima oportunidade de ver a aurora boreal, pois o céu fica escuro mais ou menos na hora certa. Como as áreas são pouco habitadas, e, consequentemente, a poluição luminosa não é um problema, você também poderá apreciar as estrelas.
mt: If you visit the Arctic or Antarctic regions in winter, you will experience polar night, which means the sun does not rise above the horizon. This is a great opportunity to see the aurora borealis, as the sky gets dark at about the right time. As the areas are sparsely populated, and consequently light pollution is not a problem, you will also be able to appreciate the stars.
ref: If you visit the Arctic or Antarctic areas in the winter you will experience the polar night, which means that the sun doesn't rise above the horizon. This offers a good opportunity to see the Aurora borealis, as the sky will be dark more or less around the clock. As the areas are sparsely populated, and light pollution therefore often not a problem, you will also be able to enjoy the stars.

src: Em locais remotos, sem cobertura de celulares, um telefone via satélite pode ser a sua única opção. Um telefone via satélite geralmente não substitui um telefone celular, já que para fazer uma chamada você precisa estar ao ar livre com vista para o satélite. O serviço é frequentemente usado para transporte, incluindo embarcações de recreação, bem como expedições que possuem necessidades remotas de dados e voz. Sua operadora local de telefonia poderá oferecer mais informações sobre a conexão a esse serviço.
mt: In remote areas without cell phone coverage, a satellite phone may be your only option. A satellite phone generally does not replace a cell phone, as to make a call you need to be outdoors with a view of the satellite. The service is often used for transportation, including recreational boats, as well as expeditions that have remote needs for data and voice. Your local phone company may offer more information about connecting to this service.
ref: In remote locations, without cell phone coverage, a satellite phone may be your only option. A satellite phone is not generally a replacement for a mobile phone, as you have to be outdoors with clear line of sight to the satellite to make a phone call. The service is frequently used by shipping, including pleasure craft, as well as expeditions who have remote data and voice needs. Your local telephone service provider should be able to give more information about connecting to this service.

src: A capital de Moldávia é Chisinau. A língua do país é o romeno, mas o russo é bastante usado. A Moldávia é uma república multiétnica que sofreu com conflitos étnicos. Em 1994, este conflito levou à criação da autoproclamada República da Transnístria no leste da Moldávia, que tem seu próprio governo e moeda, mas não é reconhecida por nenhum país membro da ONU. Relações econômicas foram restabelecidas entre essas duas partes da Moldávia, apesar da falha nas negociações políticas. A religião principal na Moldávia é o cristianismo ortodoxo.
mt: The capital of Moldova is Chisinau. The country's language is Romanian, but Russian is widely used. Moldova is a multiethnic republic that has suffered from ethnic conflicts. In 1994, this conflict led to the creation of the self-proclaimed Republic of Transnistria in eastern Moldova, which has its own government and currency, but is not recognized by any member of the UN. Economic relations were restored between these two parts of Moldova, despite the failure of political negotiations. The main religion in Moldova is Eastern Orthodox Christianity.
ref: The capital of Moldova is Chişinău. The local language is Romanian, but Russian is widely used. Moldova is a multi-ethnic republic that has suffered from ethnic conflict. In 1994, this conflict led to the creation of the self-proclaimed Transnistria Republic in eastern Moldova, which has its own government and currency but is not recognised by any UN member country. Economic links have been re-established between these two parts of Moldova despite the failure in political negotiations. The major religion in Moldova is Orthodox Christian.

src: "Como Montevidéu fica ao sul do equador, lá é verão, enquanto é inverno no hemisfério norte e vice-versa. Montevidéu está na região subtropical; nos meses de verão, temperaturas acima de 30 °C são comuns. O inverno pode ser decepcionantemente frio: as temperaturas raramente ficam abaixo do congelante, mas o vento e a umidade combinadas tornam a sensação mais fria que o que o termômetro mostra. Não existem estações particularmente ""chuvosas"" e ""secas"": a quantidade de chuva permanece basicamente a mesma durante o ano."
mt: "As Montevideo is south of the equator, it is summer there, while it is winter in the northern hemisphere and vice versa. Montevideo is in the subtropical region; in the summer months, temperatures above 30 °C are common. Winter can be disappointingly cold: temperatures rarely fall below freezing, but the wind and humidity combined make the feel colder than the thermometer shows. There are no particularly ""wet"" and ""dry"" seasons: the amount of rain remains basically the same throughout the year."
ref: "Since Montevideo is south of the Equator, it is summer there when it's winter in the Northern Hemisphere and vice versa. Montevideo is in the subtropics; in the summer months, temperatures above +30°C are common. The winter can be deceptively chilly: temperatures rarely go below freezing, but the wind and humidity combine to make it feel colder than what the thermometer says. There are no particular ""rainy"" and ""dry"" seasons: the amount of rain stays roughly the same throughout the year."

src: "Murais ou rabiscos indesejados são conhecidos como grafite. Embora esteja longe de ser um fenômeno moderno, a maioria das pessoas provavelmente o associa a jovens vandalizando propriedades públicas e privadas com sprays de tinta. Mas, atualmente há artistas de grafite consagrados, eventos de grafite e paredes ""autorizadas"". As pinturas de grafite nesse contexto geralmente parecem mais obras de arte em vez de desenhos irreconhecíveis."
mt: "Murals or unwanted scribbles are known as graffiti. Although it is far from being a modern phenomenon, most people probably associate it with young people vandalizing public and private property with spray paint. But, there are now established graffiti artists, graffiti events and ""authorized"" walls. Graffiti paintings in this context usually look more like art than unintelligible drawings."
ref: "Unwanted murals or scribble is known as graffiti. While it's far from a modern phenomenon, most people probably associate it with youth vandalizing public and private property using spray paint. However, nowadays there are established graffiti artists, graffiti events and ""legal"" walls. Graffiti paintings in this context often resemble artworks rather than illegible tags."

src: Em alguns festivais, a grande maioria dos participantes de festivais de música decide acampar no local, e a maioria deles considera isso uma parte fundamental da experiência. Se quiser ficar perto da ação, terá que chegar mais cedo para conseguir acampar perto da música. Lembre-se que, mesmo após o encerramento da música nos palcos principais, algumas seções do festival podem continuar tocando até tarde. Alguns festivais têm áreas especiais de acampamento para famílias com crianças pequenas.
mt: At some festivals, the majority of festival-goers decide to camp on site, and most consider this an integral part of the experience. If you want to be close to the action, you'll have to arrive earlier to get camping near the music. Remember that, even after the music on the main stages has ended, some sections of the festival may continue playing late. Some festivals have special camping areas for families with small children.
ref: For some festivals, the vast majority of the attendants to music festivals decide to camp on site, and most attendants consider it a vital part of the experience. If you want to be close to the action you're going to have to get in early to get a camping site close to the music. Remember that even though music on the main stages may have finished, there may be sections of the festival that will keep playing music until late into the night. Some festivals have special camping areas for families with young children.

src: Considerando que muitos dos povos são remotos, você não conseguirá encontrar uma quantidade significativa de vida noturna se não viajar para Albuquerque ou Santa Fé. Contudo, quase todos os cassinos listados acima servem bebidas, e vários deles oferecem entretenimento de qualidade (principalmente os grandes ao redor de Albuquerque e Santa Fé). Atenção: os bares das cidades pequenas, nestas redondezas, não são sempre os melhores locais para um visitante de fora do estado desfrutar. Por um lado, o norte do Novo México possui problemas significativos com embriaguez ao volante, e a concentração de motoristas embriagados é alta perto dos bares de pequenas cidades.
mt: Considering that many of the tribes are remote, you won't find a significant amount of nightlife unless you travel to Albuquerque or Santa Fe. However, almost all of the casinos listed above serve drinks, and several of them offer quality entertainment (especially the big ones around Albuquerque and Santa Fe). Note: the bars in small towns in these parts are not always the best places for an out-of-state visitor to enjoy. On the one hand, northern New Mexico has significant problems with drunk driving, and the concentration of drunk drivers is high near the bars of small towns.
ref: Given how remote many of the pueblos are, you won't be able to find a significant amount of nightlife without traveling to Albuquerque or Santa Fe. However, nearly all of the casinos listed above serve drinks, and several of them bring in name-brand entertainment (primarily the large ones immediately surrounding Albuquerque and Santa Fe). Beware: small-town bars here are not always good places for the out-of-state visitor to hang out. For one thing, northern New Mexico has significant problems with drunk driving, and the concentration of intoxicated drivers is high close to small-town bars.

src: "A principal cerveja local é a 'Number One'. Ela não é uma cerveja elaborada, mas é prazerosa e refrescante. A outra cerveja local se chama ""Manta"". Há muitos vinhos franceses para apreciar, mas os vinhos neozelandeses e australianos podem descer melhor. A água encanada local é totalmente segura para o consumo, mas é fácil encontrar água engarrafada se você tiver receio. Para os australianos, o conceito de café ""flat white"" é estranho. Um café preto curto é ""espresso"", o cappuccino vem cheio de creme (não espuma) e o chá é servido sem leite. O chocolate quente está de acordo com os padrões belgas. Os sucos naturais são caros, mas ótimos."
mt: "The local beer is 'Number One'. It's not a fancy beer, but it's enjoyable and refreshing. The other local beer is called 'Manta'. There are many French wines to enjoy, but New Zealand and Australian wines can be better. The local tap water is safe to drink, but bottled water is easy to find if you're worried. For Australians, the concept of a 'flat white' coffee is strange. A short black coffee is 'espresso', a cappuccino comes full of cream (not foam) and tea is served without milk. Hot chocolate is up to Belgian standards. Natural juices are expensive, but great."
ref: "The main local beer is 'Number One', it is not a complex beer, but pleasant and refreshing. The other local beer is called ""Manta"". There are many French wines to be had, but the New Zealand and Australian wines might travel better. The local tap water is perfectly safe to drink, but bottled water is easy to find if you are fearful. For Australians, the idea of 'flat white' coffee is foreign. A short black is 'espresso', cappuccino comes heaped high with cream (not froth), and tea is served without milk. The hot chocolate is up to Belgian standards. Fruit juices are pricey but excellent."

src: "Os Guarani eram o grupo indígena mais significativo que habitava o que hoje é o leste do Paraguai, vivendo como caçadores seminômades que também praticavam a agricultura de subsistência. A região de Chaco foi a casa de outros grupos de tribos indígenas, como os Guaicurus e os Paiaguás, que viviam da caça, da coleta e da pesca. No século XVI, o Paraguai, anteriormente denominado ""A Gigante Província das Índias"", surgiu do encontro dos conquistadores espanhóis com os grupos indígenas nativos. Os espanhóis iniciaram o período de colonização que durou três séculos. Desde a criação de Assunção em 1537, o Paraguai logrou êxito na permanência de muitas de suas características e identidade das populações indígenas."
mt: "The Guarani were the most significant indigenous group that inhabited what is now eastern Paraguay, living as semi-nomadic hunters who also practiced subsistence agriculture. The Chaco region was home to other indigenous tribes, such as the Guaicurus and the Paiaguás, who lived by hunting, gathering, and fishing. In the 16th century, Paraguay, previously known as the "Giant Province of the Indies", emerged from the meeting of Spanish conquerors with the native indigenous groups. The Spanish began the period of colonization that lasted three centuries. Since the founding of Asuncion in 1537, Paraguay has succeeded in maintaining many of its characteristics and identity of the indigenous populations."
ref: "The Guaraní were the most significant indigenous group inhabiting what is now Eastern Paraguay, living as semi-nomadic hunters who also practised subsistence agriculture. The Chaco region was home to other groups of indigenous tribes such as the Guaycurú and Payaguá, who survived by hunting, gathering and fishing. In the 16th century Paraguay, formerly called ""The Giant Province of the Indies"", was born as a result of the encounter of Spanish conquerors with the native indigenous groups. The Spaniards started the colonization period which lasted for three centuries. Since the foundation of Asunción in 1537, Paraguay has managed to keep a lot of its indigenous character and identity."

src: "Os parisienses possuem a reputação de serem egocêntricos, rudes e arrogantes. Embora isto muitas vezes seja apenas um estereótipo inadequado, a melhor maneira de se dar bem em Paris ainda é o bom comportamento, agir como alguém que seja ""bien élevé"" (bem-educado). Isso facilitará consideravelmente a viagem. O brusco exterior dos parisiense rapidamente desaparecerá, se você mostrar algumas cortesias básicas"
mt: "Parisians have a reputation for being egocentric, rude and arrogant. While this is often just an unfair stereotype, the best way to get along in Paris is still good behavior, acting like someone who is "bien élevé" (well-bred). This will go a long way towards making your trip easier. The brusque exterior of Parisians will quickly disappear if you show some basic courtesy"
ref: "Parisians have a reputation for being egocentric, rude and arrogant. While this is often only an inaccurate stereotype, the best way to get along in Paris still is to be on your best behavior, acting like someone who is ""bien élevé"" (well brought up). It will make getting about considerably easier. Parisians' abrupt exteriors will rapidly evaporate if you display some basic courtesies."

src: O MetroRail tem duas classes em trens urbanos e que percorrem a região da Cidade do Cabo: o MetroPlus (também chamado de Primeira Classe) e o Metro (chamado de Terceira Classe). MetroPlus oferece mais conforto e é menos lotado, porém é um pouco mais caro, embora mais barato do que os bilhetes comuns de metrô na Europa. Todo trem tem tanto os instrutores MetroPlus quanto os Metro. Os instrutores MetroPlus estão sempre no final do trem mais próximo de Cabo Verde.
mt: The MetroRail has two classes in urban trains and that run in the Cape Town area: the MetroPlus (also called First Class) and the Metro (called Third Class). MetroPlus offers more comfort and is less crowded, but is a little more expensive, although cheaper than the common metro tickets in Europe. Every train has both MetroPlus and Metro instructors. MetroPlus instructors are always at the end of the train closest to Cape Verde.
ref: MetroRail has two classes on commuter trains in and around Cape Town: MetroPlus (also called First Class) and Metro (called Third Class). MetroPlus is more comfortable and less crowded but slightly more expensive, though still cheaper than normal metro tickets in Europe. Every train has both MetroPlus and Metro coaches; the MetroPlus coaches are always on the end of the train nearest Cape Town.

src: Viajantes podem encontrar pragas animais com as quais não têm familiaridade nas regiões de onde vieram. As pragas podem estragar os alimentos, causar irritação ou, na pior das hipóteses, causar reações alérgicas, espalhar veneno ou transmitir infecções. As próprias doenças infecciosas, ou animais perigosos que podem machucar ou matar pessoas através da força, geralmente não se qualificam como pragas.
mt: Travelers may encounter animal pests with which they are unfamiliar in the regions from which they came. The pests may spoil food, cause irritation or, at worst, cause allergic reactions, spread poison or transmit infections. The very infectious diseases, or dangerous animals that can hurt or kill people through force, usually do not qualify as pests.
ref: Travellers may encounter animal pests that they are not familiar with in their home regions. Pests can spoil food, cause irritation, or in a worse case cause allergic reactions, spread venom, or transmit infections. Infectious diseases themselves, or dangerous animals that can injure or kill people by force, do not usually qualify as pests.

src: Cada lojinha de esquina está repleta duma confusa gama de cartões pré-pagos que podem ser usados nos orelhões ou nos telefones comuns. Embora a maioria dos cartões sirvam para fazer ligações para qualquer lugar, alguns se especializam em fornecer tarifas favoráveis para grupos de países específicos. O acesso a esses serviços geralmente é feito por meio de um número de telefone gratuito, e na maioria dos casos a ligação é feita de qualquer número de forma gratuita.
mt: Each corner store is full of a confusing range of prepaid cards that can be used in pay phones or common phones. Although most cards can be used to make calls to any place, some specialize in providing favorable rates for specific groups of countries. Access to these services is usually made through a free phone number, and in most cases the call is made from any number for free.
ref: Every corner store is filled with a confusing array of pre-paid phone cards that can be used from pay phones or ordinary telephones. While most cards are good for calling anywhere, some specialise in providing favourable call rates to specific groups of countries. Access to these services is often through a toll-free telephone number that can be called from most phones without charge.

Access to these services is often through a toll-free telephone number that can be called from most phones without charge.

src: O parque nacional Plitvice Lakes é altamente arborizado, principalmente com faias, abetos, e pinheiros, e apresenta uma mistura de vegetação alpina e mediterrânea. Há uma notável diversidade de comunidades de plantas, devido aos variados microclimas, solos diferentes e níveis diferentes ​​de altitude. A área também abriga uma grande variedade de especies de animais e aves. Animais raros podem ser e encontrados por lá, tais como ursos pardos europeus, lobos, águias, corujas, linces, gatos selvagens e tetrazes, assim como diversas outras espécies comuns
mt: The Plitvice Lakes National Park is heavily forested, mainly with beech, fir, and pine, and features a mix of alpine and Mediterranean vegetation. There is a notable diversity of plant communities, due to the varied microclimates, different soils, and different altitudes. The area also supports a wide variety of animal and bird species. Rare animals can be found there, such as brown bears, wolves, eagles, owls, lynxes, wildcats, and black grouse, as well as many other common species
ref: The Plitvice Lakes national park is heavily forested, mainly with beech, spruce, and fir trees, and features a mixture of Alpine and Mediterranean vegetation. It has a notably wide variety of plant communities, due to its range of microclimates, differing soils and varying levels of altitude. The area is also home to an extremely wide variety of animal and bird species. Rare fauna such as the European brown bear, wolf, eagle, owl, lynx, wild cat and capercaillie can be found there, along with many more common species

src: "As empresas de mídia rotineiramente mentem sobre o propósito disso, alegando que é para ""prevenir a pirataria"". Na verdade, as leis regionais não têm absolutamente nenhum efeito sobre a cópia ilegal; uma cópia bit-a-bit de um disco pode reproduzida perfeitamente em qualquer dispositivo em que o original funcione. O objetivo real é dar a essas empresas mais controle sobre seus mercados; é tudo uma questão fazer o dinheiro circular."
mt: "Media companies routinely lie about the purpose of this, claiming it is to ""prevent piracy"". In fact, regional laws have absolutely no effect on illegal copying; a bit-for-bit copy of a disc can be reproduced perfectly in any device in which the original works. The real goal is to give these companies more control over their markets; it's all about making the money circulate."
ref: "The media companies routinely lie about the purpose of this, claiming that it is to ""prevent piracy"". In fact, region codes have absolutely no effect on illegal copying; a bit-for-bit copy of a disk will play just fine on any device where the original will. The actual purpose is to give those companies more control over their markets; it's all about money spinning."

src: Embora o controle de imigração seja normalmente inexistente ou uma formalidade quando você chega em seu país, o controle aduaneiro pode ser um aborrecimento. Assegure-se de saber o que você pode e não pode trazer, e declare qualquer coisa acima dos limites legais.
mt: While immigration control is usually nonexistent or a formality when you arrive in your country, customs control can be a hassle. Make sure you know what you can and cannot bring, and declare anything above legal limits.
ref: While immigration check is usually absent or a formality when you arrive in your homeland, customs control can be a hassle. Make sure you know what you can and cannot bring in and declare anything over the legal limits.

src: Sendo o principal destino de escalada do Chile, o Vale do Cochamó é conhecido como o Yosemite da América do Sul, com uma variedade de grandes paredões e penhascos de granito. As reuniões incluem pontos de vista empolgantes dos picos. Alpinistas de todas as partes do mundo estão continuamente estabelecendo novas rotas dentre seu potencial infinito de paredões.
mt: Being the main climbing destination of Chile, the Cochamó Valley is known as the Yosemite of South America, with a variety of large granite cliffs and buttresses. The meetings include breathtaking views of the peaks. Climbers from all over the world are constantly establishing new routes among its infinite potential of cliffs.
ref: Cochamó Valley - Chile's premier climbing destination, known as the Yosemite of South America, with a variety of granite big walls and crags. Summits include breath-taking views from peaks. Climbers from all parts of the world are continually establishing new routes amongst its endless potential of walls.

src: Se o seu desejo é voar ao redor do mundo somente no Hemisfério Sul, a escolha de voos e destinos é menor devido à falta de rotas transoceânicas. Nenhuma companhia aérea cruza os três oceanos do hemisfério sul (e a SkyTeam não cruza nenhum deles). Entretanto, a Star Alliance cobre completamente, excluindo somente o leste do Pacífico Sul, de Santiago do Chile para o Taiti, em que o voo é através da LATAM Oneworld. Esse voo não é a única opção se você deseja pular o Pacífico Sul e a costa oeste da América do Sul (ver abaixo).
mt: If your wish is to fly around the world only in the Southern Hemisphere, the choice of flights and destinations is smaller due to the lack of transoceanic routes. No airline crosses the three oceans of the southern hemisphere (and SkyTeam does not cross any of them). However, the Star Alliance covers completely, excluding only the east of the South Pacific, from Santiago, Chile to Tahiti, where the flight is through the LATAM Oneworld. This flight is not the only option if you want to skip the South Pacific and the west coast of South America (see below).
ref: If you want to fly around the world completely in the Southern Hemisphere, the choice of flights and destinations is limited due to the lack of transoceanic routes. No airline alliance covers all three ocean crossings in the Southern Hemisphere (and SkyTeam covers none of the crossings). However, Star Alliance covers everything except the eastern South Pacific from Santiago de Chile to Tahiti, which is a LATAM Oneworld flight. This flight is not the only option if you want to skip the South Pacific and the west coast of South America. (see below)

src: "No mundo todo, existem cerca de 200 organizações de turismo em funcionamento. A maioria deles opera de forma independente. Sucessora da Global Running Tours, a Go Running Tours liga diversos fornecedores de ""sightrunning"" ao redor de quatro continentes diferentes. Com origem nos Tours de Corrida de Barcelona e no de Copenhague, não demorou para ganhar a companhia dos Tours de Corrida sediados em Praga e outras corridas."
mt: "Around the world, there are about 200 running tourism organizations in operation. Most of them operate independently. Successor to Global Running Tours, Go Running Tours links various sightrunning providers around four different continents. With origins in the Barcelona and Copenhagen Running Tours, it didn't take long to gain the company of the Prague Running Tours and other races."
ref: Internationally, there are nearly 200 running tour organizations. Most of them operate independently. The Global Running Tours successor, Go Running Tours networks dozens of sightrunning providers on four continents. With roots in Barcelona's Running Tours Barcelona and Copenhagen's Running Copenhagen, it was quickly joined by Running Tours Prague based in Prague and others.

src: "Os safáris são provavelmente a maior atração turística da África e menina dos olhos de muitos visitantes. O termo ""safari"", em seu uso coloquial, refere-se a viagens por terra para observar a impressionante vida selvagem africana, principalmente na savana. Alguns animais, como os elefantes e as girafas, têm a tendência de se aproximarem dos carros e o equipamento básico possibilita uma boa visualização. Os leões, guepardos e leopardos às vezes são tímidos, e você os verá melhor com binóculos. Também conhecido como ""caminhada na mata"", ""safári de caminhada"" ou ""passada"", um safári a pé equivale a caminhar, seja por poucas horas ou muitos dias."
mt: "Safaris are probably the biggest tourist attraction in Africa and the pride of many visitors. The term ""safari"", in its colloquial use, refers to land journeys to observe the impressive African wildlife, mainly in the savanna. Some animals, such as elephants and giraffes, tend to approach cars and the basic equipment allows for good viewing. Lions, cheetahs and leopards are sometimes shy, and you will see them better with binoculars. Also known as ""walk in the woods"", ""walking safari"" or ""stroll"", a walking safari is equivalent to walking, whether for a few hours or many days."
ref: "Safaris are perhaps the greatest tourism draw in Africa and the highlight for many visitors. The term safari in popular use refers to overland travel to view the stunning African wildlife, particularly on savanna. Some animals, such as elephants and giraffes, tend to approach closely to cars and standard equipment will allow good viewing. Lions, cheetahs and leopards are sometimes shy and you will see them better with binoculars. A walking safari (also called a ""bush walk"", ""hiking safari"", or going ""footing"") consists of hiking, either for a few hours or several days."

src: As excursões saem mais em conta para grupos maiores, então se você estiver sozinho ou com apenas um amigo, tente conhecer outras pessoas e formar um grupo de quatro a seis para conseguir uma tarifa mais baixa por pessoa. Porém, isso não deveria ser motivo de preocupação, porque muitas vezes os turistas vagueiam para abastecer os carros. Na verdade, parece ser uma forma de enganar as pessoas, levando-as a acreditarem que têm de pagar mais.
mt: Tours are cheaper for larger groups, so if you're alone or with just one friend, try to meet other people and form a group of four to six to get a lower per-person rate. However, this shouldn't be a concern, because many tourists wander around to refuel their cars. In fact, it seems to be a way to trick people into believing they have to pay more.
ref: Tours are cheaper for larger groups, so if you're by yourself or with just one friend, try to meet other people and form a group of four to six for a better per-person rate. However, this shouldn't really be off your concern, because often tourists are shuffled around to fill the cars. It seems actually to be more a way of tricking people into believing they have to pay more.

src: Apesar da economia de São Francisco estar relacionada ao fato de ser uma atração turística de classe mundial, sua economia é diversificada. Os maiores setores de emprego são: serviços profissionais, governo, financeiro, comércio e turismo. Sua aparição frequente na música, filmes, literatura e cultura popular ajudou a tornar a cidade e seus marcos conhecidos em todo o mundo. São Francisco desenvolveu uma grande infraestrutura turística com vários hotéis, restaurantes e centros de convenção de primeira linha. São Francisco é também um dos melhores lugares do país no que diz respeito a outras opções de culinária asiática: comida coreana, tailandesa, indiana e japonesa.
mt: Despite its economy being tied to the fact of being a world-class tourist attraction, its economy is diversified. The largest employment sectors are: professional services, government, finance, commerce and tourism. Its frequent appearance in music, films, literature and popular culture helped to make the city and its landmarks known worldwide. San Francisco developed a strong tourism infrastructure with several top-notch hotels, restaurants and convention centers. San Francisco is also one of the best places in the country in terms of other Asian cuisine options: Korean, Thai, Indian and Japanese.
ref: While San Francisco's economy is linked to it being a world-class tourist attraction, its economy is diversified. The largest employment sectors are professional services, government, finance, trade, and tourism. Its frequent portrayal in music, films, literature and popular culture has helped make the city and its landmarks known throughout the world. San Francisco has developed a large tourist infrastructure with numerous hotels, restaurants, and top-notch convention facilities. San Francisco is also one of the best places in the nation for other Asian cuisine: Korean, Thai, Indian, and Japanese.

src: A reservar antecipada dá ao viajante a tranquilidade de que terá um local para dormir ao chegar ao seu destino. Agentes de viagens costumam fazer negócios com hotéis específicos, por mais que provavelmente seja possível reservar outros tipos de acomodação, como parques de camping, por um agente de viagens. Os agentes de viagens geralmente oferecem pacotes que incluem café da manhã, transporte de e para o aeroporto, ou mesmo pacotes combinados com voos e hotéis. Eles também podem garantir a sua reserva se precisar de tempo para pensar na oferta ou reunir outros documentos para o seu destino (p. ex., visto). No entanto, se tiver alguma alteração ou solicitação, esta deve ser primeiro encaminhada para o agente de viagens, e não diretamente para o hotel.
mt: Reserving in advance gives the traveler the peace of mind that he will have a place to sleep upon arrival at his destination. Travel agents often do business with specific hotels, even though it is likely possible to reserve other types of lodging, such as campgrounds, through a travel agent. Travel agents usually offer packages that include breakfast, transportation to and from the airport, or even combined packages with flights and hotels. They can also guarantee your reservation if you need time to think about the offer or gather other documents for your destination (e.g., visa). However, if there is any change or request, this must first be directed to the travel agent, and not directly to the hotel.
ref: Booking in advance gives the traveller peace of mind that they will have somewhere to sleep once they arrive at their destination. Travel agents often have deals with specific hotels, although you may find it possible to book other forms of accommodation, like camping grounds, through a travel agent. Travel agents usually offer packages that include breakfast, transportation arrangements to/from the airport or even combined flight and hotel packages. They can also hold the reservation for you if you need time to think about the offer or procure other documents for your destination (e.g. visa). Any amendments or requests though should be coursed through the travel agent first and not directly with the hotel.

src: Apps de tradução de texto em tempo real - aplicativos que são capazes de traduzir automaticamente trechos inteiros de texto de um idioma para outro. Alguns dos aplicativos desta categoria podem inclusive traduzir textos em línguas estrangeiras em placas ou outros objetos do mundo real quando o usuário aponta o smartphone para esses objetos. Os mecanismos de tradução melhoraram drasticamente e agora geralmente dão traduções mais ou menos corretas (e mais raramente sem sentido), mas é preciso tomar cuidado, pois eles ainda podem ter entendido tudo errado. Um dos aplicativos mais importantes desta categoria é o Google Tradutor, que permite traduções off-line após o download dos dados do idioma desejado.
mt: Real-time text translation apps - apps that are able to automatically translate entire chunks of text from one language to another. Some of the apps in this category can even translate text in foreign languages on road signs or other real-world objects when the user points their smartphone at those objects. Translation mechanisms have improved drastically and now generally give translations that are more or less correct (and more rarely nonsensical), but caution is needed, as they may still have misunderstood everything. One of the most important apps in this category is Google Translate, which allows offline translations after downloading the data for the desired language.
ref: Real-time text translator apps – applications that are capable of automatically translating whole segments of text from one language into another. Some of the applications in this category can even translate texts in foreign languages on signs or other objects in the real world when the user points the smartphone towards those objects. The translation engines have improved dramatically, and now often give more or less correct translations (and more seldom gibberish), but some care is due, as they still may have gotten it all wrong. One of the most prominent apps in this category is Google Translate, which allows offline translation after downloading the desired language data.

ref: Real-time text translator apps – applications that are capable of automatically translating whole segments of text from one language into another. Some of the applications in this category can even translate texts in foreign languages on signs or other objects in the real world when the user points the smartphone towards those objects. The translation engines have improved dramatically, and now often give more or less correct translations (and more seldom gibberish), but some care is due, as they still may have gotten it all wrong. One of the most prominent apps in this category is Google Translate, which allows offline translation after downloading the desired language data.

src: Avalanches não são anormais; encostas íngremes conseguem conter apenas até certo ponto, sendo que o volume excedente cairá como avalanches. O problema é que a neve tem uma textura ​​pegajosa, portanto ela necessita de algo para acioná-la, e um pouco de neve caindo pode ser o suficiente para desencadear uma avalanche. Às vezes, o evento desencadeador original é o sol aquecendo a neve; às vezes, um pouco mais de nevasca; às vezes, outros eventos naturais, normalmente uma pessoa.
mt: Avalanches are not abnormal; steep slopes can only contain so much, and the excess will fall as avalanches. The problem is that snow has a sticky texture, so it needs something to trigger it, and a little bit of snow falling can be enough to trigger an avalanche. Sometimes the triggering event is the sun warming the snow; sometimes a little more snowfall; sometimes other natural events, usually a person.
ref: Avalanches are not an abnormality; steep slopes can hold only so much slow, and the excess volumes will come down as avalanches. The problem is that snow is sticky, so it needs some triggering to come down, and some snow coming down can be the triggering event for the rest. Sometimes the original trigging event is the sun warming the snow, sometimes some more snowfall, sometimes other natural events, often a human.

src: "Um curry é um prato à base de ervas e especiarias, juntas com carne ou vegetais. Um curry pode ser ""seco"" ou ""molhado"" dependendo da quantidade de líquido. Em regiões do interior do Norte da Índia e no Paquistão, o iogurte é comumente usado em curries; no Sul da Índia e em outras regiões costeiras do subcontinente, o leite de coco é comumente usado."
mt: "A curry is a dish based on spices and herbs, together with meat or vegetables. A curry can be ""dry"" or ""wet"" depending on the amount of liquid. In the interior regions of northern India and Pakistan, yogurt is commonly used in curries; in southern India and other coastal regions of the subcontinent, coconut milk is commonly used."
ref: "A curry is a dish based on herbs and spices, together with either meat or vegetables. A curry can be either ""dry"" or ""wet"" depending on the amount of liquid. In inland regions of Northern India and Pakistan, yogurt is commonly used in curries; in Southern India and some other coastal regions of the subcontinent, coconut milk is commonly used."

src: A Travessia do Polo Sul (ou Estrada) é uma trilha de 1.600 km da Estação de McMurdo, localizada no Mar de Ross, até o Polo. É neve compactada com fendas preenchidas e marcadas por bandeiras. Só pode ser percorrido por tratores especializados, transportando trenós com combustível e suprimentos. Como não têm muita agilidade, é preciso dar uma grande volta ao redor das Montanhas Transantárticas para chegar até o planalto.
mt: The South Pole Traverse (or Road) is a 1,600 km trail from McMurdo Station, located in the Ross Sea, to the Pole. It is compacted snow with filled and marked crevasses by flags. It can only be traversed by specialized tractors, carrying sleds with fuel and supplies. As they are not very agile, it is necessary to make a large detour around the Transantarctic Mountains to reach the plateau.
ref: The South Pole Traverse (or Highway) is a 1600 km trail from McMurdo Station on the Ross Sea to the Pole. It's compacted snow with crevasses filled in and marked by flags. It can only be traveled by specialized tractors, hauling sleds with fuel and supplies. These aren't very nimble so the trail has to take a long swerve around the Transantarctic Mountains to come onto the plateau.

src: Entrar na África do Sul de carro é uma maneira maravilhosa de conhecer as belezas da região e de encontrar lugares fora das rotas turísticas comuns. Isso pode ser feito em um carro regular com um planejamento com cuidado, mas um 4x4 é bastante recomendado e diversos locais são acessíveis só com uma distância alta entre eixos 4x4. Tenha em mente que, embora a África Austral seja estável, nem todos os países vizinhos o são. As exigências, requisitos e custos do visto podem variar de país a país, e eles também são afetados pelo seu país de onde você é proveniente. Cada país também tem leis exclusivas que determinam quais itens de emergência que devem estar no veículo.
mt: Entering South Africa by car is a wonderful way to see the region's beauty and find places off the common tourist routes. This can be done in a regular car with careful planning, but a 4x4 is highly recommended and many places are only accessible with a high ground clearance 4x4. Keep in mind that, although Southern Africa is stable, not all neighboring countries are. The requirements, requirements and costs of the visa may vary from country to country, and they are also affected by your country of origin. Each country also has exclusive laws that determine which emergency items must be in the vehicle.
ref: Entering Southern Africa by car is an amazing way to see all the region's beauty as well as to get to places off the normal tourist routes. This can be done in a normal car with careful planning but a 4x4 is highly advised and many locations are only accessible with a high wheel base 4x4. Keep in mind while planning that although Southern Africa is stable not all neighboring countries are. Visa requirements and costs vary from nation to nation and are affected by the country you come from. Each country also has unique laws requiring what emergency items need to be in the car.

src: Carregar para os outros - Nunca perca sua bagagem de vista, especialmente quando atravessar fronteiras internacionais. Podem usar você como traficante de drogas sem seu conhecimento, o que lhe deixará em uma situação bastante problemática. Isso inclui a espera na fila, já que cães farejadores podem ser usados a qualquer momento sem aviso prévio. Alguns países têm punições extremamente draconianas, inclusive para réus primários; elas podem incluir sentenças de prisão de mais de 10 anos ou até pena de morte. Bagagens desacompanhadas são alvo de roubo e também podem atrair a atenção das autoridades atentas às ameaças de bombas.
mt: Carry on for others - Never lose sight of your baggage, especially when crossing international borders. They may use you as a drug mule without your knowledge, leaving you in a very problematic situation. This includes waiting in line, as sniffer dogs may be used at any time without prior notice. Some countries have extremely draconian punishments, including for first offenders; they may include sentences of more than 10 years or even death penalty. Unaccompanied baggage is a target for theft and may also attract the attention of vigilant authorities to bomb threats.
ref: Carrying for others - Never let your bags out of your sight, especially when you are crossing international borders. You could find yourself being used as a drug carrier without your knowledge, which will land you in a great deal of trouble. This includes waiting in line, as drug-sniffing dogs could be used at any time without notice. Some countries have exceedingly draconian punishments even for first time offenses; these can include prison sentences of over 10 years or death. Unattended bags are a target for theft and can also attract attention from authorities wary of bomb threats.

src: Enriqueça sua vida com um belo café da manhã e um chá de camomila para relaxar à noite. Quando você está de folga, tem tempo para cuidar de si mesmo e tirar alguns minutos extras para preparar algo especial. Se você se sente mais aventureiro, aproveite para preparar um suco ou algumas batidas: talvez você descubra uma bebida simples que você possa fazer no café da manhã, quando retornar à sua rotina diária. Se você vive em uma cidade com uma cultura de bebidas variadas, vá a bares ou pubs em bairros que você não frequenta.
mt: Enrich your life with a beautiful breakfast and a chamomile tea to relax at night. When you're on vacation, you have time to take care of yourself and take a few extra minutes to prepare something special. If you feel more adventurous, take advantage of preparing a juice or smoothies: maybe you'll discover a simple drink that you can make for breakfast when you return to your daily routine. If you live in a city with a culture of varied drinks, go to bars or pubs in neighborhoods you don't frequent.
ref: Fill your home with a rich coffee in the morning and some relaxing chamomile tea at night. When you're on a staycation, you have the time to treat yourself and take a few extra minutes to brew up something special. If you're feeling more adventurous, take the opportunity to juice or blend up some smoothies: maybe you'll discover a simple beverage that you can make for breakfast when you're back to your daily routine. If you live in a city with a varied drinking culture, go to bars or pubs in neighborhoods you don't frequent.

src: O vilarejo de Haldarsvík oferece vistas da ilha vizinha Eysturoy e tem uma igreja octogonal incomum. No adro da igreja, há interessantes esculturas em mármore de pombas sobre tumbas de pessoas. Vale a pena caminhar meia hora pela intrigante vila.
mt: The village of Haldarsvík offers views of the neighboring island of Eysturoy and has an unusual octagonal church. In the churchyard, there are interesting marble sculptures of doves on the tombs of people. It's worth walking half an hour through the intriguing village.
ref: The village of Haldarsvík offer views of the nearby island Eysturoy and has an unusual octagonal church. In the churchyard, there are interesting marble sculptures of doves over some tombs. It's worth half an hour to stroll about the intriguing village.

src: Mesmo que você não precise de visto para visitas curtas a determinados países como turista ou a negócios, ir para lá como estudante internacional geralmente requer uma estadia maior do que ir para lá apenas como um turista casual. Em geral, permanecer em qualquer país estrangeiro por um período de tempo prolongado exigirá que você obtenha um visto com antecedência. Geralmente, os vistos de estudante têm requisitos e procedimentos de solicitação diferentes dos vistos de turismo ou negócio normais. Para a maioria dos países, você irá precisar de uma carta de oferta da instituição onde deseja estudar, além de comprovar ter recursos para se manter por pelo menos o primeiro ano do curso. Consulte a instituição, assim como o departamento de imigração do país onde deseja estudar, para saber as exigências em detalhes.
mt: Even if you don't need a visa for short visits to certain countries as a tourist or for business, going there as an international student will usually require a longer stay than just going there as a casual tourist. In general, staying in any foreign country for an extended period of time will usually require that you obtain a visa in advance. Student visas usually have different requirements and application procedures than normal tourist or business visas. For most countries, you will need to provide an offer letter from the institution where you wish to study, as well as proof of having sufficient resources to support yourself for at least the first year of the course. Consult the institution, as well as the immigration department of the country where you wish to study, for details on the requirements.
ref: While you may not need a visa for short visits to certain countries as a tourist or for business, going there as an international student generally requires a longer stay than going there just as a casual tourist. In general, staying in any foreign country for an extended period of time will require you to obtain a visa in advance. Student visas generally have different requirements and application procedures from normal tourist or business visas. For most countries, you will need an offer letter from the institution you wish to study at, and also evidence of funds to support yourself for at least the first year of your course. Check with the institution, as well as the immigration department for the country you wish to study in for detailed requirements.

src: No verão, especialmente, você precisará ter atenção aos mosquitos se decidir fazer uma caminhada pela floresta tropical. Mesmo se estiver dirigindo em uma floresta subtropical, alguns segundos com as portas abertas enquanto entra no carro é tempo suficiente para os mosquitos entrarem no carro com você.
mt: In the summer, especially, you'll need to be mindful of mosquitoes if you decide to take a walk through the tropical forest. Even if you're driving in a subtropical forest, a few seconds with the doors open while you get in the car is enough time for the mosquitoes to enter the car with you.
ref: In summer, especially, you'll need to watch out for mosquitoes if you decide to hike through the rainforest. Even if you're driving through the subtropical rainforest, a few seconds with the doors open while you get inside the vehicle is enough time for mosquitoes to get in the vehicle with you.

src: Sundarbans é a maior faixa de manguezais do mundo, se estendendo por 80 km (50 mi) em direção ao interior de Bangladesh e da Índia a partir do litoral. O Sundarbans foi declarado Patrimônio Mundial da UNESCO. A parte da floresta dentro do território indiano é chamada de Parque Nacional Sundarbans Mas as florestas não contam só com pântanos de mangue - elas têm algumas das últimas grandes selvas que já cobriram a superfície gangética restantes. O Sundarbans cobre uma extensão de 3.850 km², sendo que um terço dele está coberto por áreas de água/pântano. Desde 1966, os Sundarbans são um santuário da vida selvagem, e estima-se que existam atualmente 400 tigres-de-bengala e cerca de 30.000 cervos avistados na área.
mt: Sundarbans is the largest mangrove forest in the world, extending 80 km (50 mi) inland from the coast of Bangladesh and India. The Sundarbans was declared a UNESCO World Heritage Site. The part of the forest within Indian territory is called the Sundarbans National Park but the forests don't just consist of mangrove swamps - they have some of the last great forests that once covered the remaining Ganges delta. The Sundarbans covers an area of 3,850 km², with a third of it covered by water/marsh. Since 1966, the Sundarbans have been a wildlife sanctuary, and it is estimated that there are currently 400 Bengal tigers and about 30,000 spotted deer in the area.
ref: The Sundarbans are the largest littoral mangrove belt in the world, stretching 80 km (50 mi) into the Bangladeshi and Indian hinterland from the coast. The Sundarbans has been declared a UNESCO World Heritage Site. The part of the forest within Indian territory is called Sundarbans National Park. The forests aren't just mangrove swamps though — they include some of the last remaining stands of the mighty jungles which once covered the Gangetic plain. The Sundarbans cover an area of 3,850 km², of which about one-third is covered in water/marsh areas. Since 1966 the Sundarbans have been a wildlife sanctuary, and it is estimated that there are now 400 Royal Bengal tigers and about 30,000 spotted deer in the area.

src: O mundo tem mais de 5.000 idiomas diferentes, incluindo mais de vinte com 50 milhões de falantes ou mais. Palavras escritas também são, geralmente, mais fáceis de serem compreendidas do que palavras faladas. Isso aplica-se particularmente no caso de endereços, que costumam ser difíceis de serem pronunciados de maneira inteligível. Diversas nações inteiras são completamente fluentes em inglês e, em muitas outras, você pode esperar um conhecimento limitado — especialmente entre pessoas mais jovens. Imagine, se conseguir, uma pessoa de Manchester, uma de Boston, uma da Jamaica e uma de Sydney jantando em um restaurante de Toronto. Eles estão se entretendo com histórias das suas cidades natais, contadas em seus sotaques e jargões locais bem distintos.
mt: The world has more than 5,000 different languages, including more than twenty with 50 million speakers or more. Written words are also generally easier to be understood than spoken words. This applies particularly in the case of addresses, which are often difficult to be pronounced intelligibly. Entire nations are completely fluent in English, and in many others you can expect a limited knowledge — especially among younger people. Imagine, if you can, a person from Manchester, one from Boston, one from Jamaica and one from Sydney dining in a restaurant in Toronto. They are entertaining each other with stories from their hometowns, told in their distinct local accents and slang.
ref: The world has over 5,000 different languages, including more than twenty with 50 million or more speakers. Written words are often easier to understand than spoken words, also. This is especially true of addresses, which are often difficult to pronounce intelligibly. Many entire nations are completely fluent in English, and in even more you can expect a limited knowledge - especially among younger people. Imagine, if you will, a Mancunian, Bostonian, Jamaican and Sydneysider sitting around a table having dinner at a restaurant in Toronto. They're regaling each other with stories from their hometowns, told in their distinct accents and local argot.

Palavras escritas também são, geralmente, mais fáceis de serem compreendidas do que palavras faladas. Isso aplica-se particularmente no caso de endereços, que costumam ser difíceis de serem pronunciados de maneira inteligível. Diversas nações inteiras são completamente fluentes em inglês e, em muitas outras, você pode esperar um conhecimento limitado — especialmente entre pessoas mais jovens. Imagine, se conseguir, uma pessoa de Manchester, uma de Boston, uma da Jamaica e uma de Sydney jantando em um restaurante de Toronto. Eles estão se entretendo com histórias das suas cidades natais, contadas em seus sotaques e jargões locais bem distintos.

src: Existem vários horários de saída de ônibus da estação rodoviária interdistrital (do outro lado do rio) durante o dia, mas a maioria, especialmente os que vão para o leste e Jakar/Bumthang, sai entre 06:30 e 07:30. Como os ônibus interdistritais estão quase sempre lotados, é aconselhável comprar a passagem com alguns dias de antecedência. A maioria dos distritos é servida por micro-ônibus costeiros japoneses, que são confortáveis e resistentes. Os táxis compartilhados são um meio rápido e confortável de viajar para lugares próximos, como Paro (Nu 150) e Punakha (Nu 200).
mt: There are several bus departures from the inter-district bus station (on the other side of the river) during the day, but most, especially those going east and Jakar/Bumthang, leave between 06:30 and 07:30. As inter-district buses are almost always full, it is advisable to buy the ticket with a few days in advance. Most districts are served by Japanese coastal microbuses, which are comfortable and sturdy. Shared taxis are a quick and comfortable way to travel to nearby places, such as Paro (Nu 150) and Punakha (Nu 200).
ref: Buses depart the inter-district bus station (across the river) throughout the day, though most, especially those heading to the east and Jakar/Bumthang leave between 06:30 and 07:30. As the inter-district buses are often full, it is advisable to purchase a ticket a few days in advance. Most districts are served by small Japanese Coaster Buses, which are comfortable and sturdy. Shared taxis are a quick and comfortable means to travel to nearby places, such as Paro (Nu 150) and Punakha (Nu 200).

src: """Timbuktu"" passou a ser utilizado como uma metáfora para se referir a terras distantes e exóticas, tendo em vista sua relativa inacessibilidade. Hoje, Timbuktu é uma cidade empobrecida apesar de sua reputação torná-la uma atração turística, e ela tem um aeroporto. No ano de 1990, foi colocado na lista de patrimônios da humanidade em ameaça, devido ao perigo das areias do deserto. Foi uma das principais paradas durante o programa Wonders of the African World de Henry Louis Gates, transmitida pelo canal PBS. A cidade contrasta fortemente com o resto do país porque tem um toque mais árabe do que africano."
mt: """Timbuktu"" became a metaphor for referring to distant and exotic lands, given its relative inaccessibility. Today, Timbuktu is a poor city despite its reputation as a tourist attraction, and it has an airport. In 1990, it was placed on the list of World Heritage in danger, due to the danger of desert sands. It was one of the main stops during the Wonders of the African World program by Henry Louis Gates, broadcast by PBS. The city contrasts strongly with the rest of the country because it has a more Arab than African touch."
ref: "Combined with its relative inaccessibility, ""Timbuktu"" has come to be used as a metaphor for exotic, distant lands. Today, Timbuktu is an impoverished town, although its reputation makes it a tourist attraction, and it has an airport. In 1990, it was added to the list of world heritage sites in danger, due to the threat of desert sands. It was one of the major stops during Henry Louis Gates' PBS special Wonders of the African World. The city is in stark contrast to the rest of the country's cities, because it has more of an Arabic flair than of an African."

src: As Paraolimpíadas ocorrerão entre 24 de agosto e 5 de setembro de 2021. Alguns eventos serão sediados em outras localidades por todo o Japão. Tóquio será a única cidade da Ásia a ter sediado duas Olimpíadas de Verão, tendo sido sede dos jogos em 1964. Se você agendou seus voos e acomodação para 2020 antes de o adiamento ser anunciado, você pode ter uma situação complicada. As políticas de cancelamento variam, mas no final de março a maioria das políticas de cancelamento por causa do coronavírus não se estenderam até julho de 2020, quando as Olimpíadas foram agendadas. Se espera que a maioria dos ingressos para os eventos custe entre 2.500 e 130.000 ienes, com os ingressos normais custando cerca de 7.000 ienes.
mt: 2020 Summer Paralympics will be held between August 24 and September 5, 2021. Some events will be held in other locations across Japan. Tokyo will be the only Asian city to have hosted two Summer Olympics, having hosted the games in 1964. If you have booked your flights and accommodation for 2020 before the postponement was announced, you may have a complicated situation. Cancellation policies vary, but by the end of March, most cancellation policies due to the coronavirus did not extend until July 2020, when the Olympics were scheduled. It is expected that most tickets for the events will cost between 2,500 and 130,000 yen, with normal tickets costing about 7,000 yen.
ref: The Paralympics will take place from 24 August to 5 September 2021. Some events will be held in other locations throughout Japan. Tokyo will be the only Asian city to have hosted two summer Olympics, having hosted the games in 1964. If you booked your flights and accommodation for 2020 before the postponement was announced, you may have a tricky situation. Cancellation policies vary, but as of late March most coronavirus-based cancellation policies don't extend to July 2020, when the Olympics had been scheduled. It's expected that most event tickets will cost between ¥2,500 and ¥130,000, with typical tickets costing around ¥7,000.

src: "Um tornado é uma coluna de ar giratória de pressão muito baixa, que suga o ar circundante para dentro e para cima. Eles provocam ventos fortes (geralmente 100-200 milhas/hora) e podem levantar objetos pesados no ar, carregando-os à medida que o tornado se move. Eles começam como funis descendo das nuvens de tempestades e tornam ""tornados"" quando tocam o solo."
mt: "A tornado is a rotating column of low-pressure air that sucks in the surrounding air and rises. They cause strong winds (usually 100-200 mph) and can lift heavy objects into the air as they move. They start as funnels descending from storm clouds and become ""tornadoes"" when they touch the ground."
ref: "A tornado is a spinning column of very low-pressure air, which sucks the surrounding air inward and upward. They generate high winds (often 100-200 miles/hour) and can lift heavy objects into the air, carrying them as the tornado moves. They begin as funnels descending from storm clouds, and become ""tornadoes"" when they touch the ground."

src: Se o país que você visitará estiver sujeito à orientações de viagem, o seu seguro de saúde de viagem ou o seu seguro de cancelamento de viagem podem ser afetados. Também é recomendável que você consulte outros governos além do seu, mas o aconselhamento deles é feito para os respectivos cidadãos. Por exemplo, cidadãos americanos no Oriente Médio podem passar por situações diferentes das enfrentadas por europeus ou árabes. Conselhos são somente um breve resumo da situação política em uma nação. Os pontos de vista apresentados são normalmente superficiais, gerais e simplificados em relação com as mais detalhadas informações disponíveis em outros lugares.
mt: If the country you are visiting is subject to travel advisories, your travel health insurance or your travel cancellation insurance may be affected. It is also recommended that you consult other governments besides your own, but their advice is given to their respective citizens. For example, American citizens in the Middle East may face different situations than those faced by Europeans or Arabs. Advice is usually a brief summary of the political situation in a nation. The views presented are usually superficial, general and simplified in relation to the more detailed information available elsewhere.
ref: If the country you will be visiting becomes subject to a travel advisory, your travel health insurance or your trip cancellation insurance may be affected. You may also wish to consult the advice of governments other than your own, but their advice is designed for their citizens. As one example, American citizens in the Middle East might face different situations from Europeans or Arabs. Advisories are merely a brief summary of the political situation in one country. The views presented are often cursory, general and oversimplified compared to the more detailed information available elsewhere.

src: As agências de viagens existem desde o século XIX. Um agente de viagens geralmente é uma boa pedida para uma viagem que vai além da experiência anterior do viajante com a natureza, a cultura, o idioma ou com países de baixa renda. Apesar da maior parte das agências estar disposta a aceitar a maioria das reservas comuns, muitos agentes se especializam em determinados tipos de viagens, orçamentos ou destinos. Pode ser melhor ter um agente que costuma reservar viagens semelhantes às suas. Veja quais pacotes o agente está promovendo, seja no site ou na vitrine da agência.
mt: Travel agencies have existed since the 19th century. A travel agent is usually a good bet for a trip that goes beyond the traveler's previous experience with nature, culture, language or low-income countries. Despite the majority of agencies being willing to accept most common reservations, many agents specialize in certain types of trips, budgets or destinations. It may be better to have an agent who usually books similar trips to yours. See what packages the agent is promoting, whether on the site or the agency's window.
ref: Travel agencies have been around since the 19th century. A travel agent is usually a good option for a journey which extends beyond a traveller's previous experience of nature, culture, language or low-income countries. Although most agencies are willing to take on most regular bookings, many agents specialise in particular types of travel, budget ranges or destinations. It can be better to use an agent who frequently books similar trips to yours. Take a look at what trips the agent is promoting, whether on a website or in a shop window.

src: "Há muitas coisas que você deve levar em consideração antes e quando você viaja para algum lugar. Quando você viaja, espera que as coisas não sejam como são ""em casa"". Maneiras, leis, comida, trânsito, hospedagem, normas, idioma e assim por diante vão, até certo ponto, diferir do local onde você vive. Isso é algo que você sempre precisa recordar para evitar decepções, ou talvez, até um desgosto com os modos locais de fazer as coisas."
mt: "There are many things you should consider before and when you travel to some place. When you travel, expect things not to be like they are ""at home"". Manners, laws, food, traffic, lodging, norms, language and so on will, to some extent, differ from the place where you live. This is something you always need to remember to avoid disappointments, or perhaps, even a disgust with the local ways of doing things."
ref: "There are many things you have to take into consideration before and when you travel somewhere. When you travel, expect things not to be like they are ""back home"". Manners, laws, food, traffic, lodging, standards, language and so on will to some extent differ from where you live. This is something you always need to keep in mind, to avoid disappointment or perhaps even distaste over local ways to do things."
