src: Se você for viajar para um país em desenvolvimento pela primeira vez - ou para um novo local - não subestime passar por um possível choque cultural. Muitos viajantes experientes e habilidosos são tomados pelas novidades dos países em desenvolvimento, onde muitos ajustes culturais pequenos podem se somar rapidamente. Principalmente nos primeiros dias, pense em gastar em hotéis, comidas e serviços de boa qualidade e de estilo ocidental para ajudar a entrar no clima. Não durma em colchão ou almofada no chão em áreas onde você não sabe sobre a fauna local. Se você for acampar do lado de fora, leve uma maca de acampamento ou rede para te manter longe de cobras, escorpiões e coisas do tipo.
mt: If you are traveling to a developing country for the first time - or to a new location - don't underestimate the possibility of culture shock. Many experienced and savvy travelers are taken aback by the novelties of developing countries, where many small cultural adjustments can quickly add up. Especially in the first few days, think of spending on good quality and western-style hotels, food and services to help you get into the swing of things. Don't sleep on a mattress or pillow on the ground in areas where you don't know about the local fauna. If you are camping outdoors, bring a camping cot or net to keep you away from snakes, scorpions and the like.
ref: If traveling in a developing country for the first time – or in a new part of the world – don't underestimate the potential culture shock. Many a stable, capable traveler has been overcome by the newness of developing world travel, where many little cultural adjustments can add up quickly. Especially in your initial days, consider splurging on Western-style and -quality hotels, food, and services to help acclimatize. Do not sleep on a mattress or pad on the ground in areas where you do not know the local fauna. If you are going to camp out, bring a camp cot or hammock to keep you away from snakes, scorpions and such.

src: Faça e carregue cópias da sua apólice e do contato da sua seguradora com você. Eles precisam mostrar o endereço de e-mail da seguradora e números de telefone internacionais para conselhos/autorizações e para fazer reivindicações. Tenha outra cópia na sua mala e online (e-mail para si mesmo com anexo, ou armazenado na “nuvem”). Se você for viajar com um laptop ou um tablet, armazene uma cópia em sua memória ou em seu disco rígido (acessível sem internet). Além disso, dê cópias da apólice e dos contatos para companheiros de viagem e parentes ou amigos dispostos a ajudar.
mt: Make and carry copies of your policy and your insurer's contact information with you. They need to show the insurer's email address and international phone numbers for councils/authorizations and to make claims. Have another copy in your bag and online (email to yourself with attachment, or stored in the "cloud"). If you are traveling with a laptop or a tablet, store a copy in your memory or in your hard drive (accessible without internet). In addition, give copies of the policy and contacts to traveling companions and relatives or friends willing to help.
ref: "Make and carry copies of your policy and your insurer's contact details with you. They need to show the insurer's e-mail address and international phone numbers for advice/authorizations and making claims. Have another copy in your luggage and online (e-mail to yourself with attachment, or stored in the ""cloud""). If traveling with a laptop or tablet, store a copy in its memory or disc (accessible without the internet). Also give policy/contact copies to traveling companions and relatives or friends back home willing to help."

src: Há diversos vários formatos de filme que têm sido utilizados com ao recorrer do tempo. O filme de 35 mm padrão (negativo de 36 por 24 mm) é o formato mais comum. Quase sempre, ela é muito fácil de ser reabastecida se você ficar sem e permite uma resolução quase comparável a uma DSLR atual. Algumas câmeras de filme de tamanho médio usam um formato de 6 por 6 cm, mais precisamente um negativo de 56 por 56 mm. Isso resulta em uma resolução praticamente quatro vezes maior do que a de um negativo com medida de 35 mm (3136 mm2 contra 864).
mt: 35 mm film (negative 36 by 24 mm) is the most common format. It is very easy to reload if you run out and allows a resolution almost comparable to a current DSLR. Some medium-format cameras use a 6 by 6 cm format, more precisely a negative 56 by 56 mm. This results in a resolution practically four times greater than a 35 mm negative (3136 mm2 against 864).
ref: There are many different film formats that have been used over the years. Standard 35 mm film (36 by 24 mm negative) is much the commonest. It can usually be replenished fairly easily if you run out, and gives resolution roughly comparable to a current DSLR. Some medium-format film cameras use a 6 by 6 cm format, more precisely a 56 by 56 mm negative. This gives resolution almost four times that of a 35 mm negative (3136 mm2 versus 864).

src: "A forma mais fácil de começar no ramo de ""escrever sobre viagens"" é aperfeiçoar suas habilidades num blogue de viagem que já esteja estabelecido. Você poderá montar o próprio site após se familiarizar com formatação e edição na web."
mt: "The easiest way to get started in the field of ""writing about travel"" is to improve your skills on an established travel blog. You can set up your own site after familiarizing yourself with web formatting and editing."
ref: The easiest way to get started in the business of travel writing is to hone your skills on an established travel blog website. After you become comfortable with formatting and editing on the web, then later, you might create your own website.

mt: "The easiest way to get started in the field of ""writing about travel"" is to improve your skills on an established travel blog. You can set up your own site after familiarizing yourself with web formatting and editing."
ref: The easiest way to get started in the business of travel writing is to hone your skills on an established travel blog website. After you become comfortable with formatting and editing on the web, then later, you might create your own website.

src: Devido a constante exposição aos germes que existem em sua própria casa, há grandes chances de você já ser imune a eles. Mas em outras partes do mundo, onde a fauna bacteriológica é nova para você, é bem mais provável que você encontre problemas. Além disso, em climas mais quentes, as bactérias crescem com mais rapidez e sobrevivem por mais tempo fora do corpo. Assim, as maldições de Delhi Belly, a Maldição do Faraó, a Vingança de Montezuma e seus vários amigos. Semelhante ao que acontece em climas mais frios, quando surgem muitos problemas respiratórios, os problemas intestinais em climas quentes são bastante comuns e, na maioria dos casos, são muito desconfortáveis, mas raramente perigosos.
mt: Due to constant exposure to germs that exist in your own home, there are great chances that you are already immune to them. But in other parts of the world, where the bacterial fauna is new to you, it is much more likely that you will encounter problems. In addition, in warmer climates, bacteria grow faster and survive longer outside the body. So, the curses of Delhi Belly, the Curse of the Pharaoh, the Revenge of Montezuma and their various friends. Similar to what happens in colder climates, when there are many respiratory problems, intestinal problems in warmer climates are quite common and, in most cases, are very uncomfortable, but rarely dangerous.
ref: At home, due to this constant exposure to the local germs, odds are very high that you're already immune to them. But in other parts of the world, where the bacteriological fauna are new to you, you're far more likely to run into problems. Also, in warmer climates bacteria both grow more quickly and survive longer outside the body. Thus the scourges of Delhi Belly, the Pharaoh's Curse, Montezuma's Revenge, and their many friends. As with respiratory problems in colder climates, intestinal problems in hot climates are fairly common and in most cases are distinctly annoying but not really dangerous.

src: A Europa é um continente relativamente pequeno mas com muitos países independentes. Em circunstâncias normais, viajar por vários países significaria ter que passar por pedidos de visto e controle de passaporte várias vezes. A zona Schengen, no entanto, funciona como um país nesse aspecto. Se você ficar nessa área, é possível cruzar a fronteira sem passar por postos de controle de passaporte novamente. Da mesma forma, possuindo um visto de Schengen, você não precisará candidatar-se para vistos para cada um dos países-membros do espaço Schengen separadamente, economizando, assim, tempo, dinheiro e papelada.
mt: Europe is a relatively small continent with many independent countries. In normal circumstances, traveling through several countries would mean having to go through visa requests and passport control several times. The Schengen area, however, works as a country in this aspect. If you stay in this area, you can cross the border without going through passport control again. Similarly, possessing a Schengen visa, you will not need to apply for visas for each of the member countries of the Schengen area separately, thus saving time, money and paperwork.
ref: Europe is a continent that is relatively small but with many independent countries. Under normal circumstances, travelling through multiple countries would mean having to go through visa applications and passport control multiple times. The Schengen zone, however, works somewhat like one country in this respect. As long as you stay in this zone, you can generally cross borders without going through passport control checkpoints again. Similarly, by having a Schengen visa, you do not need to apply for visas to each of the Schengen member countries separately, hence saving time, money and paperwork.

src: A Tumba de Tutancâmon (KV62). A KV62 provavelmente é a mais famosa das tumbas no Vale, cenário da descoberta da sepultura real quase intacta do jovem rei por Howard Carter em 1922. Entretanto, quase não vale a pena a visita à tumba de Tutancâmon em comparação com a maioria das outras sepulturas reais, pois é muito menor e tem decoração limitada. Quem estiver interessado em ver evidências dos danos causados à múmia durante as tentativas de retirá-la do caixão ficará desapontado, pois apenas a cabeça e os ombros são visíveis. As fabulosas riquezas da tumba não encontram-se mais nela, mas foram removidas para o Museu Egípcio, no Cairo. Visitantes com horário limitado fariam melhor em passar seu tempo em outro lugar.
mt: The Tomb of Tutankhamun (KV62). KV62 is probably the most famous of the tombs in the Valley, the scene of the discovery of the intact royal burial by Howard Carter in 1922. However, almost not worth the visit to the tomb of Tutankhamun compared to most of the other royal tombs, as it is much smaller and has limited decoration. Those interested in seeing evidence of the damage caused to the mummy during attempts to remove it from the coffin will be disappointed, as only the head and shoulders are visible. The fabulous riches of the tomb are no longer there, but were removed to the Egyptian Museum, Cairo. Visitors with limited time would be better off spending their time elsewhere.
ref: Tomb of Tutankhamun (KV62). KV62 may be the most famous of the tombs in the Valley, the scene of Howard Carter's 1922 discovery of the almost intact royal burial of the young king. Compared to most of the other royal tombs, however, the tomb of Tutankhamun is barely worth visiting, being much smaller and with limited decoration. Anyone interested in seeing evidence of the damage to the mummy done during attempts to remove it from the coffin will be disappointed as only the head and shoulders are visible. The fabulous riches of the tomb are no longer in it, but have been removed to the Egyptian Museum in Cairo. Visitors with limited time would be best to spend their time elsewhere.

src: A Ilha de Bowen é um popular local para passar o dia ou o final de semana, oferecendo passeios de caiaque, caminhadas, compras, restaurantes e muito mais. Essa comunidade autêntica pode ser encontrada em Howe Sound, na proximidade de Vancouver, e tem acesso facilitado por meio de táxis aquáticos agendados que saem de Granville Island, no centro de Vancouver. Para aqueles que gostam de atividades do lado de fora, uma caminhada pelo corredor Sea to Sky é obrigatória. Whistler (1:30 min. de carro de Vancouver) é cara, mas famosa por causa das Olimpíadas de Inverno de 2010. Durante o inverno, desfrute de algumas das melhores pistas de esqui da América do Norte e, durante o verão, experimente um legítimo ciclismo de montanha.
mt: Bowen Island is a popular day or weekend destination, offering kayaking, hiking, shopping, restaurants and more. This authentic community can be found in Howe Sound, near Vancouver, and is easily accessible via scheduled water taxis departing from Granville Island in downtown Vancouver. For those who enjoy being outdoors, a Sea to Sky Highway walk is a must. Whistler (1:30 min. drive from Vancouver) is pricey, but famous for its 2010 Winter Olympics. In the winter, enjoy some of North America's best ski runs, and in the summer, try a legit mountain biking.
ref: Bowen Island is a popular day trip or weekend excursion offering kayaking, hiking, shops, restaurants, and more. This authentic community is located in Howe Sound just off Vancouver, and is easily accessed via scheduled water taxis departing Granville Island in downtown Vancouver. For those who enjoy outdoor activities, a trek up the Sea to Sky corridor is essential. Whistler (1.5 hour drive from Vancouver) is expensive but well-known because of the 2010 Winter Olympics. In the winter, enjoy some of the best skiing in North America, and in the summer try some authentic mountain biking.

src: A cidade de Victoria Falls está situada na parte oeste do Zimbábue, ao se cruzar a fronteira de Livingstone, na Zâmbia, e não muito longe de Botswana. A cidade encontra-se logo na lateral das cataratas, sendo estas a principal atração, além disso este popular destino turístico oferece aos aventureiros e turistas diversas oportunidades para uma duradoura estadia. Na temporada das chuvas (de novembro a março),   a quantidade de água será mais significativa e as quedas serão mais intensas. Você certamente irá se molhar caso cruze a ponte ou caminhe pelas trilhas nas proximidades das cachoeiras. Por outro lado, é mais precisamente porque o volume de água é tão alto que sua visão real das Cataratas será obscurecida — por conta de toda a água!
mt: Victoria Falls is located in the western part of Zimbabwe, just across the border from Livingstone, Zambia, and not far from Botswana. The city is situated right next to the falls, being this the main attraction, besides this popular tourist destination offers to adventurers and tourists various opportunities for a long stay. In the rainy season (November to March), the amount of water will be more significant and the falls will be more intense. You will certainly get wet if you cross the bridge or walk the trails near the waterfalls. On the other hand, it is precisely because the volume of water is so high that your real view of the Falls will be obscured — because of all the water!
ref: Victoria Falls is a town in the western portion of Zimbabwe, across the border from Livingstone, Zambia, and near Botswana. The town lies immediately next to the falls, and they are the major attraction, but this popular tourist destination offers both adventure seekers and sightseers plenty of opportunities for a longer stay. In the rainy season (November to March), the water volume will be higher and the Falls will be more dramatic. You are guaranteed to get wet if you cross the bridge or walk along the trails winding near the Falls. On the other hand, it is precisely because the volume of water is so high that your viewing of the actual Falls will be obscured—by all the water!

src: As regras relativas à fotografia regular também se aplicam à gravação de vídeo, possivelmente ainda mais. Se não é permitido tirar uma simples foto de algo, então você não deve sequer cogitar em gravar um vídeo disso. Se você estiver utilizando um drone, verifique, com bastante antecedência, o que é permitido filmar e quais são as autorizações ou licenças adicionais necessárias. Pilotar um drone perto de um aeroporto ou em cima de uma multidão quase sempre é uma má ideia, mesmo que não seja ilegal em sua área.
mt: The rules regarding regular photography also apply to video recording, possibly even more so. If it is not allowed to take a simple photo of something, then you should not even consider recording a video of it. If you are using a drone, check, well in advance, what is allowed to film and what additional permissions or licenses are required. Flying a drone near an airport or over a crowd is almost always a bad idea, even if it is not illegal in your area.
ref: Rules regarding regular photography also apply to video recording, possibly even more so. If just taking a photo of something isn't allowed, then you shouldn't even think of recording a video of it. If using a drone, check well in advance as to what you are allowed to film and what permits or additional licensing are required. Flying a drone near an airport or over a crowd is almost always a bad idea, even if it's not illegal in your area.

src: O registro é um requisito adicional para o processo de visto. Em alguns países, você deve registrar sua presença e o endereço onde está ficando com as autoridades locais. Isso pode exigir a assinatura de algum documento na delegacia de polícia local ou uma visita ao escritório de imigração. Em muitos países com uma lei como essa, os hotéis locais cuidarão do registro (assegure-se de perguntar). Em outros casos, somente pessoas hospedadas fora de acomodações turísticas precisam se registrar. No entanto, isso torna a lei muito mais obscura, então descubra com antecedência.
mt: Registration is an additional requirement for the visa process. In some countries, you must register your presence and where you are staying with local authorities. This may require signing some document at the local police station or a visit to the immigration office. In many countries with such a law, local hotels will take care of the registration (make sure to ask). In other cases, only people staying outside of tourist accommodations need to register. However, this makes the law much more obscure, so find out beforehand.
ref: Registration is an additional requirement for the visa process. In some countries, you must register your presence and address where you are staying with the local authorities. This might require filling out a form with the local police or a visit to the immigration offices. In many countries with such a law, local hotels will handle the registration (make sure to ask). In other cases, only those staying outside of tourist accommodations need to register.  However, this makes the law much more obscure, so find out beforehand.

src: Ser voluntário enquanto viaja é uma ótima maneira de fazer a diferença, mas não se trata apenas de dar. Viver e trabalhar voluntariamente num país estrangeiro é uma ótima forma de conhecer uma cultura diferente, conhecer novas pessoas, aprender sobre si mesmo, adquirir um senso de perspectiva e até ganhar novas habilidades. Além do mais, pode ser uma boa maneira de expandir o orçamento e possibilitar uma estadia mais longa em algum lugar, tendo em vista que muitos trabalhos voluntários disponibilizam hospedagem e alimentação e alguns pagam um pequeno salário.
mt: Being a volunteer while traveling is a great way to make a difference, but it's not just about giving. Living and working as a volunteer in a foreign country is a great way to get to know a different culture, meet new people, learn about yourself, gain a sense of perspective and even pick up new skills. Plus, it can be a good way to expand your budget and make a longer stay possible in some place, considering that many volunteer jobs provide housing and food and some pay a small salary.
ref: Volunteering while travelling is a great way to make a difference but it's not just about giving. Living and volunteering in a foreign country is a great way to get to know a different culture, meet new people, learn about yourself, get a sense of perspective and even gain new skills. It can also be a good way to stretch a budget to allow a longer stay somewhere since many volunteer jobs provide room and board and a few pay a small salary.

src: "Viajar para o Walt Disney World é como uma grande peregrinação para muitas famílias americanas. A visita ""típica"" envolve pousar no Aeroporto Internacional de Orlando, ir de ônibus até um hotel Disney no local, passar em torno de uma semana sem sair da propriedade da Disney, e voltar para casa. Há inúmeras variações possíveis, mas essa continua sendo o que a maioria das pessoas quer dizer quando falam de ""ir para a Disney"". Muitos ingressos vendidos on-line em sites de leilão, como o eBay ou o Craigslist, são, na verdade, ingressos para vários dias e parques múltiplos que já foram parcialmente usados. Mesmo que isto seja uma atividade muito comum, ela é proibida pela Disney: os ingressos são intransferíveis."
mt: "Traveling to Walt Disney World is like a great pilgrimage for many American families. The ""typical"" visit involves landing at Orlando International Airport, taking a bus to a Disney hotel on site, spending around a week without leaving the Disney property, and going home. There are many possible variations, but this is what most people mean when they say ""going to Disney"". Many tickets sold online on auction sites such as eBay or Craigslist are, in fact, tickets for multiple days and multiple parks that have already been partially used. Even though this is a very common activity, it is prohibited by Disney: the tickets are non-transferable."
ref: "Traveling to Walt Disney World represents a major pilgrimage for many American families. The ""typical"" visit involves flying into Orlando International Airport, busing to an on-site Disney hotel, spending about a week without leaving Disney property, and returning home. There are infinite variations possible, but this remains what most people mean when they talk of ""going to Disney World"". Many tickets sold online through auction websites such as eBay or Craigslist are partially used multi-day park-hopper tickets. While this is a very common activity, it is prohibited by Disney: the tickets are non-transferable."

src: "Viajar para o Walt Disney World é como uma grande peregrinação para muitas famílias americanas. A visita ""típica"" envolve pousar no Aeroporto Internacional de Orlando, ir de ônibus até um hotel Disney no local, passar em torno de uma semana sem sair da propriedade da Disney, e voltar para casa. Há inúmeras variações possíveis, mas essa continua sendo o que a maioria das pessoas quer dizer quando falam de ""ir para a Disney"". Muitos ingressos vendidos on-line em sites de leilão, como o eBay ou o Craigslist, são, na verdade, ingressos para vários dias e parques múltiplos que já foram parcialmente usados. Mesmo que isto seja uma atividade muito comum, ela é proibida pela Disney: os ingressos são intransferíveis."
mt: "Traveling to Walt Disney World is like a great pilgrimage for many American families. The ""typical"" visit involves landing at Orlando International Airport, taking a bus to a Disney hotel on site, spending around a week without leaving the Disney property, and going home. There are many possible variations, but this is what most people mean when they say ""going to Disney"". Many tickets sold online on auction sites such as eBay or Craigslist are, in fact, tickets for multiple days and multiple parks that have already been partially used. Even though this is a very common activity, it is prohibited by Disney: the tickets are non-transferable."
ref: "Traveling to Walt Disney World represents a major pilgrimage for many American families. The ""typical"" visit involves flying into Orlando International Airport, busing to an on-site Disney hotel, spending about a week without leaving Disney property, and returning home. There are infinite variations possible, but this remains what most people mean when they talk of ""going to Disney World"". Many tickets sold online through auction websites such as eBay or Craigslist are partially used multi-day park-hopper tickets. While this is a very common activity, it is prohibited by Disney: the tickets are non-transferable."

src: Ao planejar uma visita a um país que é considerado uma zona de guerra, primeiro a pessoa deve receber treinamento profissional. Uma pesquisa pela Internet por 'Curso de ambiente hostil' normalmente indicará o endereço de uma companhia da região. Um curso cobrirá normalmente todos os tópicos conversados aqui com bastante mais detalhes, normalmente com experiência prática. Um curso geralmente dura entre 2 e 5 dias e envolve dramatização, diversos primeiros socorros e, algumas vezes, treinamento com uso de armas. Livros e revistas que tratam de sobrevivência na selva são comuns, mas publicações sobre zonas de guerra são raras.
mt: When planning a visit to a country that is considered a war zone, first the person must receive professional training. A search on the Internet for 'Hostile Environment Course' will usually indicate the address of a company in the region. A course will usually cover all the topics discussed here with much more detail, often with practical experience. A course usually lasts between 2 and 5 days and involves role play, various first aid and, sometimes, training in the use of weapons. Books and magazines dealing with survival in the jungle are common, but publications on war zones are rare.
ref: Anyone planning a visit to a country that could be considered a war zone should get professional training. A search of the Internet for 'Hostile environment course' will probably provide the address of a local company. A course will normally cover all the issues discussed here in far greater detail, usually with practical experience. A course will normally be from 2-5 days and will involve role play, a lot of first aid and sometimes weapons training. Books and magazines dealing with wilderness survival are common, but publications dealing with war zones are few.

src: Existem maneiras diferentes de purificar água, algumas mais eficientes contra ameaças específicas. Em algumas áreas, ferver a água por um minuto é suficiente; em outras, muitos minutos são necessários. A qualidade dos filtros variam e, se você estiver em dúvida, talvez seja bom considerar a possibilidade de comprar galões de água de uma empresa de confiança.
mt: There are different ways to purify water, some more efficient against specific threats. In some areas, boiling water for a minute is sufficient; in others, many minutes are needed. The quality of filters varies and, if you are in doubt, it may be worth considering the possibility of buying gallons of water from a trusted company.
ref: There are different ways of purifying water, some more effective against specific threats. In some areas boiling water for a minute is enough, in others several minutes are needed. Filters vary in effectiveness, and should you have a concern, then you should consider buying your water in a sealed bottle from a reputable company.

src: Correntes de retorno são o refluxo da água das ondas na praia voltando ao mar, geralmente em um recife ou área similar. Devido à topologia subaquática, o fluxo de retorno fica concentrado em algumas seções mais profundas, e pode-se formar uma rápida correnteza para águas profundas lá. A maioria das mortes são resultantes de fadiga por tentar nadar contra a corrente, o que pode ser impossível. Assim que você consegue sair da corrente, nadar de volta não é mais difícil do que seria usualmente. Tente mirar de algum lugar onde você não possa ser pego ou, a depender das suas habilidades ou se você tiver sido detectado, espere por resgate.
mt: Return currents are the backwash of the waves on the beach returning to the sea, usually in a reef or similar area. Due to the underwater topography, the return flow is concentrated in some deeper sections, and a strong current can form to deep waters there. Most deaths are due to exhaustion from trying to swim against the current, which may be impossible. Once you get out of the current, swimming back is not any harder than it would be normally. Try to aim for some place where you can't be caught or, depending on your abilities or if you have been detected, wait for rescue.
ref: Rip currents are the returning flow from waves breaking off the beach, often at a reef or similar. Due to the underwater topology the return flow is concentrated at a few deeper sections, and a fast current to deep water may form there. Most deaths happen as result of fatigue trying to swim back against the current, which may be impossible. As soon as you get out of the current, swimming back is no more difficult than normally. Try aiming somewhere where you are not caught again or, depending on your skills and on whether you have been noticed, you might want to wait for rescue.

src: Os cursos d'água do interior podem ser um bom tema ao redor do qual organizar um feriado. Por exemplo, visitar os castelos do Vale de Loire, o Vale do Alto Médio Reno ou fazer um passeio de barco para os pontos interessantes do Danúbio ou navegar pelo Canal Erie. Eles também definem rotas para trilhas populares de caminhada e ciclismo.
mt: The interior waterways can be a good theme around which to organize a holiday. For example, visit the castles of the Loire Valley, the Upper Middle Rhine Valley or take a boat trip to the interesting points of the Danube or navigate the Erie Canal. They also define popular hiking and cycling trails.
ref: Inland waterways can be a good theme to base a holiday around. For example visiting castles in the Loire Valley, the Rhine valley or taking a cruise to interesting cites on the Danube or boating along the Erie Canal. They also define routes for popular hiking and cycling trails.

src: No norte, a região é limitada pelo Sahel, e no sul e oeste pelo Oceano Atlântico. Mulheres: é recomendável que todas as viajantes digam que são casadas, independentemente do atual status marital. É últil também usar um anel (só não um que pareça caro demais). As mulheres devem entender que diferenças culturais podem ocasionar atos que elas considerariam como assédio, e não é incomum serem seguidas, agarradas pelo braço, etc. Seja firme ao recusar homens. Não tenha medo de se manter firme (seja por diferenças culturais ou não, isso não significa que esteja tudo bem!).
mt: In the north, the region is bounded by the Sahel, and in the south and west by the Atlantic Ocean. Women: it is recommended that all female travellers say they are married, regardless of their current marital status. It is also useful to wear a ring (but not one that looks too expensive). Women should understand that cultural differences may lead to actions that they would consider as harassment, and it is not uncommon to be followed, grabbed by the arm, etc. Be firm in refusing men. Do not be afraid to be firm (whether due to cultural differences or not, this does not mean that everything is okay!).
ref: In the north the region is bounded by the Sahel, and in the south and west by the Atlantic Ocean. Women: It is recommended that any women travellers say that they are married, regardless of actual marital status. It is helpful to also wear a ring (just not one that looks too expensive. Women should realize that cultural differences may result in what they would consider harassment and it is not uncommon to be followed, grabbed by the arm, etc. Be firm in turning down men, and don't be afraid to stand your ground (cultural differences or not, it doesn't make it ok!).

src: Acompanhar a vida de animais selvagens é um dos maiores desafios para um fotógrafo e necessita da combinação de sorte, paciência, experiência e bom equipamento. Fotografar vida selvagem geralmente é algo desvalorizado, mas, como acontece com a fotografia em geral, uma imagem vale mais que mil palavras. Para fotografar a vida de animais selvagens, geralmente é necessário possuir lentes teleobjetivas longas, embora imagens como as de um bando de pássaros ou uma criatura pequena requerem outros tipos de lentes. Muitos animais exóticos são difíceis de encontrar, e os parques às vezes têm regras sobre tirar fotos para fins comerciais. Animais selvagens podem ser tímidos ou agressivos. O ambiente pode ser frio, quente ou hostil.
mt: Following the lives of wild animals is one of the greatest challenges for a photographer and requires the combination of luck, patience, experience and good equipment. Photographing wild life is generally undervalued, but, as happens with photography in general, an image is worth more than a thousand words. To photograph wild life, generally one needs to have long telephoto lenses, although images such as a flock of birds or a small creature require other types of lenses. Many exotic animals are hard to find, and parks sometimes have rules about taking photos for commercial purposes. Wild animals can be shy or aggressive. The environment can be cold, hot or hostile.
ref: Wildlife is among the most challenging motifs for a photographer, and needs a combination of good luck, patience, experience and good equipment. Wildlife photography is often taken for granted, but like photography in general, a picture is worth a thousand words. Wildlife photography often requires a long telephoto lens, though things like a flock of birds or a tiny creature need other lenses. Many exotic animals are hard to find, and parks sometimes have rules about taking photographs for commercial purposes. Wild animals might either be shy or aggressive. The environment might be cold, hot, or otherwise hostile.

src: Sempre que alguém for dirigir em lugares com altas latitudes ou em estradas sobre as montanhas, deve levar em consideração a possibilidade de enfrentar neve, gelo ou temperaturas congelantes. Em estradas com gelo e neve, a fricção é baixa, e você não pode dirigir como se estivesse no asfalto limpo. Durante as nevascas, é possível cair neve suficiente para deixar você preso em muito pouco tempo. A visibilidade também pode ficar menor devido à neve caindo ou ventando, ou pela condensação ou gelo nas janelas do veículo. Por outro lado, as condições de gelo e neve são normais em muitos países, e o tráfego permanece quase que sem interrupção durante todo o ano.
mt: Whenever someone is driving in places with high latitudes or on mountain roads, they should consider the possibility of facing snow, ice or freezing temperatures. On roads with ice and snow, friction is low, and you cannot drive as if you were on clean asphalt. During snowstorms, it is possible to fall enough snow to leave you stuck in very little time. Visibility can also be reduced due to snow falling or blowing, or by condensation or ice on the vehicle's windows. On the other hand, ice and snow conditions are normal in many countries, and traffic remains almost uninterrupted throughout the year.
ref: Anyone who's going to drive at high latitudes or over mountain passes should consider the possibility of snow, ice, or freezing temperatures. On icy and snowy roadways, friction is low and you cannot drive as if you were on bare asphalt. During blizzards, enough snow to get you stuck can fall in very little time. Visibility may also be restricted by falling or blowing snow or by condensation or ice on vehicle windows. On the other hand, icy and snowy conditions are normal in many countries, and traffic goes on mostly uninterrupted all year round.

src: A menos que você seja um diplomata, trabalhar em outro país envolve declarar imposto de renda no país que você mora. Nos diferentes países, o imposto de renda é estruturado de forma diferente, e as alíquotas e faixas de impostos variam substancialmente de um país para outro. Em certos países federais, como os EUA e o Canadá, o imposto de renda é cobrado tanto à nível federal quanto local, então, as taxas e faixas podem variar de local em local.
mt: Unless you are a diplomat, working in another country involves declaring income tax in the country you live in. Income tax is structured differently in different countries, and tax rates and brackets vary significantly from one country to another. In certain federal countries, such as the United States and Canada, income tax is charged both at the federal and local level, so rates and brackets may vary from place to place.
ref: Unless you are a diplomat, working overseas generally means that you will have to file income tax in the country you are based in. Income tax is structured differently in different countries, and the tax rates and brackets vary widely from one country to another. In some federal countries, such as the United States and Canada, income tax is levied both at the federal level and at the local level, so the rates and brackets can vary from region to region.

src: Uma Feira Mundial (comumente nomeada de Exposição Mundial, ou simplesmente Expo) é um grande festival internacional de artes e ciências. Os países participantes possuem apresentações artísticas e educacionais em pavilhões nacionais com objetivo de mostrar as questões mundiais ou a cultura e história do país. As Exposições Horticulturais Internacionais são festividades que tem como sua especialidade expor flores, jardins botânicos e tudo o que tenha relação com plantas. Apesar que, em teoria, possam acontecer anualmente (desde que estejam em países diferentes), na prática, não é possível. Estes eventos costumam duram de três até seis meses e são feitos em lugares com 50 hectares, no mínimo.
mt: A World's Fair (commonly named World's Exposition, or simply Expo) is a large international festival of arts and sciences. Participating countries have artistic and educational presentations in national pavilions with the goal of showing world issues or the country's culture and history. International Horticultural Expositions are festivals that specialize in showing flowers, botanical gardens and everything related to plants. Although, in theory, they can happen annually (as long as they are in different countries), in practice, this is not possible. These events usually last from three to six months and are held in places with 50 hectares, at least.
ref: A World's Fair (commonly called World Exposition, or simply Expo) is large international festival of arts and sciences. Participating countries present artistic and educational displays in national pavilions to showcase world issues or their country's culture and history. International Horticultural Expositions are specialised events which showcase floral displays, botanical gardens and anything else to do with plants. Although in theory they can take place annually (so long as they are in different countries), in practice they are not. These events normally last anywhere between three and six months, and are held on sites no smaller than 50 hectares.

src: Embora muitos dos animais do parque estejam habituados à presença de seres humanos, ainda assim são animais selvagens que não devem ser alimentados ou incomodados. Seguindo as instruções das autoridades do parque, mantenha-se a pelo menos 100 jardas/metros dos ursos e lobos, e a 25 jardas/metros de todos os outros animais selvagens! Apesar de sua aparência dócil, os bisões, alces  e ursos, assim como todos os animais grandes, podem atacar. Todos os anos, dezenas de visitantes ficam feridos porque não mantiveram uma distância adequada. Esses animais são grandes, selvagens e potencialmente perigosos, então não se aproxime. Além do mais, saiba que os odores atraem os ursos e outros animais selvagens, contudo, evite carregar ou cozinhar alimentos com cheiro forte e mantenha o acampamento limpo.
mt: While many of the park's animals are accustomed to the presence of humans, they are still wild animals that should not be fed or bothered. Following the park's authorities' instructions, stay at least 100 yards from bears and wolves, and 25 yards from all other wild animals! Despite their docile appearance, bison, moose and bears, as well as all large animals, can attack. Every year, dozens of visitors are injured because they did not keep a safe distance. These animals are large, wild and potentially dangerous, so don't approach. Also, know that smells attract bears and other wild animals, but avoid carrying or cooking food with strong odor and keep the camp clean.
ref: Though many of the animals in the park are used to seeing humans, the wildlife is nonetheless wild and should not be fed or disturbed. According to park authorities, stay at least 100 yards/meters away from bears and wolves and 25 yards/meters from all other wild animals! No matter how docile they may look, bison, elk, moose, bears, and nearly all large animals can attack. Each year, dozens of visitors are injured because they didn't keep a proper distance. These animals are large, wild, and potentially dangerous, so give them their space. In addition, be aware that odors attract bears and other wildlife, so avoid carrying or cooking odorous foods and keep a clean camp.
